TITLE: Perfect for Life on the Go
DESCRIPTION: Feel at home in any environment. With versatile seating, an available Cargo Management System and two engines to choose from, this SUV is designed to accommodate you on all your adventures. Plus, with available Intelligent 4WD, you can feel confident handling the everyday.

TITLE: Intelligent 4WD
DESCRIPTION: Compact in size and offering capability-enhancing features, the 2020 EcoSport is a master of maneuverability. For added confidence on the road, there's Intelligent 4WD, which helps keep you firmly on the ground, delivering added traction when you need it.

TITLE: Keep Moving Forward
DESCRIPTION: Hill start assist can help you switch from brake to gas without rolling backward. The system automatically works with the anti-lock brakes to hold the vehicle in place for up to two seconds while you transition your foot from the brake to the accelerator.10

TITLE: Proven Performance
DESCRIPTION: Ford EcoBoost® engines have proven their performance. The standard 1.0L EcoBoost in the 2020 Ford EcoSport is no exception. Turbocharged and featuring direct injection, it delivers enough power to get you wherever you need to go.

TITLE: Conserve Your Energy
DESCRIPTION: Auto Start-Stop Technology can help reduce fuel consumption and vehicle emissions during city driving. When the vehicle comes to a stop, the engine automatically shuts off and then seamlessly restarts when your foot leaves the brake pedal.

TITLE: Bring the Swing
DESCRIPTION: For convenient cargo loading, the 2020 EcoSport comes with a rear swing gate, which opens to the side to give you easy access to your belongings without your having to stretch and reach for a handle or duck to grab your things.

TITLE: Pack in the Fun
DESCRIPTION: The Cargo Management System, standard on the SE and above, includes an adjustable rear load floor and shelf that you can use to customize how you stow your gear. Or create even more personal storage solutions with the available Cargo Management Package, featuring a cargo net and organizers.

TITLE: There’s Room to Spare
DESCRIPTION: If you're looking for extra room in the back, this SUV has it. Fold the back row of seats up to accommodate extra friends or down to haul cargo. *

TITLE: Tuned in to the Road
DESCRIPTION: Feel in control wherever you go. Compared with a regular suspension, the available SES sport-tuned suspension in the SES provides you with less body roll, a better feel of the road and impressive handling around curves.

TITLE: Always a Bright Spot
DESCRIPTION: A vehicle that makes you want to get in and go. The 2020 EcoSport brings elegance and comfort to you and your passengers with available interior amenities like leather-trimmed seats. Its stylish exterior takes it one step further, elevating every journey with striking details to make your presence known.

TITLE: Crafted for You
DESCRIPTION: The 2020 EcoSport was designed with you in mind, bringing you capable features that not only look great but also enhance your experience. Available features like a power moonroof, ambient lighting and an 8-inch LCD touchscreen help turn a daily commute into a blissful getaway.

TITLE: SES Black Appearance Package
DESCRIPTION: The SES Black Appearance Package is available when you choose the 2020 EcoSport in Lightning Blue, Moondust Silver or Diamond White. The package comes with a sleek black-painted roof, a stylish Ebony interior, unique hood decal and new to this year, a black-painted spoiler.

TITLE: Style that Swings
DESCRIPTION: The unique rear swing gate with hideaway latch adds a dash of fun, up-for-anything style.

TITLE: Light Up the Night
DESCRIPTION: EcoSport SE, SES and Titanium trim levels include LED signature lighting and halogen projector headlamps that are both attractive and functional.

TITLE: Tech that Works with You
DESCRIPTION:
EcoSport puts convenience at your fingertips. Smart technology like available SYNC®
 3 with Apple CarPlay™
 and Android Auto™
 compatibility, an available 8-inch color LCD touchscreen and standard FordPass Connect™
 with an in-vehicle 4G LTE Wi-Fi hotspot makes it easy for you to stay connected on the road.

TITLE:
BLIS®
 With Cross-Traffic Alert
DESCRIPTION:
With BLIS®

, you won't have to bother your passenger with "Can I get over?" This feature can help detect and alert you to vehicles in your blind spot, while Cross-Traffic Alert can detect traffic behind your vehicle when you're slowly backing out of a parking spot or driveway.10

TITLE: Smart Technology
DESCRIPTION: Connect, navigate and discover with smart technology. Ford puts you quickly and easily in touch with your world through smartphone apps, an in-vehicle touchscreen and voice-activated technology.27

TITLE: SYNC® 3
DESCRIPTION: Available SYNC® 3 is our easy-to-use, responsive voice-activated technology. Experience the capacitive touchscreen with impressive responsiveness. Locate your favorite restaurants with simple destination entry via the available navigation. You'll also find a sleek user-friendly interface to help you connect to and control your smartphone.27 SYNC 3 also brings the power of Apple CarPlay™160 and Android Auto™ compatibility to your Ford.161

TITLE: Ford+Alexa
DESCRIPTION: Ford+Alexa brings the amazing capabilities of Amazon Alexa from your home to the road. By using the Ford+Alexa app and connecting via available SYNC® 3 AppLink,® you'll have access to voice navigation, traffic information and Amazon Prime shopping and can even control your supported smart-home devices. Stay connected from just about anywhere. *

TITLE: Ford and Waze
DESCRIPTION: Using available Waze inside your Ford vehicle is now easier because the much-loved, crowd-sourced navigation and traffic app is compatible with available SYNC® 3 AppLink.® You can collaborate with other users, outsmarting traffic by sharing information to get the best routes, and receive real-time alerts about accidents, road hazards and traffic jams. * Moving Waze from your phone to the vehicle's touchscreen allows you to conveniently access the app's features on a larger display. You can also operate Waze with voice commands for hands-free control, helping to keep your eyes on the road. Available via iPhone® and on Android Auto.™

TITLE: Apple CarPlay™ and Android Auto™ Compatibility
DESCRIPTION: SYNC® 3 brings the power of Apple CarPlay and Android Auto to your Ford. * Use Siri® to interact with your iPhone® or Google™ to interact with your Android while keeping your eyes on the road and hands on the wheel.27 Apple CarPlay gives you access to Apple Music and Maps and lets you make phone calls, send messages and more. With Android Auto, you can interact with your Google Maps to receive voice-guided navigation, live traffic information and estimated travel time. You can also connect to Google Now and Google Music.

TITLE: SiriusXM® Satellite Radio
DESCRIPTION: The 2020 EcoSport equipped with satellite radio comes with a 6-month all-access audio trial that offers 150+ channels, including commercial-free music, plus available sports, news, comedy and entertainment.34 You can also stay in the know while on the go with a 5-year subscription to SiriusXM Traffic and Travel Link® services on new vehicles equipped with the optional Navigation System. Get detailed traffic and weather information, including ski conditions, fuel prices, sports scores and much more.

TITLE: FordPass Connect™
DESCRIPTION:
With standard FordPass Connect,™
 drivers and passengers can enjoy an in-vehicle 4G LTE Wi-Fi hotspot powered by AT&T. Up to 10 devices can connect at once, and you can use FordPass™
 to keep track of your Wi-Fi data usage. Also, you can access the hotspot from up to 50 feet outside the vehicle. *

TITLE: Key by Amazon In-Car Delivery
DESCRIPTION: Ford is making your life easier in collaboration with Amazon, offering In-Car Delivery with Key by Amazon for Prime members. * Now it's easy to receive Amazon packages delivered right to your vehicle whether you're at home, at work or on a vacation.

TITLE: MyKey®
DESCRIPTION:
Ford MyKey®
 technology helps parents encourage teenagers to drive more responsibly. Program your key to a restricted driving setting that promotes good habits, such as mandating safety belt use, limiting top speed and decreasing audio volume.

TITLE: Treat Yourself
DESCRIPTION: Comfort comes standard in the 2020 Ford EcoSport. You'll settle into a cabin that's been thoughtfully designed to help ensure convenience, connectedness and enjoyment. Available amenities like a heated steering wheel and leather-trimmed seating add to the experience and help make your ride feel like home.

TITLE: Harmonize Your Ride
DESCRIPTION: Standard on the EcoSport Titanium, the B&O Sound System by Bang & Olufsen reimagines more than 90 years of audio heritage, with natural materials, distinctive design and high- quality sound for seamlessly integrated experiences. In fact, the 10-speaker system was designed specifically for the EcoSport.

TITLE: Comfortable Seating for Everyone
DESCRIPTION: Not only will your second-row passengers sit comfortably with the leg, head and hip room in the EcoSport SES, but they'll also enjoy it on ActiveX seating with cloth inserts. In the EcoSport Titanium, you'll find perforated, leather-trimmed seating surfaces.

TITLE: ActiveX Seating Material
DESCRIPTION: The sporty EcoSport SES interior is designed to get you in the mood for some serious fun. The unique Ano Gray accents, interior highlights and sporty seats with ActiveX seating material signal your intention to take life by the wheel. ActiveX is a high-end synthetic seating material that is designed to fit perfectly into your active lifestyle, with its durability, stain resistance and ability to maintain a premium look and feel.

TITLE: That Cozy Feeling
DESCRIPTION: Heated leather-trimmed seating offers warmth on cold days. Standard on the EcoSport SES and Titanium. Standard on EcoSport SE and above, the leather-wrapped steering wheel helps make sure your hands are just as snug as you are.

TITLE: Keep Your Devices Humming
DESCRIPTION: You won't have to barter for the charger anymore. EcoSport offers two fast-charging USB ports, a 12-volt outlet on the console and a 12-volt outlet in the rear with the option of a 110- volt outlet as well.

TITLE: SE Convenience Package
DESCRIPTION:
This package helps make sure convenience is always within reach. For added confidence on the road, this package offers BLIS®
 with Cross-Traffic Alert.10
 Also available with this package, Sync®

 3 with Navigation System helps you stay on course and can even point you to the nearest gas stations or coffee shops.27
 It's not all business, though; this package also gives you seven energetic speakers, a 110V power outlet and ambient lighting for when you want to surround yourself in a blissful environment.

TITLE: Confidence on the Road to Adventure
DESCRIPTION:
The Ford Escape for 2020 offers a wide range of available technologies to help keep you aware of your surroundings and ever-changing traffic conditions.10
 From the driveway to the highway, the standard Ford Co-Pilot360™
 has you covered. Ford Co-Pilot360™
 is an advanced suite of standard driver-assist technologies to help keep you connected and confident as you hit the road as part of your diverse, adventurous and active lifestyle.

TITLE:
Ford Co-Pilot360™
 Technology
DESCRIPTION:
Ford Co-Pilot360™
 is an advanced suite of standard driver-assist technologies that includes BLIS®

 with Cross Traffic Alert, Pre-Collision Assist with Automatic Emergency Braking, Auto High-Beam Headlamps, Lane-Keeping System and Rear View Camera. Ford Escape also makes additional technology available that is designed to help keep you in command, from the driveway to the highway.10

TITLE: Pre-Collision Assist with Automatic Emergency Braking
DESCRIPTION: If the system’s sensors detect a potential collision with a car or pedestrian in front of you, a warning flashes and an audible alert sounds.* Also, the brakes will precharge and increase brake-assist sensitivity to provide full responsiveness when you do brake. If you do not take corrective action and a collision is imminent, the brakes can automatically apply.

TITLE: Pre-Collision Assist with Automatic Emergency Braking
DESCRIPTION: If the system’s sensors detect a potential collision with a car or pedestrian in front of you, a warning flashes and an audible alert sounds.* Also, the brakes will precharge and increase brake-assist sensitivity to provide full responsiveness when you do brake. If you do not take corrective action and a collision is imminent, the brakes can automatically apply.

TITLE:
BLIS®
 with Cross-Traffic Alert
DESCRIPTION: This feature helps increase your awareness where you need it most. BLIS (Blind Spot Information System) with Cross-Traffic Alert uses radar to identify if a vehicle is detected in your blind spot and alerts you with an indicator light in the appropriate exterior mirror. Cross-Traffic Alert also uses radar to watch for traffic behind you as you’re slowly backing out of a parking spot or driveway. If cross-traffic sensors detect a vehicle approaching, you will be audibly and visually alerted.

TITLE:
BLIS®
 with Cross-Traffic Alert
DESCRIPTION: This feature helps increase your awareness where you need it most. BLIS (Blind Spot Information System) with Cross-Traffic Alert uses radar to identify if a vehicle is detected in your blind spot and alerts you with an indicator light in the appropriate exterior mirror. Cross-Traffic Alert also uses radar to watch for traffic behind you as you’re slowly backing out of a parking spot or driveway. If cross-traffic sensors detect a vehicle approaching, you will be audibly and visually alerted.

TITLE: Available Active Park Assist 2.0
DESCRIPTION: Parking made easy — even in tight parallel or reverse perpendicular spots. When engaged, it can help locate a potential spot. Then all you have to do is brake to a complete stop, shift into Neutral and hold down the Active Park Assist button — your vehicle does the rest.10

TITLE: Available Active Park Assist 2.0
DESCRIPTION: Parking made easy — even in tight parallel or reverse perpendicular spots. When engaged, it can help locate a potential spot. Then all you have to do is brake to a complete stop, shift into Neutral and hold down the Active Park Assist button — your vehicle does the rest.10

TITLE: Adaptive Cruise Control with Stop-and-Go
DESCRIPTION:
This available feature slows down your vehicle if the traffic ahead has stopped or slowed. Available Adaptive Cruise Control with Stop-and-Go technology can bring your vehicle to a complete stop in stopped traffic and resume as traffic begins to move.10
*

TITLE: Adaptive Cruise Control with Stop-and-Go
DESCRIPTION:
This available feature slows down your vehicle if the traffic ahead has stopped or slowed. Available Adaptive Cruise Control with Stop-and-Go technology can bring your vehicle to a complete stop in stopped traffic and resume as traffic begins to move.10
*

TITLE: Rear View Camera
DESCRIPTION: The Rear View Camera provides a great view of what’s behind your vehicle. Just make sure to keep the camera lens free of debris (like snow or dust) and you can navigate your vehicle in Reverse with confidence.10

TITLE: Rear View Camera
DESCRIPTION: The Rear View Camera provides a great view of what’s behind your vehicle. Just make sure to keep the camera lens free of debris (like snow or dust) and you can navigate your vehicle in Reverse with confidence.10

TITLE: Evasive Steering Assist
DESCRIPTION:
This available feature can help make it easier to avoid a potential collision. It doesn’t steer for you, but it can provide extra steering support if the system warning goes off and you need to maneuver around the vehicle ahead.10
*

TITLE: Evasive Steering Assist
DESCRIPTION:
This available feature can help make it easier to avoid a potential collision. It doesn’t steer for you, but it can provide extra steering support if the system warning goes off and you need to maneuver around the vehicle ahead.10
*

TITLE: Lane-Keeping System
DESCRIPTION:
The Lane-Keeping System can help you stay in your lane, even during a moment of distraction. This feature scans your vehicle’s position between the lines in the road ahead and can alert you if you’re starting to edge out of your lane.10
*

TITLE: Lane-Keeping System
DESCRIPTION:
The Lane-Keeping System can help you stay in your lane, even during a moment of distraction. This feature scans your vehicle’s position between the lines in the road ahead and can alert you if you’re starting to edge out of your lane.10
*

TITLE: Voice-Activated Navigation System
DESCRIPTION:
This available feature with SYNC®
 327
 adds pinch-to-zoom capability that can help you stay confidently on course.

TITLE: Voice-Activated Navigation System
DESCRIPTION:
This available feature with SYNC®
 327
 adds pinch-to-zoom capability that can help you stay confidently on course.

TITLE: Auto High-Beam Headlamps
DESCRIPTION: Auto High-Beam Headlamps can sense poor lighting conditions and switch on to light your path ahead. They can even sense oncoming headlights and dim automatically, so you don’t have to worry about blinding other drivers.10

TITLE: Auto High-Beam Headlamps
DESCRIPTION: Auto High-Beam Headlamps can sense poor lighting conditions and switch on to light your path ahead. They can even sense oncoming headlights and dim automatically, so you don’t have to worry about blinding other drivers.10

TITLE:
Available SYNC®
 3
DESCRIPTION:
Smart hardware. Smart software. Smart design. Simple music search, capacitive touchscreen, enhanced voice recognition, and climate control keep your hands on the wheel and your eyes on the road.27
 SYNC®
 3 also brings you the power of Apple CarPlay™
160
 and Android Auto™
 compatibility to your Ford.161

TITLE: FordPass Connect™
DESCRIPTION:
Whether you’re at home, on a family road trip or working remotely, you can stay connected to your Escape and the world with FordPass Connect™
. Use your app to access features like start/stop, lock/unlock, remote start scheduling, vehicle location, fuel levels and mileage. Your FordPass Connect™
-equipped vehicle can also be a Wi-Fi hotspot. Select models feature a 4G LTE Wi-Fi hotspot powered by AT&T. Up to 10 devices can connect at once, and you can use FordPass™
 to keep track of your Wi-Fi data usage. The hotspot can be accessed up to 50 feet outside the vehicle.*

TITLE: WAZE Technology
DESCRIPTION: You can collaborate with other users, outsmarting traffic by sharing information to get the best routes, and receive real-time alerts about accidents, road hazards and traffic jams. You can operate Waze through your vehicle’s touchscreen, as well as use voice commands for hands-free control, helping to keep your eyes on the road.*

TITLE: Ford+Alexa
DESCRIPTION:
When connected to SYNC®
 3 AppLink, Amazon’s cloud-based voice service provides hands-free access to a variety of features and capabilities. You’ll have access to Voice Navigation, Traffic Information, Amazon Prime shopping and can even control your supported Smart Home devices. Alexa also interacts with Google, Apple, & Microsoft calendars as well.*

TITLE: Key by Amazon In-Car Delivery Available With Ford
DESCRIPTION:
Ford is making your life easier in collaboration with Amazon, offering in-car delivery with Key by Amazon for Prime members. Receive Amazon packages delivered securely to your vehicle whether you’re at home, at work or on vacation. Download the Key app and link it with your FordPass™
 app.* Then, simply shop on Amazon.com or the Amazon mobile shopping app for eligible items and select the in-car delivery option at checkout. You’ll receive notifications on the Key app throughout the delivery process. For added peace of mind, the delivery driver is required to double-check the door handle to make sure it is locked when the delivery is completed. All deliveries are backed by the Key by Amazon Happiness Guarantee.

TITLE: Capability to Explore
DESCRIPTION: It’s a big world out there. Escape lets you hit the road and explore it with the choice of three different engines. For helping keeping you in control, there’s also the available All-Wheel Drive Disconnect and standard Selectable Drive Modes.

TITLE: Four-Engine Lineup
DESCRIPTION: The standard 1.5L EcoBoost engine with Auto Start-Stop Technology is coupled with an eight-speed automatic transmission. Auto Start-Stop Technology that can help lower fuel consumption and vehicle emissions during city driving when your vehicle comes to a stop. The engine shuts off and then seamlessly restarts when you step on the accelerator or when your foot leaves the brake pedal.

TITLE: 1.5L EcoBoost® Engine with Auto Start-Stop Technology
DESCRIPTION: The standard 1.5L EcoBoost engine with Auto Start-Stop Technology is coupled with an eight-speed automatic transmission. Auto Start-Stop Technology that can help lower fuel consumption and vehicle emissions during city driving when your vehicle comes to a stop. The engine shuts off and then seamlessly restarts when you step on the accelerator or when your foot leaves the brake pedal.

TITLE: 2.0L EcoBoost® Engine with Auto Start-Stop Technology
DESCRIPTION:
The available 2.0L EcoBoost engine comes with Auto Start-Stop Technology and SelectShift.®
The eight-speed SelectShift transmission offers the convenience of an automatic or the sporty feel of a manual. What’s more, when equipped with the 2.0L EcoBoost®
 Class II Trailer Tow Package, this engine has a maximum towing capacity of 3,500 lbs.

TITLE: Hybrid 2.5L iVCT Atkinson-Cycle I-4 engine
DESCRIPTION: The 2.5L I-4 Atkinson-cycle powertrain features an electronically controlled continuously variable transmission (eCVT) and an 88 kW electric motor. Also, the all-new Escape Hybrid packages its liquid-cooled lithium-ion battery smartly outside of the vehicle below the floor of the second-row seats rather than occupying a significant portion of the cargo area. The briefcase-shaped battery in the standard hybrid measures less than one-third the size of the old Escape Hybrid battery. Standard on all Escape Hybrid* and plug-in hybrid models.**

TITLE: Plug-In 2.5L iVCT Atkinson-Cycle I-4 engine
DESCRIPTION: The 2020 Escape Plug-In Hybrid* has a Level 1/Level 2 AC charging port. Using a 110-volt Level 1 charger, the estimated time to fully charge the battery is 10 to 11 hours. Using a 240-volt Level 2 charger, charge time drops to roughly 3.5 hours. What’s more, the new design of the 2020 Escape allows for the battery to be stored underneath the vehicle, which frees up space in the cabin, offering plug-in customers more room with no humps from the battery.

TITLE: Available AWD Disconnect
DESCRIPTION: Designed to save fuel, All-Wheel Drive Disconnect can disable the rear driveline when the system detects AWD is not needed. This allows only the front wheels to propel the vehicle, reducing drag and the overall energy demands of the drivetrain.

TITLE: Selectable Drive Modes
DESCRIPTION: Designed to help improve your driving experience and handling on varying road surfaces. The different modes are Eco, Sport, Normal, Slippery and Deep Snow/Sand.10 Once selected, each one of these driving modes can modify the electronic stability control system and traction control system without you having to do anything.

TITLE: Normal Mode
DESCRIPTION: For everyday driving. This mode is a perfect balance of excitement, comfort and convenience.

TITLE: Eco Mode
DESCRIPTION: For efficient and responsible driving. This mode helps deliver maximum fuel efficiency and increases driving range.

TITLE: Sport Mode
DESCRIPTION: This mode increases throttle response, provides a sportier steering feel, along with quicker shifting. The suspension also stiffens, with an emphasis on handling and control.

TITLE: Slippery Mode
DESCRIPTION: For firm surfaces covered with loose or slippery material such as ice, water, grass or a thin layer of gravel or sand.

TITLE: Deep Snow/Sand Mode
DESCRIPTION: This mode can help keep your vehicle under control in deep snow or soft dry sand.

TITLE: Towing Capability
DESCRIPTION:
Escape Titanium with its 2.0L EcoBoost®
 engine has a maximum towing capacity of 3,500 lbs. when equipped with the Class II Trailer Tow Package. The standard 1.5L EcoBoost®
 engine, when properly equipped, can tow up to 2,000 lbs. And don’t forget about hybrid capability because when properly equipped, the hybrid* and plug-in hybrid are powered by the 2.5L I-4 and can each tow up to 1,500 lbs.**

TITLE: For Getting Around and Getting It Done
DESCRIPTION: 2020 Escape has been redesigned and fitted with the right available features to get you through your busy schedule. Besides the new interior with plenty of cargo space* and best-in-class second-row legroom,** Escape can also help you park, stay informed, and even open up when you have your hands full.

TITLE: Hands-Free Foot-Activated Liftgate
DESCRIPTION: Thanks to the available hands-free foot-activated liftgate, there’s no need to fumble for keys. Its operation is especially helpful when your arms are full of items like grocery bags. With the Intelligent Access key in your pocket or purse, kick your foot under the bumper and the liftgate opens. You can also adjust the liftgate height, helpful for lower overhangs. Standard on SEL and Titanium.

TITLE: Plenty of Space
DESCRIPTION: More space for more fun. That’s why 2020 Escape has second-row 60/40 split-fold seats and an all-new sliding feature for more cargo space.* Plus, the redesigned interior offers best-in-class second-row legroom with 40.7-inches of personal space.**

TITLE: 12.3-Inch Digital Instrument Cluster
DESCRIPTION: A new way to look at your dash. The available 12.3-inch digital instrument cluster lets you configure the look and function of your driving information.

TITLE: Available Active Park Assist 2.0
DESCRIPTION: Standard on Titanium, available Active Park Assist 2.0 takes parallel or perpendicular parking to an automatic level. Once the feature is engaged by pushing the Active Park Assist button, the system will detect an appropriate parallel or perpendicular parking spot. When the system identifies a parking spot, it will prompt you to come to a complete stop, shift to Neutral, release the brake pedal and hold the Active Park Assist button down; the vehicle does the rest. All steering, shifting, brake and accelerator controls are performed by the system. The system can do the same actions for exiting a parallel parking spot as well.10

TITLE: Rotary Gear Shift Dial
DESCRIPTION: New for 2020, the rotary gear shift dial takes up less room than traditional knobs. This opens up space for more conveniently arranged cupholders, improved bin size, smart storage and a USB port right where you need it.

TITLE:
B&O™
 Sound System by Bang & Olufsen with 10 Speakers
DESCRIPTION: New for 2020. Enjoy your personal sound studio wherever you go. The available B&O Sound System by Bang & Olufsen (standard on Titanium) offers a dynamic, immersive listening experience for everyone on board.

TITLE: Get In. Go. Repeat.
DESCRIPTION: The completely redesigned Escape was built for a life in motion. From the spacious new interior, to the sleek, head-turning lines of the exterior – 2020 Ford Escape was built for adventure on the road and a lifestyle on the go.

TITLE: Redesigned Exterior and Interior
DESCRIPTION: The Ford Escape has a distinctive new look for 2020. Redesigned with sportier lines that give it a premium feel, the attention-grabbing new Escape will change the way you look at every other SUV. Its interior has also been redesigned with all the features and conveniences to help make traveling, and exploring, more comfortable. A new rotary gear shift dial opens space on the center console and helps improve overall front-row comfort. And with the second-row 60/40 split-fold seats with an all-new sliding feature, you can have best-in-class second-row legroom* or slide forward to maximize rear cargo space.**

TITLE: Panoramic Vista Roof®
DESCRIPTION: The available panoramic Vista Roof features a large forward panel that tilts up or opens fully, plus a fixed rear skylight. So whether you’re sitting up front or in back, the Vista Roof lets in natural light. Available on SE, SEL and Titanium.

TITLE: Second-Row Sliding, Seats 60/40 Split-Fold Down
DESCRIPTION: Your life on the go needs both convenience and versatility. That’s why 2020 Escape has second-row 60/40 split-fold seats and an all-new sliding feature for more cargo space* or best-in-class second-row legroom with 40.7 inches of personal space.**

TITLE: SE Sport Premium Package
DESCRIPTION:
A head-turning new look for 2020, the SE Sport Premium Package includes 19-inch Machined-face aluminum wheels with Ebony-painted pockets, black roof-rack rails, ActiveX seating material and a panoramic Vista Roof®
.

TITLE: Get Used to the Attention
DESCRIPTION: With its bold design, Edge naturally gets noticed. From the dynamic grille to the fluid shapes and smooth lines that run the length of its body, the 2020 Edge Titanium Elite will let you arrive in style. It also has a sleek roof, aerodynamic shape and the type of commanding profile that isn’t afraid of turning heads or stepping into the spotlight.

TITLE: Genius in the Details
DESCRIPTION: Edge has always had a bold, powerful look. Confident and athletic from the body, grille, hood and wheels to the LED lamps and available 180-degree camera system, Edge is a design masterpiece.

TITLE: Made for Action
DESCRIPTION:
It’s powered by a 2.7L V6 EcoBoost®
 engine that delivers 335 horsepower and 380 lb.-ft. of torque* coupled with a performance-tuned eight-speed automatic transmission. The 2020 Edge ST has road-gripping all-wheel drive, Ford Performance tuned suspension and race-inspired paddle shifters. Its standard leather-trimmed seats include supportive bolsters that help anchor you in tight turns. Topping it off is a striking grille with gloss black-painted mesh and prominent ST logo.

TITLE: Luxury inside. Style outside.
DESCRIPTION: The overall craftsmanship and attention to detail can be seen both inside and out of Edge Titanium. The interior features a standard leather-wrapped steering wheel and perforated leather-trimmed sport bucket seats. Other smart touches include standard metal-plated accents, mechanical stripe aluminum appliqué, illuminated scuff plates and ambient lighting. The exterior design features a bright beltline molding matched with chrome accents and standard 19-inch wheels. Also available are 20-inch wheels.

TITLE: Stylish Interior Design
DESCRIPTION: You’ll see the attention to detail everywhere you look inside the 2020 Edge. The quality and craftsmanship are reflected in the way that style and everyday usability come together in the modern, refined look and feel of the instrument panel, center stack, door trim, floor console and rotary gear shift dial.

TITLE: Rotary Gear Shift Dial
DESCRIPTION: The rotary gear shift dial takes up less room than traditional gearshifts. This opens up space for more conveniently arranged cupholders, improved bin size, smart storage and a USB port right where you need it.

TITLE: Confidence-Inspiring Technologies
DESCRIPTION:
The 2020 Edge offers the most available driver-assist technologies10
 in its class,15
 to help give you confidence on the road. With sensors and cameras mounted at specific locations on the vehicle, you can be aware of other vehicles and objects that are beside and behind you. For instance, available Enhanced Active Park Assist uses ultrasonic sensors on the front and rear of the vehicle to help you guide your Edge into a suitable parallel or perpendicular parking space.

TITLE: Ford Co-Pilot360™ Technology
DESCRIPTION:
Ford Co-Pilot360™
 is a suite of five standard driver-assist features. In addition to the four highlighted features, Ford Co-Pilot360 also includes Auto High-Beam Headlamps.

TITLE: BLIS® (Blind Spot Information System) with Cross-Traffic Alert
DESCRIPTION: How many times have you tensed up during an attempted lane change on a busy freeway? With BLIS, you won’t have to bother your passenger with “Can I get over?” This feature can help detect and alert you to vehicles in your blind spot, while Cross-Traffic Alert can detect traffic behind you when you’re slowly backing out of a parking spot or driveway.10

TITLE: BLIS® (Blind Spot Information System) with Cross-Traffic Alert
DESCRIPTION: How many times have you tensed up during an attempted lane change on a busy freeway? With BLIS, you won’t have to bother your passenger with “Can I get over?” This feature can help detect and alert you to vehicles in your blind spot, while Cross-Traffic Alert can detect traffic behind you when you’re slowly backing out of a parking spot or driveway.10

TITLE: Lane-Keeping System
DESCRIPTION: It happens. Maybe you’re caught up listening to your favorite podcast or need your morning latte, but you’ve wandered a little too close to the edge of your lane. The Lane-Keeping System can help you stay in your lane, even during a moment of distraction. This smart feature scans your vehicle’s position between the lines in the road ahead and can alert you if you’re starting to edge out of your lane. Having trouble staying on track? After you’ve drifted a few times, you’ll see a coffee cup icon, letting you know it’s time to take a break.10

TITLE: Lane-Keeping System
DESCRIPTION: It happens. Maybe you’re caught up listening to your favorite podcast or need your morning latte, but you’ve wandered a little too close to the edge of your lane. The Lane-Keeping System can help you stay in your lane, even during a moment of distraction. This smart feature scans your vehicle’s position between the lines in the road ahead and can alert you if you’re starting to edge out of your lane. Having trouble staying on track? After you’ve drifted a few times, you’ll see a coffee cup icon, letting you know it’s time to take a break.10

TITLE: Pre-Collision Assist with Automatic Emergency Braking
DESCRIPTION: We should all drive defensively, but sometimes other people’s lack of attention can create a hazard. This feature scans the road ahead and can alert you to potential collisions with vehicles or pedestrians detected in your path. If an impact becomes imminent and you don’t take corrective action, the brakes can apply automatically. But don’t worry—they’ll only activate if they’re needed.10

TITLE: Pre-Collision Assist with Automatic Emergency Braking
DESCRIPTION: We should all drive defensively, but sometimes other people’s lack of attention can create a hazard. This feature scans the road ahead and can alert you to potential collisions with vehicles or pedestrians detected in your path. If an impact becomes imminent and you don’t take corrective action, the brakes can apply automatically. But don’t worry—they’ll only activate if they’re needed.10

TITLE: Auto High-Beam Headlamps
DESCRIPTION: We’ve all been there. Heading into a pitch-black stretch of road and having to turn on the high beams—then forgetting to turn them off again as oncoming traffic approaches. Now, unlit roads, dark peripheries and other low-visibility situations don’t have to catch you off guard. Auto High-Beam Headlamps can sense poor lighting conditions and switch on to light your path ahead. They can even sense oncoming headlights and dim automatically, so you don’t have to worry about blinding other drivers. They can help you keep your focus on the road—and both hands on the wheel.10

TITLE: Auto High-Beam Headlamps
DESCRIPTION: We’ve all been there. Heading into a pitch-black stretch of road and having to turn on the high beams—then forgetting to turn them off again as oncoming traffic approaches. Now, unlit roads, dark peripheries and other low-visibility situations don’t have to catch you off guard. Auto High-Beam Headlamps can sense poor lighting conditions and switch on to light your path ahead. They can even sense oncoming headlights and dim automatically, so you don’t have to worry about blinding other drivers. They can help you keep your focus on the road—and both hands on the wheel.10

TITLE: Rear View Camera
DESCRIPTION: Between glancing in the rearview mirror and craning your neck, backing up requires a little multitasking. So we help make it easier. The rear view camera may not be an extra set of eyes, but it does provide a great view of what’s behind your vehicle. Just make sure to keep the camera lens free of debris (like snow or dust) and you can navigate Reverse with confidence.10

TITLE: Rear View Camera
DESCRIPTION: Between glancing in the rearview mirror and craning your neck, backing up requires a little multitasking. So we help make it easier. The rear view camera may not be an extra set of eyes, but it does provide a great view of what’s behind your vehicle. Just make sure to keep the camera lens free of debris (like snow or dust) and you can navigate Reverse with confidence.10

TITLE: Enhanced Active Park Assist
DESCRIPTION: Never pass up a potential parking space again. Enhanced Active Park Assist makes it easy to nail an impressive park time after time—even in tight parallel or reverse perpendicular spots. All you have to do is activate, shift, accelerate and brake while your vehicle takes care of the rest. This feature also offers Park Out Assist with side-sensing capability, so you can confidently navigate out of a spot when someone’s parked too close to you.10

TITLE: Enhanced Active Park Assist
DESCRIPTION: Never pass up a potential parking space again. Enhanced Active Park Assist makes it easy to nail an impressive park time after time—even in tight parallel or reverse perpendicular spots. All you have to do is activate, shift, accelerate and brake while your vehicle takes care of the rest. This feature also offers Park Out Assist with side-sensing capability, so you can confidently navigate out of a spot when someone’s parked too close to you.10

TITLE: Navigation
DESCRIPTION: Whether it means missing a flight or just losing your cool, a wrong turn can put a dent in your day. But like a sherpa for trips large and small, the Navigation System can help you stay confidently on course. But that’s not all. It can also point you to the nearest gas stations or coffee shops and even suggest places to stop based on your interests.

TITLE: Navigation
DESCRIPTION: Whether it means missing a flight or just losing your cool, a wrong turn can put a dent in your day. But like a sherpa for trips large and small, the Navigation System can help you stay confidently on course. But that’s not all. It can also point you to the nearest gas stations or coffee shops and even suggest places to stop based on your interests.

TITLE: Intuitive Technologies
DESCRIPTION: Features that can help make your time on the road less hectic.

TITLE: SYNC® 3 With Ford+Alexa
DESCRIPTION:
Ford+Alexa brings the amazing capabilities of Amazon Alexa from your home to the road. By using the Ford+Alexa app and connecting via SYNC®
 3 AppLink,®
 you’ll have access to voice navigation, traffic information, Amazon Prime shopping and can even control your supported smart-home devices. Stay connected, from just about anywhere.*

TITLE: B&O Sound System by Bang & Olufsen
DESCRIPTION: Enjoy your personal sound studio, wherever you go. Available B&O Sound System by Bang & Olufsen offers a superior, immersive listening experience for everyone on board.

TITLE: FordPass – A Smarter Way to Move™
DESCRIPTION:
FordPass™ is the one-stop app that can help you move more freely throughout your day.164

Here’s how:



Lock, unlock and start your vehicle remotely*
Use FordPay to conveniently pay for service
Receive key vehicle info and schedule service
Compare fuel prices at stations along your route
Find parking169 ahead of time
Get FordPass help from a friendly FordGuide



These are just some of the great things you can do with FordPass. If you haven’t already, download the FordPass app on the App Store®167 or get it on Google Play™.167

TITLE:
Ford SYNC®
 3 AppLink®
 With Waze
DESCRIPTION: Using Waze inside your Ford vehicle is now easier since the much-loved, crowd-sourced navigation and traffic app is compatible with available SYNC® 3 AppLink.® You can collaborate with other users, outsmarting traffic by sharing information to get the best routes, and receive real-time alerts about accidents, road hazards and traffic jams. Moving Waze to the dash screen allows you to conveniently access the app’s features on a larger display. You can also operate Waze with voice commands for hands-free control, helping to keep your eyes on the road.* Available via iPhone® in Ford vehicles equipped with SYNC 3 with software version 3.0. Waze is also available on Android Auto.™

TITLE: Power, looks and smarts. 2020 Edge has them all.
DESCRIPTION:
Two available engines offer more than enough attitude under the hood – the turbocharged, direct-injection twin-scroll 2.0L EcoBoost,®
 and the standard, athletic 2.7L EcoBoost V6. These engines were designed, engineered and built to provide the power, performance and fuel efficiency* that today’s accelerated lifestyle demands.

TITLE: Power You Can Actually Feel
DESCRIPTION:
Two available engines provide more than enough attitude under the hood – the turbocharged, direct-injection twin-scroll 2.0L EcoBoost®
 engine, and the athletic 2.7L EcoBoost. These engines were designed, engineered and built to provide the power, performance and fuel efficiency* that today’s accelerated lifestyle demands.

TITLE: 335 horsepower | 380 lb.-ft. torque*
DESCRIPTION: Driving the Edge ST is a commanding experience from the feel of its engine to its eye-catching badging.

TITLE: Designed to Excel
DESCRIPTION: Driving the Edge ST is a commanding experience from the feel of its engine to its eye-catching badging.

TITLE: Performance Drive Dynamic
DESCRIPTION: Increased horsepower, performance tuning, unique seats and brakes.

TITLE: ST Performance
DESCRIPTION: The ST model’s 2.7L engine combines power, torque and technology to create a truly commanding driving experience.

TITLE: 2.7L EcoBoost®
DESCRIPTION:
The 2020 Edge ST delivers all the pickup, horsepower and torque you’ll need to keep you in the fast lane. That’s because it’s powered by our dynamic twin-turbo 2.7-liter EcoBoost®

 engine that features a light compact graphite iron engine block and aluminum heads. This lightweight powerhouse can crank out an impressive 335 horsepower and 380 lb.-ft. of torque.* So get behind the wheel of the ST and feel the thrill of a 2.7L EcoBoost — the most powerful gas V6 engine in its class.15

TITLE: Push to Launch.
DESCRIPTION: Put the new Edge ST into Sport mode and a thrilling ST drive experience takes on a new life.

TITLE: Auto Start-Stop Technology
DESCRIPTION:
Auto Start-Stop Technology is standard on SE 2.0L EcoBoost®
 FWD models and can help reduce fuel consumption and vehicle emissions during city driving. When the vehicle comes to a stop, the engine automatically shuts off and then seamlessly restarts when your foot leaves the brake pedal.

TITLE: Eight-Speed Automatic Transmission With Active Warm-Up
DESCRIPTION: You don’t have to know how to drive a manual transmission or learn how to master a clutch to enjoy the sporty feel of shifting gears. Using race-inspired technology, the steering wheel-mounted paddles provide an engaged driving experience by letting you easily and quickly go from gear to gear without taking your hands off the wheel.

TITLE: Capability at Every Turn
DESCRIPTION: The 2020 Ford Edge integrates power, performance and handling with technology that inspires confidence behind the wheel. The original SUV from Ford has the features and capabilities to help you multitask your way through the challenges of career, family and everything else that pulls you in different directions. Give credit to its Intelligent AWD (standard on ST and available on all other models), the electric power-assisted steering and the spacious 39.2 cu. ft. of cargo* room behind the second row.

TITLE: Intelligent All-Wheel Drive (AWD)
DESCRIPTION: Available Intelligent AWD uses sensors to constantly monitor traction, helping you through various types of weather and road conditions. It balances torque between the front and rear wheels to enhance handling and maximize traction, typically before wheelslip can even occur.

TITLE: Available Hassle-Free Charging
DESCRIPTION: Charge your electronics with the wireless charging pad.

TITLE: Hands-Free, Foot-Activated Liftgate
DESCRIPTION: With the Intelligent Access key in your pocket or purse, just give a little kick under the rear bumper and the available hands-free, foot-activated liftgate automatically opens — making it easier to load and unload cargo. You can also adjust the liftgate height, which is helpful for lower overhangs.

TITLE: Standard Rear View Camera with Washer
DESCRIPTION: Know what’s behind your vehicle with the standard Rear View Camera and washer that cleans dirt and debris from the lens when you use your rear windshield washer.

TITLE: Bi-LED Headlamps and Fog Lamps
DESCRIPTION: Making it easy to light the way.

TITLE: Class II Trailer Tow Package With Trailer Sway Control
DESCRIPTION:
Standard on ST, and available on SEL and Titanium, the Class II Trailer Tow Package (AWD required) has a maximum towing capacity of 3,500 pounds.* Trailer sway control helps you tow confidently by automatically determining from the motion of the vehicle if the trailer is swaying.10

 It then takes measures, such as applying precise braking or reducing engine torque, to help keep both the vehicle and the trailer under control.39

TITLE: Comfortable. Even Before You’re Seated.
DESCRIPTION: The Flex accommodates up to seven passengers across three rows of comfortable seating. But comfort is a Flex design feature that begins even before you get seated. With a ground clearance of just 5.9 inches, the Flex is exceptionally easy to get into (and out of). Now add available features such as the the one-touch PowerFold® third-row seat, heated steering wheel, heated/cooled front seats, multipanel Vista Roof® (shown), plus power-assist features. It’s easy to see why the Ford Flex is such a great SUV for family travel or business commuting.

TITLE: Seven-Passenger Seating
DESCRIPTION: The standard seven-passenger seating includes first-row bucket seats, a second-row 60/40 split bench seat, and a 50/50 split bench third-row seat. But the Flex is much more than a comfortable people mover. It can also be a versatile cargo hauler when it’s called upon to be: Fold both rear seats flat and you have up to 83.2 cu. ft. of storage capacity.

TITLE:
PowerFold®
 Third-Row Seat
DESCRIPTION: At the touch of a button, the available PowerFold® third-row seat can be folded for a flat load floor and additional cargo room. In the upright position, it comfortably seats two passengers. Available on the Limited.

TITLE: Second-Row Bucket Seats With Pass-Through
DESCRIPTION: Configure your Flex seating to fit your lifestyle. Flex offers a six-passenger seating option featuring power-assisted, fold-flat 40/40 bucket seats in the second row. These seats have a pass-through feature for convenient access to the third row.

TITLE: Ergonomic Instruments and Controls
DESCRIPTION: Configuring controls where they can be easily reached. Designing instruments so they can be easily read, day or night. This is the science of ergonomics that designers applied meticulously to the instrument panel of the Ford Flex, to make life on the road as easy and comfortable as possible for the most important occupant — the driver.

TITLE: Life on the Road Easy and Enjoyable.
DESCRIPTION: Convenience features make the personal and operational tasks performed every day on the road a lot easier. Among the many conveniences you’ll find in a Ford Flex: Easy-folding rear seats for accessing cargo space. Up to 10 cupholders. Heated outside mirrors. Available Power Liftgate, Intelligent Access with Push-Button Start, plus SYNC® 327 for the latest in Ford hands-free connectivity.

TITLE: Cargo and Storage
DESCRIPTION: Flex provides lots of cargo space. Fold the third-row seats flat for 43.2 cu. ft. of room. Fold the second-row seats flat for up to 83.2 cu. ft. A first-row console, first- and second-row door storage pockets, map pockets behind the first-row seats, third-row storage in the armrests and a large lockable glove compartment allow for storing smaller items. There are also up to 10 cup and bottle holders.

TITLE: Intelligent Access with Push-Button Start
DESCRIPTION: When the available Intelligent Access key is in your pocket or purse near the driver’s door, the Intelligent Access with Push-Button Start system senses the key is nearby. Then, with a simple touch of the door handle, unlock the driver’s door or all the doors. Once inside, just press the brake pedal and then the start button. Shift into gear and go. Standard on SEL and Limited.

TITLE: Rain-Sensing Front Wipers
DESCRIPTION: When activated by the driver, the available rain-sensing wipers turn on automatically when rain or snow is detected on the windshield. You can select the sensitivity level.*

TITLE: Stand Out from the Everyday Crowd.
DESCRIPTION: The shape of the Ford Flex, its cleanly sculpted lines and low-profile stance, is unique in the world of SUVs. One look at the style of the Flex tells you immediately that this vehicle is designed for maximum passenger comfort and cargo-carrying versatility. If it’s your style to stand out from the everyday crowd, drive the SUV that reflects your style of living. Ford Flex.

TITLE: Exterior Style
DESCRIPTION:
Ford Flex is designed unlike any other family-size SUV. Start with one of three Flex models

— SE, SEL and Limited — each uniquely styled and equipped. Now enhance that unique

design, from upgraded wheel trim and outside mirrors to the bold black exterior accents

and unique interior trim included in the Appearance Package (SEL and Limited models).

TITLE: Appearance Package
DESCRIPTION: Make a bold design even bolder with the Appearance Package. Included are an Agate Black roof, Agate Black exterior accents on the mirror caps, grille center bar and liftgate appliqué, plus 20-inch high-gloss black-painted wheels. Inside, enjoy luxury leather-trimmed seats featuring Dark Earth Gray bolsters with Light Earth Gray inserts, plus a leather-wrapped steering wheel with Meteorite Black bezels and unique graphic instrument panel.

TITLE: Flex Wheels
DESCRIPTION:
Flex SEL and Limited models offer attractive upgrades from their standard 18-inch (SEL) and 19-inch (Limited) wheels to stylish 20-inch aluminum designs.

A - 17-inch Sparkle Silver-Painted aluminum, standard on SE

B - 18-inch Sparkle Silver-Painted aluminum, standard on SEL


...more

TITLE: Interior Design
DESCRIPTION: The exterior shape of the Flex speaks volumes about what this family-size SUV does exceptionally well — provide a spacious, comfortable cabin for up to seven passengers, or serve as a vehicle that can haul up to 83.2 cu. ft. of cargo. The seat backs of 60/40 second-row and 50/50 third-row seats can be folded down individually to match the passenger seating and cargo space you need. If your Flex is an SEL or a Limited, you can enhance its spacious comfort with the available multipanel Vista Roof®.

TITLE: Smart From the Start.
DESCRIPTION: Choosing the 2019 Ford Flex is a smart move from the get-go. Its intelligent design provides a low ground clearance for easy entry and exit, a spacious seven-passenger cabin, plus generous cargo space when you need it.* Now Factor in available Ford Co-Pilot 360™ Technology features. 2019 Ford Flex. A smart choice for sure.

TITLE: Active Park Assist
DESCRIPTION:
With available Active Park Assist on the 2019 Ford Flex, you’ll never need to let that perfect parking spot pass you by. This available feature makes it easy to nail an impressive park time after time.10
 Once you activate the system, your Flex will use ultrasonic sensors to measure your distance from nearby vehicles to find an appropriate parking spot and then ask you to stop and accept the system’s assistance. While you simply follow the prompts to shift, accelerate or brake as needed, your Flex will guide you into the space—steering all on its own.

TITLE: Adaptive Cruise Control and Forward Collision Warning with Brake Support
DESCRIPTION: Available Adaptive Cruise Control (ACC) takes conventional cruise control to a new level. It lets you select the speed and distance you want to maintain from the vehicle in front of you. When traffic ahead slows down, you automatically do too, and then later resume the preset speed when traffic picks back up. Getting too close to the vehicle ahead? Forward Collision Warning with Brake Support can alert you to a potential collision: a head-up display simulating red brake lights will flash on your windshield, and an audible alert will sound. If you don’t react in time, the brakes will precharge and increase sensitivity, providing full responsiveness when you do brake.10

TITLE: Command the road.
DESCRIPTION: The power and driving dynamics of the 2020 Explorer come wrapped in an eye-catching design that boasts authentic comfort and style. And because it was built for the active lifestyle, you can also expect an interior space that accommodates the kids, the dog, the sports equipment, camping gear and just about anything else you may need on the road to adventure.

TITLE: Built to make an impression.
DESCRIPTION: The first thing you’ll notice about the 2020 Explorer is its dynamic redesign, including signature headlights with distinctive LED lighting and other strong exterior details. The interior is also crafted with an array of defining attributes. Available Tri-Diamond perforated leather seating surfaces, a hexagon carbon-fiber-lined front dash and a precision-engineered center console and rotary gear shift dial set you up for comfort.

TITLE: ST
DESCRIPTION: Completely redesigned, the ST rounds out its athletic stance with unique ST badging and a bold grille that blends utility with driving performance. Inside, Explorer ST stays true to its performance roots featuring unique leather micro-perforated seating surfaces, City Silver accent stitching and an ST logo. And with the power to match, the ST combines a muscular 3.0L EcoBoost® engine with twin turbos for a powertrain like nothing before it. 400 hp plus 415 lb.-ft. of torque and a top speed of 143 mph make this the most powerful Explorer ever.

TITLE: ST Interior
DESCRIPTION: Enjoy the view from the comfortable Explorer ST leather seating surfaces with micro-perforation and accent stitching.

TITLE: ST Badging
DESCRIPTION: The unique ST badging lets everyone your Explorer blends utility with driving performance.

TITLE: Seating when you need it.
DESCRIPTION:
Available third-row PowerFold®
 seats make it easy to accommodate both passengers and cargo. With the seats up, the Explorer can carry up to seven passengers. When you don’t need seating for seven, fold them down and make room for cargo.

TITLE: E-Z Entry Second Row
DESCRIPTION: Even with a car seat in place, the adaptable E-Z Entry second-row seating makes for easy entrances and exits. There’s no need to get out and help either, your rear seat passengers can navigate their seating arrangement with just the push of a button.

TITLE: Seats that move to fit you.
DESCRIPTION:
Multicontour seats with Active Motion®
 offer an added dose of comfort to the driver and front passenger. This feature allows you to easily position your seat in order to accommodate your preferences. Additionally, the Active Motion component offers five new massage themes for an isolated back massage that focuses on either the upper back, lower back or the pelvic region. The combination of these amenities help prevent fatigue so you can stay fresh on long drives.

TITLE: Adaptive LED Lighting
DESCRIPTION: Standard on the Platinum, adaptive headlamps help guide you through the night, adjusting accordingly with your vehicle. When you turn, the lights turn with you, aiding in your visibility around corners and helping you to more quickly react to what’s around the bend. And with LED lighting in the front and rear of every Explorer, you get superior light quality wherever you go.

TITLE: Adventure-ready technology.
DESCRIPTION:
The 2020 Explorer comes equipped with plenty of smart and capable features to prepare you for any adventure. For added assistance, Explorer comes with Ford Co-Pilot360™
 Technology, a lineup of available driver-assist features designed to enhance your driving experience. You’ll also find that staying connected is easy with features like SYNC®
3 and FordPass Connect™
 on your side.

TITLE: Limited Hybrid with 3.3L Hybrid Powertrain
DESCRIPTION: The 2020 Explorer comes equipped with rear-wheel drive to maximize performance and design. Rear-wheel-drive architecture enables a sportier, more athletic design, improved on and off-road capability and 600 pounds more in maximum towing capacity when properly equipped. Plus, you’re not giving up any cargo capacity, it’s the ultimate pairing of performance and capability in an efficient package.

TITLE: Confidence-driving technology.
DESCRIPTION:
In an increasingly crowded and stressful world, we can all use more confidence on the road. Introducing available features to help keep you prepared and confident behind the wheel.    

Ford Co-Pilot360™ comes standard with:

•BLIS® (Blind Spot Information System)

•Rear View Camera

•Lane-Keeping System

•Automatic Emergency Braking

•Auto High-Beam Headlamps

Additional optional features are available with Ford Co-Pilot360™ Assist+

TITLE: Auto High-Beam Headlamps
DESCRIPTION: With Auto High-Beam Headlamps, unlit roads, dark peripheries and other low-visibility situations don’t have to catch you off guard. Auto High-Beam Headlamps can sense poor lighting conditions and switch on to light your path ahead. They can even sense oncoming headlights and dim automatically so you don’t have to worry about blinding other drivers. As a result, you can keep your focus – and both hands on the wheel.*

TITLE: Rear View Camera
DESCRIPTION: Backing up made easy. The Rear View Camera provides a clear view of what’s behind your vehicle. It also comes with a built-in washer so you can keep the camera lens free of debris (like snow or dust) and navigate Reverse with confidence.*

TITLE: BLIS® (Blind Spot Information System) with Cross-Traffic Alert
DESCRIPTION: BLIS can help detect and alert you to vehicles in your blind spot, while Cross-Traffic Alert can detect traffic behind you when you’re slowly backing out of a parking spot or driveway.*

TITLE: Automatic Emergency Braking with Pre-Collision Assist (AEB)
DESCRIPTION: This feature scans the road ahead and can alert you to potential collisions with vehicles or pedestrians detected in your path. If an impact becomes imminent and you don’t take corrective action, the brakes can apply automatically. But don’t worry – they’ll only activate if they’re needed.*

TITLE: Lane-Keeping System
DESCRIPTION: Lane-Keeping System can help you stay in your lane, even during a moment of distraction. This smart feature scans your vehicle’s position between the lines in the road ahead and can alert you if you’re starting to edge out of your lane. Having trouble staying on track? After you’ve drifted a few times, you’ll see a coffee cup icon, letting you know it’s time to take a break.*

TITLE: BLIS® with available Trailer Coverage
DESCRIPTION: BLIS with available Trailer Coverage can help ease lane-changing anxiety – even with a trailer in tow. It can alert you not only when a vehicle is spotted in your blind spot but also when one is alongside the trailer.*

TITLE: Intelligent Adaptive Cruise Control
DESCRIPTION: Not only does Adaptive Cruise Control (ACC) with Stop-and-Go help you keep pace on your journey, it can also slow down your vehicle if the traffic ahead has stopped or slowed. As soon as things clear, you’ll resume your set speed. And that’s not the only way it levels up your cruise control experience. The added Lane Centering feature even scans lane markings to help you keep your vehicle centered between the lines. With speed sign recognition to go along with it, you’ll always be up to date with your position on the road.*

TITLE: Evasive Steering Assist
DESCRIPTION: This available feature can help make it easier to avoid a potential collision if there’s a slow or stopped vehicle in your path. It doesn’t steer for you, but it can provide extra steering support if the system’s warning goes off and you need to maneuver around the vehicle ahead.*

TITLE: Hill Descent Control™
DESCRIPTION: Steep hills are often tricky to navigate. Available Hill Descent Control can help make the situation easier – and anxiety-free – by doing just what its name says. It helps you maintain a set speed when you’re driving down an incline, by automatically applying the brake when needed.*

TITLE: Your home away from home.
DESCRIPTION:
The 2020 Explorer gives you the tools for seamless adventures. With the help of Innovative Technology, you can sit back and relax, staying connected with features like SYNC®
3 and in-vehicle Wi-Fi hotspot. The added benefit of an available wireless charger gives you a reason to keep your phone on standby while you enjoy some time away in your personal sanctuary.

TITLE: Park with push of a button.
DESCRIPTION: Available Active Park Assist 2.0 makes it easy to nail an impressive park, time after time – even in tight parallel or perpendicular spots. With the push of a button, it will detect an appropriate parking spot and let you know when to stop and put the car in neutral. Once you’re there, all you have to do is hold the Active Park Assist button for the duration of the park and the system does the rest.* This feature also offers park out assist with side-sensing capability so you can confidently navigate out of a spot when someone’s parked too close to you.*

TITLE: Ford+Alexa
DESCRIPTION: Ford+Alexa bring the amazing capabilities of Amazon Alexa from your home to the road. By using the Ford+Alexa app and connecting via available SYNC® 3 AppLink®, you’ll have access to voice navigation, traffic information, Amazon Prime shopping and can even control your supported smart-home devices. Stay connected, from just about anywhere.*

TITLE: Ford and Waze
DESCRIPTION: Using Waze inside your Ford vehicle is now easier since the much-loved, crowd-sourced navigation and traffic app is compatible with available SYNC® 3 AppLink.® You can collaborate with other users, outsmarting traffic by sharing information to get the best routes, and receive real-time alerts about accidents, road hazards and traffic jams. Moving Waze from your phone to the vehicle’s touchscreen allows you to conveniently access the app’s features on a larger display. You can also operate Waze with voice commands for hands-free control, helping to keep your eyes on the road.* Available via iPhone® and on Android Auto.™

TITLE: Prepared for anything.
DESCRIPTION:
The 2020 Explorer is designed to be flexible, so you don't have to sacrifice play for work or family for fun. It gives you the tools to take on any adventure with a number of features that make it easier to do more, like available Michellin®
 self-sealing tires, extra cargo space and a B&O Sound System by Bang & Olufsen.

TITLE: Cargo Space
DESCRIPTION: Explorer delivers when you need configurable cargo space. With the second- and third-row seats in the upright position, you have maximum seating plus enough cargo space to haul the essentials. If you need more room, the Explorer provides up to 87 cubic feet of cargo space behind the first row.*

TITLE: B&O Sound System by Bang & Olufsen
DESCRIPTION: Enjoy the ride with the B&O Sound System by Bang & Olufsen. With this standard 12-speaker system you can get off to an exciting start, appease a car full of kids or simply wind down with your favorite tunes at the end of a long day. If you want to turn it up a notch, there's also the option of a booming 980 watt, 14-speaker system, available with the Premium Technology Package.

TITLE: 360-Degree Camera
DESCRIPTION:
The available 360-degree camera with split-view10
 display uses four cameras (one in the grille, liftgate, and under each of the sideview mirrors) enabling you to see all sides of the vehicle on the center screen. It’s especially useful when maneuvering in tight spaces or on trails. The camera system includes front and rear washers to maximize visibility.

TITLE: Do what you want. And then some.
DESCRIPTION:
The 2020 Explorer is ready for any adventure, thanks to an array of capability-enhancing features. From all-new RWD and 10-speed transmission to the 3.0L EcoBoost®
 engine and available 4WD with Terrain Management System,™
 the Explorer is prepared for the road ahead.

TITLE: Rear-Wheel Drive
DESCRIPTION: The 2020 Explorer comes equipped with RWD to maximize performance and design. Rear-wheel-drive architecture enables a sportier, more athletic design, improved on- and off-road capability and 600 pounds more in maximum towing capacity when properly equipped.

TITLE: Intelligent 4WD with Terrain Management System™
DESCRIPTION: The Terrain Management System can help tackle any adventure with up to seven Selectable Drive Modes through a single easy-to-use dial in the center console. This includes normal, trail, deep snow/sand, slippery, sport, tow/haul and eco mode that each come with special 3D animated graphics in the available 12.3-inch digital cluster. And with Intelligent 4WD, there’s also the added benefit of enhanced control on your day-to-day commute, especially when conditions are rough.

TITLE: 10-Speed Transmission
DESCRIPTION: The 10-speed transmission makes transitioning between speeds a more efficient process, ensuring smooth upshifts and downshifts. Compared to 6-speed, the 10-speed delivers improved overall performance, with enhanced acceleration at the low and mid ranges of the power band.

TITLE: Towing and Trailer Sway Control
DESCRIPTION:
Building on AdvanceTrac®
 with Roll Stability Control,™

 the standard trailer sway control selectively brakes and adjusts engine power to maintain trailer control.39
 The result is stability and control, even when towing large loads. When properly equipped, the Explorer can tow up to 5,600 lbs. The Class III Trailer Tow Package is available with the 2.3L EcoBoost®
 and 3.3L hybrid engines, and comes standard with the 3.0L EcoBoost engine.

TITLE: Sidewind Stabilization
DESCRIPTION: Sidewind stabilization can help counteract heavy wind conditions, helping stabilize the vehicle in situations where you are likely to encounter heavy gusts of wind. This system keeps you from having to fight the wind and put in extra effort when overtaking large trucks, crossing a bridge or simply driving on the open road.*

TITLE: Awe-inspiring power.
DESCRIPTION:
As the backbone of the ST and Platinum powertrains, the available 3.0L EcoBoost®
 V6 engine takes the athletic feel of Explorer a step further. With a 10-speed automatic transmission, twin turbos and direct injection, the Platinum powertrain generates 365 horsepower plus 380 lb.-ft of torque.* The ST takes this muscular engine with twin turbos and combines it with a 10-speed automatic transmission for a powertrain like nothing before it. With 400 horsepower plus 415 lb.-ft. of torque* and a top speed of 143 mph, the 2020 ST is the most powerful Explorer ever.

TITLE: Room With a View. Inside and Out.
DESCRIPTION: 2020 Ford Expedition styling delivers on everything you expect from a full-size SUV – remarkable comfort and capability with an upscale attitude. It’s a design that also speaks volumes about what you’ll discover inside: seating for up to eight occupants, plus loads of cargo volume* in regular- and extended-length MAX models. The Ford Expedition is designed to take its place on the road in a most compelling way.

TITLE: Expedition Style
DESCRIPTION: The functional and eye-catching design of the modern dynamic exterior allows you to go anywhere with confidence and style. On the interior, comfort-enhancing features abound in the 2020 Expedition, like available leather-trimmed heated and ventilated front captain’s chairs, woodgrain-appliqué accents on the center console and media bin door, plus an available leather-wrapped heated steering wheel.

TITLE: Looks Meet Comfort
DESCRIPTION: The functional and eye-catching design of the modern dynamic exterior allows you to go anywhere with confidence and style. On the interior, comfort-enhancing features abound in the 2020 Expedition, like available leather-trimmed heated and ventilated front captain’s chairs, woodgrain-appliqué accents on the center console and media bin door, plus an available leather-wrapped heated steering wheel.

TITLE: Passenger Seating up to Eight
DESCRIPTION: Expedition has plenty of room for all your passengers with standard third-row power reclining seats, available second-row tip-and-slide seats, and best-in-class second- and third-row leg room.* Also, the style and comfort of captain’s chairs are now available on XLT.

TITLE: 2020 King Ranch®
DESCRIPTION: King Ranch® returns with its distinctive center console with Del Rio leather side rails and Ziricote wood veneer, Ebony Del Rio leather door trim with Mesa Del Rio leather armrest and a steering wheel with Del Rio leather and Kingsville stitching. Making its bold return for 2020, the King Ranch also sports Del Rio leather seating that features front heated and ventilated, 10-way power driver and passenger captain’s chairs. These include power lumbar and power recline. The second row has power-folding and heated bucket seats with armrests and tip-and-slide feature. The third has 60/40 PowerFold® seats and power-folding head restraints.

TITLE: There’s Only One King Ranch®
DESCRIPTION: King Ranch® returns with its distinctive center console with Del Rio leather side rails and Ziricote wood veneer, Ebony Del Rio leather door trim with Mesa Del Rio leather armrest and a steering wheel with Del Rio leather and Kingsville stitching. Making its bold return for 2020, the King Ranch also sports Del Rio leather seating that features front heated and ventilated, 10-way power driver and passenger captain’s chairs. These include power lumbar and power recline. The second row has power-folding and heated bucket seats with armrests and tip-and-slide feature. The third has 60/40 PowerFold® seats and power-folding head restraints.

TITLE: The Running W
DESCRIPTION: One-of-a-kind styling can be found both inside and out of the 2020 King Ranch.® Just one of the refined interior looks include Kingsville stitching of the distinctive Running W logo on the seat backs.

TITLE: Undeniably King Ranch®
DESCRIPTION: The unique front door scuff plates are brushed aluminum inserts with King Ranch® logo.

TITLE: Head-Turning Wheels
DESCRIPTION: All the King Ranch® style and comfort ride on 22-inch six-spoke painted machined-face aluminum wheels with Dark Tarnish-painted pockets and unique King Ranch® center cap.

TITLE: Texas Edition
DESCRIPTION: The Texas Edition features unique Texas Edition badging in addition to the Special Edition Package, which includes 22-inch premium black-painted aluminum wheels with continuously controlled damping, 360-Degree Camera with split view and front/rear washer, Cargo Package, Heavy-Duty Trailer Tow Package, Enhanced Active Park Assist with parallel park, park out assist, reverse perpendicular parking, Forward and Reverse and Side Sensing Systems, and LED headlamps and fog lamps.

TITLE: Stealth Edition
DESCRIPTION: It’s time to go the extra mile for style. The Stealth Edition features 22-inch premium black-painted aluminum wheels with continuously controlled damping, five-bar gloss black grille, gloss black power-deployable running boards and tailgate appliqué. There’s also a gloss black-painted rear bumper skid plate and trailer hitch cover, body-color door handles, Expedition lettering on the hood, and unique red interior stitching.

TITLE: Best-in-Class EPA-Estimated Fuel Economy*
DESCRIPTION:
When you look under the hood of the 2020 Expedition Platinum, you’ll see where power and performance meet fuel efficiency. That’s because its 3.5L EcoBoost®
 engine churns out 400 horsepower and 480 lb.-ft. of torque while delivering a best-in-class EPA-estimated rating of 17 city/24 hwy/20 combined mpg.*,**

TITLE:
3.5L EcoBoost®
 Engine
DESCRIPTION:
EcoBoost®
 technology powers performance in the Ford Expedition. Experience impressive responsiveness with the powerful 3.5L EcoBoost, compliments of two technologies: direct injection to help maximize power, and twin air-to-air intercooled turbochargers delivering a surge of on-demand power.

TITLE: Hill Start Assist and Hill Descent Control™
DESCRIPTION:
Hill start assist and Hill Descent Control10
 help keep your vehicle’s power and capability under control, particularly when you’re towing. When you’re stopped on an incline, standard hill start assist automatically works with the anti-lock brakes to hold the vehicle in place for up to two seconds while you move your foot from the brake to the accelerator. On 4WD models, you can activate standard Hill Descent Control so the braking system automatically engages as needed to help keep you in control while descending a steep grade.

TITLE: Smooth and Powerful Ride
DESCRIPTION: Continuously controlled damping can help provide some protection against jarring impacts and costly tire repairs resulting from road imperfections.

TITLE: Continuously Controlled Damping
DESCRIPTION: Continuously controlled damping can help provide some protection against jarring impacts and costly tire repairs resulting from road imperfections.

TITLE: Independent Front and Rear Suspension
DESCRIPTION: For a smooth ride, independent front and rear suspension delivers better handling and cornering with better stability and steering than a solid axle.

TITLE: 10-Speed SelectShift® Automatic Transmission
DESCRIPTION: The 10-speed SelectShift® transmission has a wide ratio span and optimized gear spacing that helps improve responsiveness and performance during acceleration.

TITLE: Large and in Charge
DESCRIPTION: You choose a full-size SUV for all the added capabilities it offers you and your family. Accommodate up to eight passengers in comfort. Haul lots of cargo* when called upon to do so. And do other things as well that many other passenger vehicles can’t, like towing a boat or trailer weighing up to 9,300 pounds, when properly equipped.** Don’t let the good looks fool you – when it comes to delivering the capability you need, the 2020 Ford Expedition is the full-size SUV that can do it all.

TITLE: Best-in-Class Towing With Class-Exclusive Pro Trailer Backup Assist™
DESCRIPTION:
If you need to tow a large trailer, the standard 3.5L EcoBoost®

 engine delivers 375 horsepower and 470 lb.-ft. of torque,* giving the Expedition a best-in-class 9,300-lb. towing capacity** when equipped with the Heavy-Duty Trailer Tow Package.3
 Expedition features trailer sway control working in conjunction with AdvanceTrac®
 with RSC®
 (Roll Stability Control™
). Standard BLIS®
 (Blind Spot Information System) with class-exclusive trailer coverage helps watch your blind spots not only around the vehicle, but around the trailer as well. Available Pro Trailer Backup Assist™

 helps you steer a trailer in reverse with just the turn of a knob. And the limited-slip differential is comforting in slippery conditions. It all adds up to towing made easier.10

TITLE: Available FX4 Off-Road Package
DESCRIPTION: Available on XLT and Limited trims for 2020, the FX4 has all the essentials for your next off-road adventure. Special features include a 3.73 electronic limited-slip differential, premium off-road shocks, two-speed automatic 4WD with neutral towing capability, a heavy-duty radiator, underbody fuel tank protection, skid plates, 18-inch Magnetic-painted cast-aluminum wheels, all-terrain OWL tires, platform chrome-plated running boards, front- and second-row floor liners and an FX4 badge. A 360-Degree Camera is a new addition for 2020.*

TITLE: Intelligent 4WD With Terrain Management System™
DESCRIPTION:
Standard on Intelligent 4WD, Expedition's easy-to-use Terrain Management System™
 lets customers select from seven special drive modes that help Expedition automatically adapt to different road conditions. The drive modes include Normal for around-town driving, Sport for more spirited trips, Tow/Haul for improved towing and hauling performance, Eco for enhanced fuel economy, Grass/Gravel/Snow for loose terrain, Sand for low-traction situations, and Mud/Ruts for uneven surfaces. Expedition drivers also can manually select either 2WD or 4WD modes in a given drive mode, depending on their preferences and the terrain.
