TITLE: Smart Tech. Intelligent Design.
DESCRIPTION:
The 2020 Ford Fusion empowers, delights and helps keep you connected. Available features include the voice-activated SYNC®
 327
 system and SiriusXM®
 Radio,34
 your all-access pass to a wide array of entertainment. And with FordPass Connect™
171
 now standard, you can enjoy an in-vehicle 4G LTE Wi-Fi hotspot. Plus, with standard Ford Co-Pilot360™

, you’re benefited by a suite of driver-assist features designed to help keep you in command from the driveway to the highway.10

TITLE: Confidence-Driving Technology
DESCRIPTION:
Standard Ford Co-Pilot360™

 driver-assist features can help you navigate our increasingly distracting and crowded roads.10

TITLE: Ford Co-Pilot360™
DESCRIPTION:
This standard suite of driver-assist features includes:

• BLIS® (Blind Spot Information System) with Cross-Traffic Alert

• Lane-Keeping System

• Rear View Camera

• Auto High-Beam Headlamps

• Pre-Collision Assist with Automatic Emergency Braking

TITLE: Ford Co-Pilot360™
DESCRIPTION:
This standard suite of driver-assist features includes:

• BLIS® (Blind Spot Information System) with Cross-Traffic Alert

• Lane-Keeping System

• Rear View Camera

• Auto High-Beam Headlamps

• Pre-Collision Assist with Automatic Emergency Braking

TITLE:
BLIS®
 (Blind Spot Information System) With Cross-Traffic Alert
DESCRIPTION:
How many times have you tensed up during an attempted lane change on a busy freeway? With BLIS®

, you don’t have to bother your passenger with “Can I get over?” This feature can help alert you to vehicles in your blind spot, while Cross-Traffic Alert can detect traffic behind you when you’re slowly backing out of a parking spot or driveway.10

TITLE:
BLIS®
 (Blind Spot Information System) With Cross-Traffic Alert
DESCRIPTION:
How many times have you tensed up during an attempted lane change on a busy freeway? With BLIS®

, you don’t have to bother your passenger with “Can I get over?” This feature can help alert you to vehicles in your blind spot, while Cross-Traffic Alert can detect traffic behind you when you’re slowly backing out of a parking spot or driveway.10

TITLE: Lane-Keeping System
DESCRIPTION: It happens. Maybe you’re caught up listening to your favorite podcast or need your morning latte, but you’ve wandered a little too close to the edge of your lane. Luckily, the Lane-Keeping System can help you stay in your lane, even during a moment of distraction.* This smart feature scans your vehicle’s position between the lines in the road ahead and can alert you if you’re starting to edge out of your lane. Having trouble staying on track? After you’ve drifted a few times, a coffee cup icon will appear, letting you know it’s time to take a break.10

TITLE: Lane-Keeping System
DESCRIPTION: It happens. Maybe you’re caught up listening to your favorite podcast or need your morning latte, but you’ve wandered a little too close to the edge of your lane. Luckily, the Lane-Keeping System can help you stay in your lane, even during a moment of distraction.* This smart feature scans your vehicle’s position between the lines in the road ahead and can alert you if you’re starting to edge out of your lane. Having trouble staying on track? After you’ve drifted a few times, a coffee cup icon will appear, letting you know it’s time to take a break.10

TITLE: Rear View Camera
DESCRIPTION: Between glancing in the rearview mirror and craning your neck, backing up requires a little multitasking. So we help make it easier. The Rear View Camera provides a great view of what’s behind your vehicle so you can navigate Reverse with more confidence.10

TITLE: Rear View Camera
DESCRIPTION: Between glancing in the rearview mirror and craning your neck, backing up requires a little multitasking. So we help make it easier. The Rear View Camera provides a great view of what’s behind your vehicle so you can navigate Reverse with more confidence.10

TITLE: Auto High-Beam Headlamps
DESCRIPTION: We’ve all been there. Heading into a pitch-black stretch of road and having to turn on the high beams – then forgetting to turn them off again as oncoming traffic approaches. Now, unlit roads, dark peripheries and other low-visibility situations don’t have to catch you off guard. Auto High-Beam Headlamps can sense poor lighting conditions and switch on to light your path ahead. They can even sense oncoming headlights and dim automatically so you don’t have to worry about blinding other drivers. So you can keep your focus – and both hands on the wheel.10

TITLE: Auto High-Beam Headlamps
DESCRIPTION: We’ve all been there. Heading into a pitch-black stretch of road and having to turn on the high beams – then forgetting to turn them off again as oncoming traffic approaches. Now, unlit roads, dark peripheries and other low-visibility situations don’t have to catch you off guard. Auto High-Beam Headlamps can sense poor lighting conditions and switch on to light your path ahead. They can even sense oncoming headlights and dim automatically so you don’t have to worry about blinding other drivers. So you can keep your focus – and both hands on the wheel.10

TITLE: Pre-Collision Assist With Automatic Emergency Braking
DESCRIPTION:
We should all drive defensively, but sometimes other people’s lack of attention can create a hazard. This feature scans the road ahead and can alert you to potential collisions with vehicles or pedestrians detected in your path.* If an impact becomes imminent and you don’t take corrective action, the brakes can apply automatically.10
 But don’t worry – they’ll only activate if they’re needed.

TITLE: Pre-Collision Assist With Automatic Emergency Braking
DESCRIPTION:
We should all drive defensively, but sometimes other people’s lack of attention can create a hazard. This feature scans the road ahead and can alert you to potential collisions with vehicles or pedestrians detected in your path.* If an impact becomes imminent and you don’t take corrective action, the brakes can apply automatically.10
 But don’t worry – they’ll only activate if they’re needed.

TITLE: FordPass Connect™
DESCRIPTION:
With FordPass Connect™
, drivers and passengers can enjoy an in-vehicle 4G LTE Wi-Fi hotspot powered by AT&T. Up to 10 devices can connect at once, and you can use FordPass™
 to keep track of your Wi-Fi data usage. Also, you can access the hotspot from up to 50 feet outside the vehicle.*

TITLE: Smart Technology
DESCRIPTION: Connect, navigate and discover with smart technology. Ford puts you quickly and easily in touch with your world through available smartphone apps, an in-vehicle touchscreen and voice-activated technology.27

TITLE:
SiriusXM®
 Radio
DESCRIPTION:
Enjoy over 150 channels, including all kinds of commercial-free music, plus sports, news, talk, comedy and entertainment – all at the press of a button. And with SYNC®

, pause and rewind content on SiriusXM channels with the Replay feature and never miss your favorite artist, song or sports team by using the Alert feature.34

TITLE: Ford+Alexa, a match made in tech heaven.
DESCRIPTION: Ford+Alexa brings the amazing capabilities of Amazon Alexa from your home to the road. By using the Ford+Alexa app and connecting via available SYNC® 3 AppLink®, you’ll have access to voice navigation, traffic information, Amazon Prime shopping and can even control your supported smart-home devices. Stay connected, from just about anywhere.*

TITLE: Ford and Waze
DESCRIPTION: Using Waze inside your Ford vehicle is now easier since the much-loved, crowd-sourced navigation and traffic app is compatible with available SYNC® 3 AppLink®. You can collaborate with other users, outsmarting traffic by sharing information to get the best routes, and receive real-time alerts about accidents, road hazards and traffic jams. Moving Waze from your phone to the vehicle’s touchscreen allows you to conveniently access the app’s features on a larger display. You can also operate Waze with voice commands for hands-free control, helping to keep your eyes on the road.* Available via iPhone® and on Android Auto™.

TITLE:
SYNC®
 3
DESCRIPTION:
SYNC®

 3 is our easy-to-use, responsive voice-activated technology. Experience the capacitive touchscreen with impressive responsiveness. Locate your favorite restaurants with simple destination entry via the available navigation. You’ll also find a sleek user-friendly interface to help you connect to and control your smartphone.27
 SYNC®
 3 also brings the power of Apple CarPlay™
161
 and Android Auto™ compatibility to your Ford.161

TITLE: Voice-Activated Touchscreen Navigation System
DESCRIPTION: Like a Sherpa for trips large and small, the available Navigation System can help you stay confidently on course. And with an included five-year prepaid SiriusXM Traffic and Travel Link trial subscription, you can use it to get gas station locations and prices, weather forecasts and even sports scores.34

TITLE: Lane-Keeping System
DESCRIPTION: It happens. Maybe you’re caught up listening to your favorite podcast or need your morning latte, but you’ve wandered a little too close to the edge of your lane. Luckily, the Lane-Keeping System can help you stay in your lane, even during a moment of distraction.* This smart feature scans your vehicle’s position between the lines in the road ahead and can alert you if you’re starting to edge out of your lane. Having trouble staying on track? After you’ve drifted a few times, a coffee cup icon will appear, letting you know it’s time to take a break.10

TITLE: Lane-Keeping System
DESCRIPTION: It happens. Maybe you’re caught up listening to your favorite podcast or need your morning latte, but you’ve wandered a little too close to the edge of your lane. Luckily, the Lane-Keeping System can help you stay in your lane, even during a moment of distraction.* This smart feature scans your vehicle’s position between the lines in the road ahead and can alert you if you’re starting to edge out of your lane. Having trouble staying on track? After you’ve drifted a few times, a coffee cup icon will appear, letting you know it’s time to take a break.10

TITLE: Rear View Camera
DESCRIPTION: Between glancing in the rearview mirror and craning your neck, backing up requires a little multitasking. So we help make it easier. The Rear View Camera provides a great view of what’s behind your vehicle so you can navigate Reverse with more confidence.10

TITLE: Rear View Camera
DESCRIPTION: Between glancing in the rearview mirror and craning your neck, backing up requires a little multitasking. So we help make it easier. The Rear View Camera provides a great view of what’s behind your vehicle so you can navigate Reverse with more confidence.10

TITLE: Auto High-Beam Headlamps
DESCRIPTION: We’ve all been there. Heading into a pitch-black stretch of road and having to turn on the high beams – then forgetting to turn them off again as oncoming traffic approaches. Now, unlit roads, dark peripheries and other low-visibility situations don’t have to catch you off guard. Auto High-Beam Headlamps can sense poor lighting conditions and switch on to light your path ahead. They can even sense oncoming headlights and dim automatically so you don’t have to worry about blinding other drivers. So you can keep your focus – and both hands on the wheel.10

TITLE: Auto High-Beam Headlamps
DESCRIPTION: We’ve all been there. Heading into a pitch-black stretch of road and having to turn on the high beams – then forgetting to turn them off again as oncoming traffic approaches. Now, unlit roads, dark peripheries and other low-visibility situations don’t have to catch you off guard. Auto High-Beam Headlamps can sense poor lighting conditions and switch on to light your path ahead. They can even sense oncoming headlights and dim automatically so you don’t have to worry about blinding other drivers. So you can keep your focus – and both hands on the wheel.10

TITLE: Pre-Collision Assist With Automatic Emergency Braking
DESCRIPTION:
We should all drive defensively, but sometimes other people’s lack of attention can create a hazard. This feature scans the road ahead and can alert you to potential collisions with vehicles or pedestrians detected in your path.* If an impact becomes imminent and you don’t take corrective action, the brakes can apply automatically.10
 But don’t worry – they’ll only activate if they’re needed.

TITLE: Pre-Collision Assist With Automatic Emergency Braking
DESCRIPTION:
We should all drive defensively, but sometimes other people’s lack of attention can create a hazard. This feature scans the road ahead and can alert you to potential collisions with vehicles or pedestrians detected in your path.* If an impact becomes imminent and you don’t take corrective action, the brakes can apply automatically.10
 But don’t worry – they’ll only activate if they’re needed.

TITLE: FordPass Connect™
DESCRIPTION:
With FordPass Connect™
, drivers and passengers can enjoy an in-vehicle 4G LTE Wi-Fi hotspot powered by AT&T. Up to 10 devices can connect at once, and you can use FordPass™
 to keep track of your Wi-Fi data usage. Also, you can access the hotspot from up to 50 feet outside the vehicle.*

TITLE: Smart Technology
DESCRIPTION: Connect, navigate and discover with smart technology. Ford puts you quickly and easily in touch with your world through available smartphone apps, an in-vehicle touchscreen and voice-activated technology.27

TITLE:
SiriusXM®
 Radio
DESCRIPTION:
Enjoy over 150 channels, including all kinds of commercial-free music, plus sports, news, talk, comedy and entertainment – all at the press of a button. And with SYNC®

, pause and rewind content on SiriusXM channels with the Replay feature and never miss your favorite artist, song or sports team by using the Alert feature.34

TITLE: Ford+Alexa, a match made in tech heaven.
DESCRIPTION: Ford+Alexa brings the amazing capabilities of Amazon Alexa from your home to the road. By using the Ford+Alexa app and connecting via available SYNC® 3 AppLink®, you’ll have access to voice navigation, traffic information, Amazon Prime shopping and can even control your supported smart-home devices. Stay connected, from just about anywhere.*

TITLE: Ford and Waze
DESCRIPTION: Using Waze inside your Ford vehicle is now easier since the much-loved, crowd-sourced navigation and traffic app is compatible with available SYNC® 3 AppLink®. You can collaborate with other users, outsmarting traffic by sharing information to get the best routes, and receive real-time alerts about accidents, road hazards and traffic jams. Moving Waze from your phone to the vehicle’s touchscreen allows you to conveniently access the app’s features on a larger display. You can also operate Waze with voice commands for hands-free control, helping to keep your eyes on the road.* Available via iPhone® and on Android Auto™.

TITLE:
SYNC®
 3
DESCRIPTION:
SYNC®

 3 is our easy-to-use, responsive voice-activated technology. Experience the capacitive touchscreen with impressive responsiveness. Locate your favorite restaurants with simple destination entry via the available navigation. You’ll also find a sleek user-friendly interface to help you connect to and control your smartphone.27
 SYNC®
 3 also brings the power of Apple CarPlay™
161
 and Android Auto™ compatibility to your Ford.161

TITLE: Voice-Activated Touchscreen Navigation System
DESCRIPTION: Like a Sherpa for trips large and small, the available Navigation System can help you stay confidently on course. And with an included five-year prepaid SiriusXM Traffic and Travel Link trial subscription, you can use it to get gas station locations and prices, weather forecasts and even sports scores.34

TITLE: Command the road.
DESCRIPTION: The power and driving dynamics of the 2020 Explorer come wrapped in an eye-catching design that boasts authentic comfort and style. And because it was built for the active lifestyle, you can also expect an interior space that accommodates the kids, the dog, the sports equipment, camping gear and just about anything else you may need on the road to adventure.

TITLE: Built to make an impression.
DESCRIPTION: The first thing you’ll notice about the 2020 Explorer is its dynamic redesign, including signature headlights with distinctive LED lighting and other strong exterior details. The interior is also crafted with an array of defining attributes. Available Tri-Diamond perforated leather seating surfaces, a hexagon carbon-fiber-lined front dash and a precision-engineered center console and rotary gear shift dial set you up for comfort.

TITLE: ST
DESCRIPTION: Completely redesigned, the ST rounds out its athletic stance with unique ST badging and a bold grille that blends utility with driving performance. Inside, Explorer ST stays true to its performance roots featuring unique leather micro-perforated seating surfaces, City Silver accent stitching and an ST logo. And with the power to match, the ST combines a muscular 3.0L EcoBoost® engine with twin turbos for a powertrain like nothing before it. 400 hp plus 415 lb.-ft. of torque and a top speed of 143 mph make this the most powerful Explorer ever.

TITLE: ST Interior
DESCRIPTION: Enjoy the view from the comfortable Explorer ST leather seating surfaces with micro-perforation and accent stitching.

TITLE: ST Badging
DESCRIPTION: The unique ST badging lets everyone your Explorer blends utility with driving performance.

TITLE: Seating when you need it.
DESCRIPTION:
Available third-row PowerFold®
 seats make it easy to accommodate both passengers and cargo. With the seats up, the Explorer can carry up to seven passengers. When you don’t need seating for seven, fold them down and make room for cargo.

TITLE: E-Z Entry Second Row
DESCRIPTION: Even with a car seat in place, the adaptable E-Z Entry second-row seating makes for easy entrances and exits. There’s no need to get out and help either, your rear seat passengers can navigate their seating arrangement with just the push of a button.

TITLE: Seats that move to fit you.
DESCRIPTION:
Multicontour seats with Active Motion®
 offer an added dose of comfort to the driver and front passenger. This feature allows you to easily position your seat in order to accommodate your preferences. Additionally, the Active Motion component offers five new massage themes for an isolated back massage that focuses on either the upper back, lower back or the pelvic region. The combination of these amenities help prevent fatigue so you can stay fresh on long drives.

TITLE: Adaptive LED Lighting
DESCRIPTION: Standard on the Platinum, adaptive headlamps help guide you through the night, adjusting accordingly with your vehicle. When you turn, the lights turn with you, aiding in your visibility around corners and helping you to more quickly react to what’s around the bend. And with LED lighting in the front and rear of every Explorer, you get superior light quality wherever you go.

TITLE: Adventure-ready technology.
DESCRIPTION:
The 2020 Explorer comes equipped with plenty of smart and capable features to prepare you for any adventure. For added assistance, Explorer comes with Ford Co-Pilot360™
 Technology, a lineup of available driver-assist features designed to enhance your driving experience. You’ll also find that staying connected is easy with features like SYNC®
3 and FordPass Connect™
 on your side.

TITLE: Limited Hybrid with 3.3L Hybrid Powertrain
DESCRIPTION: The 2020 Explorer comes equipped with rear-wheel drive to maximize performance and design. Rear-wheel-drive architecture enables a sportier, more athletic design, improved on and off-road capability and 600 pounds more in maximum towing capacity when properly equipped. Plus, you’re not giving up any cargo capacity, it’s the ultimate pairing of performance and capability in an efficient package.

TITLE: Confidence-driving technology.
DESCRIPTION:
In an increasingly crowded and stressful world, we can all use more confidence on the road. Introducing available features to help keep you prepared and confident behind the wheel.    

Ford Co-Pilot360™ comes standard with:

•BLIS® (Blind Spot Information System)

•Rear View Camera

•Lane-Keeping System

•Automatic Emergency Braking

•Auto High-Beam Headlamps

Additional optional features are available with Ford Co-Pilot360™ Assist+

TITLE: Auto High-Beam Headlamps
DESCRIPTION: With Auto High-Beam Headlamps, unlit roads, dark peripheries and other low-visibility situations don’t have to catch you off guard. Auto High-Beam Headlamps can sense poor lighting conditions and switch on to light your path ahead. They can even sense oncoming headlights and dim automatically so you don’t have to worry about blinding other drivers. As a result, you can keep your focus – and both hands on the wheel.*

TITLE: Rear View Camera
DESCRIPTION: Backing up made easy. The Rear View Camera provides a clear view of what’s behind your vehicle. It also comes with a built-in washer so you can keep the camera lens free of debris (like snow or dust) and navigate Reverse with confidence.*

TITLE: BLIS® (Blind Spot Information System) with Cross-Traffic Alert
DESCRIPTION: BLIS can help detect and alert you to vehicles in your blind spot, while Cross-Traffic Alert can detect traffic behind you when you’re slowly backing out of a parking spot or driveway.*

TITLE: Automatic Emergency Braking with Pre-Collision Assist (AEB)
DESCRIPTION: This feature scans the road ahead and can alert you to potential collisions with vehicles or pedestrians detected in your path. If an impact becomes imminent and you don’t take corrective action, the brakes can apply automatically. But don’t worry – they’ll only activate if they’re needed.*

TITLE: Lane-Keeping System
DESCRIPTION: Lane-Keeping System can help you stay in your lane, even during a moment of distraction. This smart feature scans your vehicle’s position between the lines in the road ahead and can alert you if you’re starting to edge out of your lane. Having trouble staying on track? After you’ve drifted a few times, you’ll see a coffee cup icon, letting you know it’s time to take a break.*

TITLE: BLIS® with available Trailer Coverage
DESCRIPTION: BLIS with available Trailer Coverage can help ease lane-changing anxiety – even with a trailer in tow. It can alert you not only when a vehicle is spotted in your blind spot but also when one is alongside the trailer.*

TITLE: Intelligent Adaptive Cruise Control
DESCRIPTION: Not only does Adaptive Cruise Control (ACC) with Stop-and-Go help you keep pace on your journey, it can also slow down your vehicle if the traffic ahead has stopped or slowed. As soon as things clear, you’ll resume your set speed. And that’s not the only way it levels up your cruise control experience. The added Lane Centering feature even scans lane markings to help you keep your vehicle centered between the lines. With speed sign recognition to go along with it, you’ll always be up to date with your position on the road.*

TITLE: Evasive Steering Assist
DESCRIPTION: This available feature can help make it easier to avoid a potential collision if there’s a slow or stopped vehicle in your path. It doesn’t steer for you, but it can provide extra steering support if the system’s warning goes off and you need to maneuver around the vehicle ahead.*

TITLE: Hill Descent Control™
DESCRIPTION: Steep hills are often tricky to navigate. Available Hill Descent Control can help make the situation easier – and anxiety-free – by doing just what its name says. It helps you maintain a set speed when you’re driving down an incline, by automatically applying the brake when needed.*

TITLE: Your home away from home.
DESCRIPTION:
The 2020 Explorer gives you the tools for seamless adventures. With the help of Innovative Technology, you can sit back and relax, staying connected with features like SYNC®
3 and in-vehicle Wi-Fi hotspot. The added benefit of an available wireless charger gives you a reason to keep your phone on standby while you enjoy some time away in your personal sanctuary.

TITLE: Park with push of a button.
DESCRIPTION: Available Active Park Assist 2.0 makes it easy to nail an impressive park, time after time – even in tight parallel or perpendicular spots. With the push of a button, it will detect an appropriate parking spot and let you know when to stop and put the car in neutral. Once you’re there, all you have to do is hold the Active Park Assist button for the duration of the park and the system does the rest.* This feature also offers park out assist with side-sensing capability so you can confidently navigate out of a spot when someone’s parked too close to you.*

TITLE: Ford+Alexa
DESCRIPTION: Ford+Alexa bring the amazing capabilities of Amazon Alexa from your home to the road. By using the Ford+Alexa app and connecting via available SYNC® 3 AppLink®, you’ll have access to voice navigation, traffic information, Amazon Prime shopping and can even control your supported smart-home devices. Stay connected, from just about anywhere.*

TITLE: Ford and Waze
DESCRIPTION: Using Waze inside your Ford vehicle is now easier since the much-loved, crowd-sourced navigation and traffic app is compatible with available SYNC® 3 AppLink.® You can collaborate with other users, outsmarting traffic by sharing information to get the best routes, and receive real-time alerts about accidents, road hazards and traffic jams. Moving Waze from your phone to the vehicle’s touchscreen allows you to conveniently access the app’s features on a larger display. You can also operate Waze with voice commands for hands-free control, helping to keep your eyes on the road.* Available via iPhone® and on Android Auto.™

TITLE: Prepared for anything.
DESCRIPTION:
The 2020 Explorer is designed to be flexible, so you don't have to sacrifice play for work or family for fun. It gives you the tools to take on any adventure with a number of features that make it easier to do more, like available Michellin®
 self-sealing tires, extra cargo space and a B&O Sound System by Bang & Olufsen.

TITLE: Cargo Space
DESCRIPTION: Explorer delivers when you need configurable cargo space. With the second- and third-row seats in the upright position, you have maximum seating plus enough cargo space to haul the essentials. If you need more room, the Explorer provides up to 87 cubic feet of cargo space behind the first row.*

TITLE: B&O Sound System by Bang & Olufsen
DESCRIPTION: Enjoy the ride with the B&O Sound System by Bang & Olufsen. With this standard 12-speaker system you can get off to an exciting start, appease a car full of kids or simply wind down with your favorite tunes at the end of a long day. If you want to turn it up a notch, there's also the option of a booming 980 watt, 14-speaker system, available with the Premium Technology Package.

TITLE: 360-Degree Camera
DESCRIPTION:
The available 360-degree camera with split-view10
 display uses four cameras (one in the grille, liftgate, and under each of the sideview mirrors) enabling you to see all sides of the vehicle on the center screen. It’s especially useful when maneuvering in tight spaces or on trails. The camera system includes front and rear washers to maximize visibility.

TITLE: Do what you want. And then some.
DESCRIPTION:
The 2020 Explorer is ready for any adventure, thanks to an array of capability-enhancing features. From all-new RWD and 10-speed transmission to the 3.0L EcoBoost®
 engine and available 4WD with Terrain Management System,™
 the Explorer is prepared for the road ahead.

TITLE: Rear-Wheel Drive
DESCRIPTION: The 2020 Explorer comes equipped with RWD to maximize performance and design. Rear-wheel-drive architecture enables a sportier, more athletic design, improved on- and off-road capability and 600 pounds more in maximum towing capacity when properly equipped.

TITLE: Intelligent 4WD with Terrain Management System™
DESCRIPTION: The Terrain Management System can help tackle any adventure with up to seven Selectable Drive Modes through a single easy-to-use dial in the center console. This includes normal, trail, deep snow/sand, slippery, sport, tow/haul and eco mode that each come with special 3D animated graphics in the available 12.3-inch digital cluster. And with Intelligent 4WD, there’s also the added benefit of enhanced control on your day-to-day commute, especially when conditions are rough.

TITLE: 10-Speed Transmission
DESCRIPTION: The 10-speed transmission makes transitioning between speeds a more efficient process, ensuring smooth upshifts and downshifts. Compared to 6-speed, the 10-speed delivers improved overall performance, with enhanced acceleration at the low and mid ranges of the power band.

TITLE: Towing and Trailer Sway Control
DESCRIPTION:
Building on AdvanceTrac®
 with Roll Stability Control,™

 the standard trailer sway control selectively brakes and adjusts engine power to maintain trailer control.39
 The result is stability and control, even when towing large loads. When properly equipped, the Explorer can tow up to 5,600 lbs. The Class III Trailer Tow Package is available with the 2.3L EcoBoost®
 and 3.3L hybrid engines, and comes standard with the 3.0L EcoBoost engine.

TITLE: Sidewind Stabilization
DESCRIPTION: Sidewind stabilization can help counteract heavy wind conditions, helping stabilize the vehicle in situations where you are likely to encounter heavy gusts of wind. This system keeps you from having to fight the wind and put in extra effort when overtaking large trucks, crossing a bridge or simply driving on the open road.*

TITLE: Awe-inspiring power.
DESCRIPTION:
As the backbone of the ST and Platinum powertrains, the available 3.0L EcoBoost®
 V6 engine takes the athletic feel of Explorer a step further. With a 10-speed automatic transmission, twin turbos and direct injection, the Platinum powertrain generates 365 horsepower plus 380 lb.-ft of torque.* The ST takes this muscular engine with twin turbos and combines it with a 10-speed automatic transmission for a powertrain like nothing before it. With 400 horsepower plus 415 lb.-ft. of torque* and a top speed of 143 mph, the 2020 ST is the most powerful Explorer ever.

TITLE: Confidence on the Road to Adventure
DESCRIPTION:
The Ford Escape for 2020 offers a wide range of available technologies to help keep you aware of your surroundings and ever-changing traffic conditions.10
 From the driveway to the highway, the standard Ford Co-Pilot360™
 has you covered. Ford Co-Pilot360™
 is an advanced suite of standard driver-assist technologies to help keep you connected and confident as you hit the road as part of your diverse, adventurous and active lifestyle.

TITLE:
Ford Co-Pilot360™
 Technology
DESCRIPTION:
Ford Co-Pilot360™
 is an advanced suite of standard driver-assist technologies that includes BLIS®

 with Cross Traffic Alert, Pre-Collision Assist with Automatic Emergency Braking, Auto High-Beam Headlamps, Lane-Keeping System and Rear View Camera. Ford Escape also makes additional technology available that is designed to help keep you in command, from the driveway to the highway.10

TITLE: Pre-Collision Assist with Automatic Emergency Braking
DESCRIPTION: If the system’s sensors detect a potential collision with a car or pedestrian in front of you, a warning flashes and an audible alert sounds.* Also, the brakes will precharge and increase brake-assist sensitivity to provide full responsiveness when you do brake. If you do not take corrective action and a collision is imminent, the brakes can automatically apply.

TITLE: Pre-Collision Assist with Automatic Emergency Braking
DESCRIPTION: If the system’s sensors detect a potential collision with a car or pedestrian in front of you, a warning flashes and an audible alert sounds.* Also, the brakes will precharge and increase brake-assist sensitivity to provide full responsiveness when you do brake. If you do not take corrective action and a collision is imminent, the brakes can automatically apply.

TITLE:
BLIS®
 with Cross-Traffic Alert
DESCRIPTION: This feature helps increase your awareness where you need it most. BLIS (Blind Spot Information System) with Cross-Traffic Alert uses radar to identify if a vehicle is detected in your blind spot and alerts you with an indicator light in the appropriate exterior mirror. Cross-Traffic Alert also uses radar to watch for traffic behind you as you’re slowly backing out of a parking spot or driveway. If cross-traffic sensors detect a vehicle approaching, you will be audibly and visually alerted.

TITLE:
BLIS®
 with Cross-Traffic Alert
DESCRIPTION: This feature helps increase your awareness where you need it most. BLIS (Blind Spot Information System) with Cross-Traffic Alert uses radar to identify if a vehicle is detected in your blind spot and alerts you with an indicator light in the appropriate exterior mirror. Cross-Traffic Alert also uses radar to watch for traffic behind you as you’re slowly backing out of a parking spot or driveway. If cross-traffic sensors detect a vehicle approaching, you will be audibly and visually alerted.

TITLE: Available Active Park Assist 2.0
DESCRIPTION: Parking made easy — even in tight parallel or reverse perpendicular spots. When engaged, it can help locate a potential spot. Then all you have to do is brake to a complete stop, shift into Neutral and hold down the Active Park Assist button — your vehicle does the rest.10

TITLE: Available Active Park Assist 2.0
DESCRIPTION: Parking made easy — even in tight parallel or reverse perpendicular spots. When engaged, it can help locate a potential spot. Then all you have to do is brake to a complete stop, shift into Neutral and hold down the Active Park Assist button — your vehicle does the rest.10

TITLE: Adaptive Cruise Control with Stop-and-Go
DESCRIPTION:
This available feature slows down your vehicle if the traffic ahead has stopped or slowed. Available Adaptive Cruise Control with Stop-and-Go technology can bring your vehicle to a complete stop in stopped traffic and resume as traffic begins to move.10
*

TITLE: Adaptive Cruise Control with Stop-and-Go
DESCRIPTION:
This available feature slows down your vehicle if the traffic ahead has stopped or slowed. Available Adaptive Cruise Control with Stop-and-Go technology can bring your vehicle to a complete stop in stopped traffic and resume as traffic begins to move.10
*

TITLE: Rear View Camera
DESCRIPTION: The Rear View Camera provides a great view of what’s behind your vehicle. Just make sure to keep the camera lens free of debris (like snow or dust) and you can navigate your vehicle in Reverse with confidence.10

TITLE: Rear View Camera
DESCRIPTION: The Rear View Camera provides a great view of what’s behind your vehicle. Just make sure to keep the camera lens free of debris (like snow or dust) and you can navigate your vehicle in Reverse with confidence.10

TITLE: Evasive Steering Assist
DESCRIPTION:
This available feature can help make it easier to avoid a potential collision. It doesn’t steer for you, but it can provide extra steering support if the system warning goes off and you need to maneuver around the vehicle ahead.10
*

TITLE: Evasive Steering Assist
DESCRIPTION:
This available feature can help make it easier to avoid a potential collision. It doesn’t steer for you, but it can provide extra steering support if the system warning goes off and you need to maneuver around the vehicle ahead.10
*

TITLE: Lane-Keeping System
DESCRIPTION:
The Lane-Keeping System can help you stay in your lane, even during a moment of distraction. This feature scans your vehicle’s position between the lines in the road ahead and can alert you if you’re starting to edge out of your lane.10
*

TITLE: Lane-Keeping System
DESCRIPTION:
The Lane-Keeping System can help you stay in your lane, even during a moment of distraction. This feature scans your vehicle’s position between the lines in the road ahead and can alert you if you’re starting to edge out of your lane.10
*

TITLE: Voice-Activated Navigation System
DESCRIPTION:
This available feature with SYNC®
 327
 adds pinch-to-zoom capability that can help you stay confidently on course.

TITLE: Voice-Activated Navigation System
DESCRIPTION:
This available feature with SYNC®
 327
 adds pinch-to-zoom capability that can help you stay confidently on course.

TITLE: Auto High-Beam Headlamps
DESCRIPTION: Auto High-Beam Headlamps can sense poor lighting conditions and switch on to light your path ahead. They can even sense oncoming headlights and dim automatically, so you don’t have to worry about blinding other drivers.10

TITLE: Auto High-Beam Headlamps
DESCRIPTION: Auto High-Beam Headlamps can sense poor lighting conditions and switch on to light your path ahead. They can even sense oncoming headlights and dim automatically, so you don’t have to worry about blinding other drivers.10

TITLE:
Available SYNC®
 3
DESCRIPTION:
Smart hardware. Smart software. Smart design. Simple music search, capacitive touchscreen, enhanced voice recognition, and climate control keep your hands on the wheel and your eyes on the road.27
 SYNC®
 3 also brings you the power of Apple CarPlay™
160
 and Android Auto™
 compatibility to your Ford.161

TITLE: FordPass Connect™
DESCRIPTION:
Whether you’re at home, on a family road trip or working remotely, you can stay connected to your Escape and the world with FordPass Connect™
. Use your app to access features like start/stop, lock/unlock, remote start scheduling, vehicle location, fuel levels and mileage. Your FordPass Connect™
-equipped vehicle can also be a Wi-Fi hotspot. Select models feature a 4G LTE Wi-Fi hotspot powered by AT&T. Up to 10 devices can connect at once, and you can use FordPass™
 to keep track of your Wi-Fi data usage. The hotspot can be accessed up to 50 feet outside the vehicle.*

TITLE: WAZE Technology
DESCRIPTION: You can collaborate with other users, outsmarting traffic by sharing information to get the best routes, and receive real-time alerts about accidents, road hazards and traffic jams. You can operate Waze through your vehicle’s touchscreen, as well as use voice commands for hands-free control, helping to keep your eyes on the road.*

TITLE: Ford+Alexa
DESCRIPTION:
When connected to SYNC®
 3 AppLink, Amazon’s cloud-based voice service provides hands-free access to a variety of features and capabilities. You’ll have access to Voice Navigation, Traffic Information, Amazon Prime shopping and can even control your supported Smart Home devices. Alexa also interacts with Google, Apple, & Microsoft calendars as well.*

TITLE: Key by Amazon In-Car Delivery Available With Ford
DESCRIPTION:
Ford is making your life easier in collaboration with Amazon, offering in-car delivery with Key by Amazon for Prime members. Receive Amazon packages delivered securely to your vehicle whether you’re at home, at work or on vacation. Download the Key app and link it with your FordPass™
 app.* Then, simply shop on Amazon.com or the Amazon mobile shopping app for eligible items and select the in-car delivery option at checkout. You’ll receive notifications on the Key app throughout the delivery process. For added peace of mind, the delivery driver is required to double-check the door handle to make sure it is locked when the delivery is completed. All deliveries are backed by the Key by Amazon Happiness Guarantee.

TITLE: Capability to Explore
DESCRIPTION: It’s a big world out there. Escape lets you hit the road and explore it with the choice of three different engines. For helping keeping you in control, there’s also the available All-Wheel Drive Disconnect and standard Selectable Drive Modes.

TITLE: Four-Engine Lineup
DESCRIPTION: The standard 1.5L EcoBoost engine with Auto Start-Stop Technology is coupled with an eight-speed automatic transmission. Auto Start-Stop Technology that can help lower fuel consumption and vehicle emissions during city driving when your vehicle comes to a stop. The engine shuts off and then seamlessly restarts when you step on the accelerator or when your foot leaves the brake pedal.

TITLE: 1.5L EcoBoost® Engine with Auto Start-Stop Technology
DESCRIPTION: The standard 1.5L EcoBoost engine with Auto Start-Stop Technology is coupled with an eight-speed automatic transmission. Auto Start-Stop Technology that can help lower fuel consumption and vehicle emissions during city driving when your vehicle comes to a stop. The engine shuts off and then seamlessly restarts when you step on the accelerator or when your foot leaves the brake pedal.

TITLE: 2.0L EcoBoost® Engine with Auto Start-Stop Technology
DESCRIPTION:
The available 2.0L EcoBoost engine comes with Auto Start-Stop Technology and SelectShift.®
The eight-speed SelectShift transmission offers the convenience of an automatic or the sporty feel of a manual. What’s more, when equipped with the 2.0L EcoBoost®
 Class II Trailer Tow Package, this engine has a maximum towing capacity of 3,500 lbs.

TITLE: Hybrid 2.5L iVCT Atkinson-Cycle I-4 engine
DESCRIPTION: The 2.5L I-4 Atkinson-cycle powertrain features an electronically controlled continuously variable transmission (eCVT) and an 88 kW electric motor. Also, the all-new Escape Hybrid packages its liquid-cooled lithium-ion battery smartly outside of the vehicle below the floor of the second-row seats rather than occupying a significant portion of the cargo area. The briefcase-shaped battery in the standard hybrid measures less than one-third the size of the old Escape Hybrid battery. Standard on all Escape Hybrid* and plug-in hybrid models.**

TITLE: Plug-In 2.5L iVCT Atkinson-Cycle I-4 engine
DESCRIPTION: The 2020 Escape Plug-In Hybrid* has a Level 1/Level 2 AC charging port. Using a 110-volt Level 1 charger, the estimated time to fully charge the battery is 10 to 11 hours. Using a 240-volt Level 2 charger, charge time drops to roughly 3.5 hours. What’s more, the new design of the 2020 Escape allows for the battery to be stored underneath the vehicle, which frees up space in the cabin, offering plug-in customers more room with no humps from the battery.

TITLE: Available AWD Disconnect
DESCRIPTION: Designed to save fuel, All-Wheel Drive Disconnect can disable the rear driveline when the system detects AWD is not needed. This allows only the front wheels to propel the vehicle, reducing drag and the overall energy demands of the drivetrain.

TITLE: Selectable Drive Modes
DESCRIPTION: Designed to help improve your driving experience and handling on varying road surfaces. The different modes are Eco, Sport, Normal, Slippery and Deep Snow/Sand.10 Once selected, each one of these driving modes can modify the electronic stability control system and traction control system without you having to do anything.

TITLE: Normal Mode
DESCRIPTION: For everyday driving. This mode is a perfect balance of excitement, comfort and convenience.

TITLE: Eco Mode
DESCRIPTION: For efficient and responsible driving. This mode helps deliver maximum fuel efficiency and increases driving range.

TITLE: Sport Mode
DESCRIPTION: This mode increases throttle response, provides a sportier steering feel, along with quicker shifting. The suspension also stiffens, with an emphasis on handling and control.

TITLE: Slippery Mode
DESCRIPTION: For firm surfaces covered with loose or slippery material such as ice, water, grass or a thin layer of gravel or sand.

TITLE: Deep Snow/Sand Mode
DESCRIPTION: This mode can help keep your vehicle under control in deep snow or soft dry sand.

TITLE: Towing Capability
DESCRIPTION:
Escape Titanium with its 2.0L EcoBoost®
 engine has a maximum towing capacity of 3,500 lbs. when equipped with the Class II Trailer Tow Package. The standard 1.5L EcoBoost®
 engine, when properly equipped, can tow up to 2,000 lbs. And don’t forget about hybrid capability because when properly equipped, the hybrid* and plug-in hybrid are powered by the 2.5L I-4 and can each tow up to 1,500 lbs.**

TITLE: For Getting Around and Getting It Done
DESCRIPTION: 2020 Escape has been redesigned and fitted with the right available features to get you through your busy schedule. Besides the new interior with plenty of cargo space* and best-in-class second-row legroom,** Escape can also help you park, stay informed, and even open up when you have your hands full.

TITLE: Hands-Free Foot-Activated Liftgate
DESCRIPTION: Thanks to the available hands-free foot-activated liftgate, there’s no need to fumble for keys. Its operation is especially helpful when your arms are full of items like grocery bags. With the Intelligent Access key in your pocket or purse, kick your foot under the bumper and the liftgate opens. You can also adjust the liftgate height, helpful for lower overhangs. Standard on SEL and Titanium.

TITLE: Plenty of Space
DESCRIPTION: More space for more fun. That’s why 2020 Escape has second-row 60/40 split-fold seats and an all-new sliding feature for more cargo space.* Plus, the redesigned interior offers best-in-class second-row legroom with 40.7-inches of personal space.**

TITLE: 12.3-Inch Digital Instrument Cluster
DESCRIPTION: A new way to look at your dash. The available 12.3-inch digital instrument cluster lets you configure the look and function of your driving information.

TITLE: Available Active Park Assist 2.0
DESCRIPTION: Standard on Titanium, available Active Park Assist 2.0 takes parallel or perpendicular parking to an automatic level. Once the feature is engaged by pushing the Active Park Assist button, the system will detect an appropriate parallel or perpendicular parking spot. When the system identifies a parking spot, it will prompt you to come to a complete stop, shift to Neutral, release the brake pedal and hold the Active Park Assist button down; the vehicle does the rest. All steering, shifting, brake and accelerator controls are performed by the system. The system can do the same actions for exiting a parallel parking spot as well.10

TITLE: Rotary Gear Shift Dial
DESCRIPTION: New for 2020, the rotary gear shift dial takes up less room than traditional knobs. This opens up space for more conveniently arranged cupholders, improved bin size, smart storage and a USB port right where you need it.

TITLE:
B&O™
 Sound System by Bang & Olufsen with 10 Speakers
DESCRIPTION: New for 2020. Enjoy your personal sound studio wherever you go. The available B&O Sound System by Bang & Olufsen (standard on Titanium) offers a dynamic, immersive listening experience for everyone on board.

TITLE: Get In. Go. Repeat.
DESCRIPTION: The completely redesigned Escape was built for a life in motion. From the spacious new interior, to the sleek, head-turning lines of the exterior – 2020 Ford Escape was built for adventure on the road and a lifestyle on the go.

TITLE: Redesigned Exterior and Interior
DESCRIPTION: The Ford Escape has a distinctive new look for 2020. Redesigned with sportier lines that give it a premium feel, the attention-grabbing new Escape will change the way you look at every other SUV. Its interior has also been redesigned with all the features and conveniences to help make traveling, and exploring, more comfortable. A new rotary gear shift dial opens space on the center console and helps improve overall front-row comfort. And with the second-row 60/40 split-fold seats with an all-new sliding feature, you can have best-in-class second-row legroom* or slide forward to maximize rear cargo space.**

TITLE: Panoramic Vista Roof®
DESCRIPTION: The available panoramic Vista Roof features a large forward panel that tilts up or opens fully, plus a fixed rear skylight. So whether you’re sitting up front or in back, the Vista Roof lets in natural light. Available on SE, SEL and Titanium.

TITLE: Second-Row Sliding, Seats 60/40 Split-Fold Down
DESCRIPTION: Your life on the go needs both convenience and versatility. That’s why 2020 Escape has second-row 60/40 split-fold seats and an all-new sliding feature for more cargo space* or best-in-class second-row legroom with 40.7 inches of personal space.**

TITLE: SE Sport Premium Package
DESCRIPTION:
A head-turning new look for 2020, the SE Sport Premium Package includes 19-inch Machined-face aluminum wheels with Ebony-painted pockets, black roof-rack rails, ActiveX seating material and a panoramic Vista Roof®
.

TITLE: TECHNOLOGY FOR CONFIDENCE ON THE ROAD.
DESCRIPTION:
The Transit Connect Cargo Van offers a wide range of available technologies to help you be aware of your surroundings and ever-changing traffic conditions.10
 From the driveway to the highway, the available Ford Co-Pilot360™
 driver-assist technologies help keep you connected and confident as you take to the road and move your business forward.

TITLE:
FORD CO-PILOT360™
 TECHNOLOGY
DESCRIPTION:
Introducing Ford Co-Pilot360™
 — an advanced suite of standard driver-assist technologies that includes BLIS®

 with Cross Traffic Alert, Pre-Collision Assist with Automatic Emergency Braking, Auto High-Beam Headlamps, Lane-Keeping System and Rear View Camera. Ford Transit Connect Cargo Van also makes additional technology available that is designed to help keep you in command, from the driveway to the highway.10

TITLE: PRE-COLLISION ASSIST WITH AUTOMATIC EMERGENCY BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: If the system’s sensors detect a potential collision with a car or pedestrian in front of you, a warning flashes and an audible alert sounds.* Also, the brakes will precharge and increase brake-assist sensitivity to provide full responsiveness when you do brake. If you do not take corrective action and a collision is imminent, the brakes can automatically apply.

TITLE: PRE-COLLISION ASSIST WITH AUTOMATIC EMERGENCY BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: If the system’s sensors detect a potential collision with a car or pedestrian in front of you, a warning flashes and an audible alert sounds.* Also, the brakes will precharge and increase brake-assist sensitivity to provide full responsiveness when you do brake. If you do not take corrective action and a collision is imminent, the brakes can automatically apply.

TITLE: LANE-KEEPING SYSTEM
DESCRIPTION: A camera mounted behind the windshield scans road lane markings to determine vehicle position and detects a lane departure. This available feature* can operate during the day or night. Lane-Keeping Alert warns you through a series of steering wheel vibrations, which mimic a rumble strip, should the system detect an unintentional lane departure.10

TITLE: LANE-KEEPING SYSTEM
DESCRIPTION: A camera mounted behind the windshield scans road lane markings to determine vehicle position and detects a lane departure. This available feature* can operate during the day or night. Lane-Keeping Alert warns you through a series of steering wheel vibrations, which mimic a rumble strip, should the system detect an unintentional lane departure.10

TITLE: AUTO HIGH-BEAM HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION: Available Auto High-Beam Headlamps can sense poor lighting conditions and switch on to light your path ahead. They can even sense oncoming headlights and dim automatically, so you don’t have to worry about blinding other drivers. They can help you keep your focus on the road – and both hands on the wheel.

TITLE: AUTO HIGH-BEAM HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION: Available Auto High-Beam Headlamps can sense poor lighting conditions and switch on to light your path ahead. They can even sense oncoming headlights and dim automatically, so you don’t have to worry about blinding other drivers. They can help you keep your focus on the road – and both hands on the wheel.

TITLE:
AVAILABLE BLIS®
 WITH CROSS-TRAFFIC ALERT
DESCRIPTION: BLIS (Blind Spot Information System with Cross-Traffic Alert uses radar to identify if a vehicle is detected in your blind spot and alerts you with an indicator light in the appropriate exterior mirror. Cross-Traffic Alert also uses radar to watch for traffic behind you as you’re slowly backing out of a parking spot or driveway. If cross-traffic sensors detect a vehicle, you will be audibly and visually alerted.

TITLE:
AVAILABLE BLIS®
 WITH CROSS-TRAFFIC ALERT
DESCRIPTION: BLIS (Blind Spot Information System with Cross-Traffic Alert uses radar to identify if a vehicle is detected in your blind spot and alerts you with an indicator light in the appropriate exterior mirror. Cross-Traffic Alert also uses radar to watch for traffic behind you as you’re slowly backing out of a parking spot or driveway. If cross-traffic sensors detect a vehicle, you will be audibly and visually alerted.

TITLE: REAR VIEW CAMERA
DESCRIPTION:
The Rear View Camera10
 provides a video image on the center-stack screen of the area behind your vehicle. The camera is activated when you shift into Reverse and back up slowly. The screen has guides to help you align your vehicle with a trailer or assist you with backing up in tight places.

TITLE: REAR VIEW CAMERA
DESCRIPTION:
The Rear View Camera10
 provides a video image on the center-stack screen of the area behind your vehicle. The camera is activated when you shift into Reverse and back up slowly. The screen has guides to help you align your vehicle with a trailer or assist you with backing up in tight places.

TITLE: WIRELESS CHARGING
DESCRIPTION: For compatible devices, an available wireless inductive phone charger* lets you charge your phone by just setting it down. This means no more struggling with ports, plugs or charging cables.

TITLE: FORDPASS™
DESCRIPTION:
FordPass is the one-stop app that can help you move more freely throughout your day.164
Here’s how:



Lock, unlock and start your vehicle remotely*
Use FordPay to conveniently pay for service
Receive key vehicle info and schedule service
Compare fuel prices at stations along your route
Find parking169 ahead of time
Get FordPass help from a friendly FordGuide



These are just some of the great things you can do with FordPass. If you haven’t already, download the FordPass app on the App Store167 or get it on Google Play.167

TITLE: FORD COMMERCIAL SOLUTIONS
DESCRIPTION: We’ve engineered manufacturer-grade commercial tools in conjunction with the Ford vehicles that make up your fleet.  Our software and hardware work seamlessly with your vehicles to help you solve problems, optimize your fleet and keep your operations running smoothly. Ford Telematics™ and Ford Data Services™ give you the power of choice to run your business how you want.

TITLE: FORD TELEMATICS™
DESCRIPTION:
Help improve your business operations with Ford Telematics™ software that delivers manufacturer-grade information, insights and solutions right to your fingertips. Key Benefits might include:

 


Improve asset utilization through GPS tracking
Maximize vehicle availability with Vehicle Health Alerts and service reminders
Optimize your running costs by monitoring fuel consumption
Protect your fleet with notifications that can help you react quickly
Improve driver behavior by receiving insights into driver performance


 


For more information, please call 1-833-811-3673, email FCS1@ford.com, or visit commercialsolutions.ford.com

TITLE: FORD DATA SERVICES™
DESCRIPTION:
Gain seamless and secure access to your vehicle data through our open platform, the Transportation Mobility Cloud (TMC). Key features include:

 


Always Evolving: Access to new updates and vehicle signals when they become available
Security Management: Our expertise provides industry-leading data protection
Third Party Access: Easy API integration provides secure and easy access to processed vehicle data
Seamless Integration: Designed for secure, open integration with third-party service tools

TITLE: ECOMODE AND ECOCOACH
DESCRIPTION: EcoMode and EcoCoach monitor fuel economy and encourage eco-conscious driving behaviors.

TITLE: FORWARD AND REVERSE SENSING SYSTEMS
DESCRIPTION: If your vehicle is in Drive and moving slowly, the Forward Sensing System will sound a high-pitched beeping tone if something is there in front of you. The beeps will become more rapid as you approach an object, and within 10 inches they become a solid tone. The sensors turn off when you put your vehicle in Park or Neutral. The Reverse Sensing Systems works the same way using sensors in the rear bumper.

TITLE: SIDE-WIND STABILIZATION SYSTEM
DESCRIPTION:
Standard side-wind stabilization technology39
 is designed to help reduce driver stress while operating a vehicle in high winds. The system monitors sensors and if a strong wind gust is detected, it carefully applies the brakes on one side to help the driver stay in his/her lane. It works alongside Roll Stability Control™
 on slippery surfaces – to help avoid skids, lateral slides and potential vehicle rollovers.

TITLE: IDEAL FIT FOR YOUR BUSINESS PLAN.
DESCRIPTION: Its compact size and maneuverability make the Transit Connect Cargo Van ideal for working in tight spaces and urban areas. A wide variety of vocational upfits are available to precisely match the business you’re in. Whether you’re an independent owner-operator or the manager of a corporate fleet, going with the Ford Transit Connect Cargo Van is all about working as productively as you can.

TITLE: MODERN INTERIOR
DESCRIPTION: Convenience-oriented interior design starts with ergonomic instruments and controls. Tachometer and trip computer are standard, plus cruise control and a tilting/telescoping steering wheel. Places to put things include a first-row full-width overhead storage shelf, spacious glove box and a front center console with cupholders and storage bin.

TITLE: IDEAL FOR VOCATIONAL UPFITTING
DESCRIPTION:
Configure a Transit Connect Cargo Van with a vocational upfit that precisely matches your business. Available is anything from rooftop ladder racks, literature holders and storage cabinets to dividers, double floors, drawers, cargo management packages and many others. Your dealer can fill you in on all the details. For more information on the whole range of upfitting possibilities, visit the Upfit Configurator
.

TITLE: MOBILE BUSINESS CARD
DESCRIPTION:
The modern design of the Transit Connect Cargo Van projects a professional image – one that will speak volumes about your business. Large side panels let you prominently display your company as a mobile business card with colorful, eye-catching graphics. Choose from a large selection of preset templates and graphics, professionally designed and installed, or have your own design created. For more information, go to fordcommercialgraphics.com
.

TITLE: CARGO VAN VOLUMES AND PAYLOADS
DESCRIPTION: Maximize your workday in a Ford Transit Connect Cargo Van in one of two wheelbases. The long wheelbase model has 127.4 cu. ft. of cargo space behind the front seats, or 145.8 cu. ft. of storage with the passenger seat folded. This lets you stack cargo up to four feet high. Maximum payload rating is 1,570 lbs. The short wheelbase model has 104.8 cu. ft. of cargo space behind the front seats, or 123.2 cu. ft. with the passenger seat folded. Maximum payload rating is 1,510 lbs.*,**

TITLE: BEST-IN-CLASS WHEEL WELL WIDTH
DESCRIPTION: Productivity needs a lot of elbow room. That’s why the 2020 Ford Transit Connect Cargo Van has a best-in-class width between the wheel wells of 48.7 inches.*

TITLE: LOAD HEIGHT
DESCRIPTION: A low load floor height of under two feet means moving things in and out is no sweat.*

TITLE: CAPABILITY IN A BIG WAY.
DESCRIPTION:
Carry cargo with a max payload rating up to 1,570 lbs.* Need to haul something? The short-wheelbase model has an impressive maximum tow rating of 2,000 lbs. with the available Trailer Tow Package.** So, when you’re looking for a vehicle with the capability to help you get the big jobs done and keep your business moving forward, take a look at the 2020 Transit Connect Cargo Van – it’s Built Ford Tough®
.

TITLE: BUILT FORD TOUGH®
DESCRIPTION: The Ford Transit Connect Cargo Van is engineered to stringent Ford Light Commercial Vehicle Durability Standards and Built Ford Tough to meet your requirements for hard work and reliability. Whether your business is carrying cargo or towing equipment, the Transit Connect Cargo Van is a vehicle you can depend on to get the job done.

TITLE: SWING-OUT REAR CARGO DOORS AND DUAL SLIDING DOORS
DESCRIPTION: To suit your particular job needs, Transit Connect Cargo Van models offer you the choice of 180-degree 50/50 swing-out rear cargo doors (with no glass or available fixed glass) or a rear liftgate. Dual-sliding side doors are standard.

TITLE: 2.0L GDI I-4L ENGINE
DESCRIPTION: Coupled with an eight-speed automatic transmission, the standard 2.0L GDI I-4L engine provides plenty of power to get the job done.

TITLE: IMPRESSIVE TOWING CAPABILITY
DESCRIPTION:
When the task at hand calls for towing, the Transit Connect Cargo Van comes through with an impressive* towing capacity of up to 2,000 lbs. when equipped with the Trailer Tow Prep Package.** Among the included features is trailer sway control linked to the technology of the standard AdvanceTrac®
 with RSC®
 (Roll Stability Control™
).

TITLE: AUTO START–STOP TECHNOLOGY
DESCRIPTION: You can help reduce fuel consumption and vehicle emissions during city driving with standard Auto Start-Stop Technology. When the vehicle comes to a stop in city driving, the engine is automatically shut off. The air conditioning and radio stay on, keeping you comfortable. The engine seamlessly restarts when your foot leaves the brake pedal.

TITLE:
QUICKCLEAR™
 ELECTRIC WINDSHIELD DEFROSTER
DESCRIPTION: The available Quickclear electric windshield defroster gets you going on the job fast. With the engine running, the press of a button rapidly removes ice, snow or mist. The washer jets are heated and a thin heating element embedded between two layers of glass provides quick defogging/defrosting.

TITLE: SAFETY TO KEEP YOU ON THE ROAD
DESCRIPTION:
The 2020 Ford Transit Connect Cargo Van was designed, engineered and built to help you get the job done safely. Get through the long workday in confidence with standard safety features, like the Rear View Camera, Safety Canopy®
 Side-Curtain Airbags, Curve Control and AdvanceTrac®
 with RSC®
 (Roll Stability Control™
).

TITLE:
SAFETY CANOPY®
 SIDE CURTAIN AIR BAGS
DESCRIPTION: The side-curtain airbags deploy downward and outward toward the side-window opening to protect the heads of front passengers. Roll-fold technology helps the airbag slide between the glass and occupant as the airbag inflates. The airbags will not interfere with properly installed child-safety seats or booster seats and are designed to stay inflated longer for added protection in a rollover.*

TITLE: CURVE CONTROL
DESCRIPTION: Curve Control helps drivers maintain control when entering a curve too fast by reducing engine torque and applying four-wheel braking to reduce speed.39

TITLE:
ADVANCETRAC®
 WITH RSC®
 ROLL STABILITY CONTROL™
DESCRIPTION:
Standard AdvanceTrac with RSC (Roll Stability Control)39
 uses two gyroscopic sensors monitoring yaw and roll rates, helping you maintain control whenever it detects wheelslip, understeer, oversteer or roll motion. It also helps maintain control on road conditions such as ice, gravel or rain.

TITLE: EASY MANEUVERABILITY
DESCRIPTION: The Transit Connect Cargo Van, especially the short-wheelbase model, is a natural when it comes to maneuvering into small parking spots or navigating around tight spaces. The short-wheelbase models have 38.3 feet of curb-to-curb turning diameter, while the long-wheelbase model has a turning diameter of 40.0 feet.

TITLE: TRAILER SWAY CONTROL
DESCRIPTION:
Trailer sway control39
 helps you tow more confidently by automatically determining from the motion of the vehicle if the trailer is swaying. It then takes measures, such as applying precise braking or reducing engine torque, to help you keep both the vehicle and the trailer under control.

TITLE: TWO GREAT ENGINES. AND NEW 10 SPEED AUTOMATIC.
DESCRIPTION:
Transit Cutaway and Chassis Cab for 2020 offer a line of two impressive engines to power your business. The standard engine is a new 3.5L PFDI V6 with the Ford-designed port-fuel/direct-injection (PFDI) system. Or you can power your Transit with the available upgraded 3.5L EcoBoost®
 V6. And that’s not all. Transit engines are teamed with a new 10-speed automatic transmission.

TITLE: NEW 10-SPEED AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION
DESCRIPTION: All Transit engines now deliver their power through an advanced 10-speed automatic transmission. Compared with the 6-speed it replaces, the 10-speed delivers improved overall performance, with enhanced acceleration at the low and mid ranges of the power band. Features include optimized wide-span gear spacing coupled with drag-reduction actions plus three overdrive gears.

TITLE: TRANSIT HELPS YOU STAY ON TRACK
DESCRIPTION:
2020 Ford Transit Cutaway and Chassis Cab offer more than new engine and transmission choices to power your business. You now also have the handling and traction capabilities of the available intelligent All-Wheel-Drive System on select wheelbases and GVWRs. The Ford Transit is designed and Built Ford Tough®
 to help you accomplish your goals.

TITLE: NEW ALL-WHEEL DRIVE
DESCRIPTION: Do you operate on loose surfaces like dirt or gravel? Or often work in rainy or snowy weather? If so, 2020 Transit has good news for you: Intelligent AWD. It balances torque between the front and rear wheels to enhance handling and maximize traction, typically before wheelslip can even occur, providing added confidence.

TITLE: RANGE OF GVW AND PAYLOAD RATINGS
DESCRIPTION: Configure a Transit Cutaway or Chassis Cab to match your business needs across a wide range of gross vehicle weight and payload ratings in single- and dual-rear-wheel models. GVWRs range from 9,070 lbs. to 11,000 lbs. Maximum payloads less body weight are 4,420 to 6,400 lbs.

TITLE: TESTED AND BUILT FORD TOUGH®
DESCRIPTION: We conducted testing on roads and highways across America, at temperature extremes from –40 to 120 degrees Fahrenheit. We also used trucks driven by robots at our Michigan Proving Grounds facility, allowing us to compress years of daily abuse into a mere few months. Our objective: Enable Transit to take on the toughest challenges encountered on your everyday jobs.

TITLE: WORK TRUCKS BUILT ON TOUGHNESS AND TECHNOLOGY.
DESCRIPTION:
Sure, Transit Cutaway and Chassis Cab are Built Ford Tough®
. In fact, its reputation for strength, dependability and solid engineering is the stuff of legends. But it’s smart too. With major advances in driver-assist technologies you can put to work for you.

TITLE:
FORD CO-PILOT360™
 TECHNOLOGY
DESCRIPTION:
2020 Transit models now come with standard Ford Co-Pilot360™

 Technology that can help you navigate our increasingly crowded roads and highways with confidence.10
 Features included are Pre-Collision Assist with Automatic Emergency Braking (AEB), Lane-Keeping System, and Auto High-Beam Headlamps.

TITLE: PRE-COLLISION ASSIST WITH AUTOMATIC EMERGENCY BRAKING (AEB)
DESCRIPTION: This Ford Co-Pilot360™ Technology feature can help reduce the severity of, and possibly eliminate, a frontal collision.* The system can detect a potential collision, then emit an audible alert as well as a warning message displayed in the message center. What’s more, Automatic Emergency Braking can precharge the brakes and increase brake-assist sensitivity to provide full responsiveness when you do brake. If you don’t take corrective action and a collision is imminent, brakes can apply automatically.10

TITLE: LANE-KEEPING SYSTEM
DESCRIPTION:
It happens to the best of drivers. A moment of distraction — and you start drifting. But standard Lane-Keeping System* can assist you with a camera that scans the lane markings ahead.10
 The system has three modes: Lane-Keeping Alert warns you with steering wheel vibrations that simulate driving over a rumble strip. Lane-Keeping Assist applies steering torque to direct you back to the center of the lane. You can set the system to activate either the Alert or Assist mode, or both. And there’s Driver Alert that sends out warnings in the message center when it detects repeated lane drifts — a reminder to pull over and take a break.

TITLE: LANE-KEEPING SYSTEM
DESCRIPTION:
It happens to the best of drivers. A moment of distraction — and you start drifting. But standard Lane-Keeping System* can assist you with a camera that scans the lane markings ahead.10
 The system has three modes: Lane-Keeping Alert warns you with steering wheel vibrations that simulate driving over a rumble strip. Lane-Keeping Assist applies steering torque to direct you back to the center of the lane. You can set the system to activate either the Alert or Assist mode, or both. And there’s Driver Alert that sends out warnings in the message center when it detects repeated lane drifts — a reminder to pull over and take a break.

TITLE: AUTO HIGH-BEAM HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION:
You might not think of manually turning your high beams on or off every time you need to. That’s why the driver-activated standard Auto High-Beam Headlamps is so helpful — it can do that for you, automatically.10 
When you’re on a dark road with no traffic, the high beams come on. But when a vehicle is approaching with headlamps on or traveling ahead with taillamps visible, the system will dim to low beams to reduce glare.

TITLE: AUTO HIGH-BEAM HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION:
You might not think of manually turning your high beams on or off every time you need to. That’s why the driver-activated standard Auto High-Beam Headlamps is so helpful — it can do that for you, automatically.10 
When you’re on a dark road with no traffic, the high beams come on. But when a vehicle is approaching with headlamps on or traveling ahead with taillamps visible, the system will dim to low beams to reduce glare.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE CRUISE CONTROL
DESCRIPTION:
Available Adaptive Cruise Control goes beyond the capability of conventional cruise control, employing both radar and camera technology. Adaptive Cruise Control lets you set a cruising speed and distance from the vehicle in front of you, an especially helpful feature in slow traffic conditions.10
 When traffic ahead slows down, you automatically do too; when traffic picks back up, you resume your preset speed and distance.*

TITLE: WIPER-ACTIVATED HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION: Available wiper-activated headlamps can be very helpful when you’re driving in inclement conditions. When you turn on the windshield wipers, the headlamps automatically turn on, increasing visibility for you and alerting oncoming motorists.

TITLE: FRONT AND REAR SPLIT-VIEW CAMERAS
DESCRIPTION: Enjoy another of the many smart technologies engineered to enhance your confidence on the road. At slow speeds and using multiple camera views, including a camera in the rear of the vehicle, Transit provides a bird’s eye view so you can see around the entire vehicle.10

TITLE: FORD COMMERCIAL SOLUTIONS
DESCRIPTION:
We’ve engineered manufacturer-grade commercial tools in conjunction with the Ford vehicles that make up your fleet. Our software and hardware work seamlessly with your vehicles to help you solve problems, optimize your fleet and keep your operations running smoothly. Ford Telematics™
 and Ford Data Services™
 give you the power of choice to run your business how you want.

TITLE: FORWARD COLLISION WARNING
DESCRIPTION: Forward Collision Warning can alert you if it senses a potential collision with a vehicle in front of you. A display flashes on the windshield, and the system provides an audible warning. If you don’t react in time, the brakes will precharge and increase brake-assist sensitivity to provide full responsiveness when you do brake.10

TITLE: FORD TRANSIT. STRONG. DEPENDABLE. VERSATILE.
DESCRIPTION: Transit Cutaway and Chassis Cab models are built on a unique Ford uniladder frame that’s remarkably strong and designed with a clean CA (cab to axle) for easy and cost-efficient upfitting. No add-on parts to be removed and reassembled. The Transit Cutaway with convenient direct cab-to-body access is ideal for such applications as delivery, ambulances, shuttle buses and motorhomes. The Transit Chassis Cab accommodates multiple applications like delivery boxes, utility and flatbed bodies.

TITLE: NEW PROGRAMMABLE UPFITTER INTERFACE MODULE
DESCRIPTION: Upfitting is easier than ever with the new available factory-installed programmable Upfitter Interface Module (UIM). Using a laptop or notebook, an upfitter can connect electrical equipment to Controller Area Network (CAN) busses or ports and program switches to operate aftermarket-installed equipment, such as lift buckets and cranes, with up to nine digitally configurable inputs.

TITLE: HIGH-CAPACITY UPFITTER SWITCHES
DESCRIPTION: Four available upfitter switches (30 amp, 30 amp, 10 amp and 15 amp) with fuses and relays provide a convenient way to connect a variety of aftermarket accessories to your vehicle’s electrical system. They’re factory installed and integrated into the instrument panel, so there’s no need to cut into the truck’s electrical system when installing accessories, such as a winch, lights or a two-way radio.

TITLE: MOTORHOME PREP PACKAGE
DESCRIPTION:
The Transit Cutaway Chassis for the Class C motorhome body enables motorhome manufacturers to match a recreational body to the required chassis payload capacity.

 

The Motorhome Prep Package includes:

● Cruise control (gas engine)
● Adaptive Cruise Control (2.0L EcoBlue Bi-Turbo I-4 Diesel engine*)
● Audio Pack #19 (AM/FM stereo with Bluetooth®, dual USB ports, SYNC® 3 and four-inch multi-function display - when no Rearview Camera is selected)
● Tow/Haul mode with trailer wiring provisions
● Front license plate bracket
● Dual AGM batteries
● Modified vehicle wiring system
● Dark Palazzo Gray cloth, four-way manual driver and 4-way manual swivel passenger seats
● Exterior Upgrade Package (SRW/DRW)
● Auxiliary fuse panel with high-spec interface connector

TITLE: SCHOOL BUS PREP PACKAGE (FLEET)
DESCRIPTION:
The Type A school bus consists of a bus body built on a cutaway chassis with a left-side driver’s door and is designed for carrying more than 10 passengers. School bus yellow exterior paint and passenger seat delete is required.

 

The School Bus Prep Package (fleet only) includes:


Safety glass (tinted)
Front license plate bracket
Right-hand door delete
Dual AGM batteries
Separate stop turn taillamp – LED enabled
Auxiliary fuse panel with high-spec interface connector
Dual note horn

TITLE: MULTIFUNCTION SCHOOL ACTIVITY BUS PREP PACKAGE (FLEET)
DESCRIPTION:
The Multifunction School Activity Bus (MFSAB) is required for childcare providers that transport 10 or more passengers. Requires Oxford Paint and passenger seat delete.

 

The Multifunction School Activity Bus Prep Package (fleet only) includes:

● Banded front-door safety glass (tinted)
● Front license plate bracket
● Right-hand door delete
● Dual AGM batteries
● Separate stop turn taillamp – LED enabled
● Auxiliary fuse panel with high-spec interface connector

TITLE: SHUTTLE BUS PREP PACKAGE
DESCRIPTION:
Shuttle buses carry people back and forth between designated locations, often at regular intervals. They frequently operate at airports and sporting events.

 

The Shuttle Bus Prep Package includes:


Exterior Upgrade Package
Front license plate bracket
Dual AGM batteries
Auxiliary fuse panel with high-spec interface connector
Modified vehicle wiring system
Audio Pack #19 (AM/FM stereo with Bluetooth®, dual USB ports, SYNC® 3 and four-inch multi-function display - when no Rearview

TITLE: AMBULANCE PREP PACKAGE
DESCRIPTION:
Prep packages for vital ambulance service are offered on many Ford commercial vehicles, including the Type III cutaway chassis. 3.5L Ecoboost® engine is required.

The Ambulance Prep Package includes:


Dual AGM batteries
Dual alternator
Fixed rear cargo door glass and fixed passenger-side cargo door glass
3.73 limited-slip axle included with a Medium-Roof Cargo Van and 3.5L PFDi V6 engine or 3.5L EcoBoost® V6 engine
4.10 limited-slip axle included with a High-Roof Cargo Van and 3.5L PFDi V6 engine combination
Modified vehicle wiring system
Front license plate bracket
Auxiliary fuse panel with high-spec interface connector
Dual-note horn

TITLE: EXTERIOR AND INTERIOR APPEARANCE OPTIONS
DESCRIPTION:
Transit Cutaway and Chassis Cab models offer new colors and seat patterns for 2020.
New exterior colors include: Diffused Silver, Agate Black and Kapoor Red.

TITLE: E-SERIES FOR MOVING CARGO, TRANSPORTING PEOPLE.
DESCRIPTION: Ford E-Series Class 3–4 Cutaway vans cover a broad range of business and recreational applications. Emergency service. Commercial trades. Bus and shuttle transport. Class C motorhomes. The E-Series lineup begins with the E-350 single-rear-wheel model, followed by the E-350/E-450 versions with dual rear wheels and higher GVWRs for handling the broad range of heavy-duty applications. All E-Series Cutaways feature a comfortable cab built on a rugged full frame.

TITLE: TELESCOPING EXTERIOR MIRRORS
DESCRIPTION: Upfit bodies and trailers come in different widths. So it makes good sense to equip your vehicle with the available telescoping mirrors that accommodate the type and width of your vehicle’s body or trailer. These mirrors come in either power or manual telescoping adjustment, and provide adjustable flat glass and a manual convex spotter mirror.

TITLE: INTEGRATED TRAILER BRAKE CONTROLLER
DESCRIPTION: The E-Series Cutaway offers an available factory-installed, fully integrated trailer brake controller (TBC) with no installation hassles or aftermarket worries. Integrated with the anti-lock brakes, TBC synchronizes vehicle and trailer brakes for seamless braking, even with the heaviest loads. The Ford TBC offers the advantage of verified compatibility with trailers utilizing electrically actuated drum brakes and certain electric-over-hydraulic (EOH) drum or disc brakes.

TITLE: E-SERIES CUTAWAY TOWING
DESCRIPTION:
With their full frame construction and standard V10 muscle, E-Series Cutaway models have an impressive towing capacity up to 10,000 lbs. when properly equipped. Plus GCWRs from 13,000 to 22,000 lbs. Add the convenience of available power or manually operated telescoping mirrors. Also, there’s an available factory-integrated trailer brake controller (TBC) that synchronizes the vehicle and trailer brakes for seamless operation. What’s more, the Ford TorqShift®
 six-speed automatic transmission has an integrated driver-selectable Tow-Haul mode that automatically compensates for altitude, grade and load conditions.
