TITLE: COMFORT. THE KEY TO WORKING PRODUCTIVELY.
DESCRIPTION:
Drivers who spend hours every workday behind the wheel know the importance of comfort to working productively. The Ford E-Series cab is designed to get into and out of easily. The seating is firm and supportive, instruments are simple to read, and controls are easy to operate. And available SYNC®

 gives you voice-activated control of communications, entertainment and more.27

TITLE: 110-VOLT AC OUTLET
DESCRIPTION: Have an accessory that needs a plug? A tool that needs recharging? Then take advantage of the available 110-volt power outlet. It’s a conventional AC plug-in outlet that goes wherever the job takes you.

TITLE: USER-DEFINED UPFITTER SWITCHES
DESCRIPTION: Four available upfitter switches (30 amp, 30 amp, 10 amp and 15 amp) with fuses and relays provide a convenient way to connect a variety of aftermarket accessories to your vehicle’s electrical system. They’re factory-installed and integrated into the instrument panel, so there’s no need to cut into the truck’s electrical system when installing accessories, such as a winch, lights, strobes or a two-way radio.

TITLE: DESIGNED FOR COMFORT
DESCRIPTION: Drivers who work all day behind the wheel appreciate the comfort built into the E-Series cab. It's easy to get into and out of, provides firm and supportive seating, has ergonomically designed instruments and controls.

TITLE:
FORD TELEMATICS™
 AND FORD DATA SERVICES™
DESCRIPTION:
Our manufacturer-grade telematics hardware and software have been engineered in conjunction with the Ford vehicles your fleet uses every day. This means that they work together seamlessly to deliver solutions that are easy to implement and can have an immediate and positive impact on your operational effectiveness. Our products are continually evolving too, so that you’ll always benefit from the latest telematics solutions, direct from Ford.

 

You will be able to monitor a wide range of vehicle data and information in real time, including but not limited to the examples below:

 


GPS tracking and location

Vehicle speed
Harsh braking or acceleration
Excessive idling and fuel waste
Seatbelt use
Oil life remaining



For more information about Ford Telematics and Ford Data Services, please visit commercialsolutions.ford.com or call 1-833-811-FORD (1-833-811-3673).

TITLE: THE MUSCLE YOU NEED TO POWER YOUR BUSINESS.
DESCRIPTION: Some applications need more low-end muscle for heavy hauling. Others call for balanced overall performance on the highway. Because your vocation has specific power requirements, we offer the standard 6.8L Triton® V10 with 305 horsepower and 420 lb.- ft. of best-in-class torque* and the available 6.2L flex-fuel V8 rated at 331 horsepower and 356 lb.-ft. of torque. Both engines are teamed with the proven, durable Ford-built TorqShift® six-speed automatic transmission.

TITLE: ADVANCED FUELS
DESCRIPTION:
A CNG/Propane Gaseous Engine Prep Package* is available that allows the standard 6.8L Triton®
 V10 and the available 6.2L flex-fuel V8 to run on advanced fuels — compressed natural gas or liquefied propane autogas — in place of conventional unleaded gasoline.

TITLE:
FORD TORQSHIFT®
 AUTOMATIC
DESCRIPTION:
The Ford TorqShift®
 six-speed automatic transmission is designed and built by Ford to handle the high-performance demands of the standard 6.8L Triton®
 V10 (305 horsepower and 420 lb.-ft. of torque) and the available 6.2L flex-fuel V8 (331 horsepower and 356 lb.-ft. of torque). The SelectShift®
 feature includes Progressive Range Select (for overdrive lockout) plus Full Manual. And the Tow/Haul mode automatically compensates for altitude, grade and load conditions, and delays transmission upshifts to help reduce the frequency of gear hunting.

TITLE: HEAVY-DUTY ALTERNATORS
DESCRIPTION:
The standard 155-amp alternator (6.8L Triton®
 V10) and 150-amp alternator (6.2L flex-fuel V8) provide plenty of capacity for normal duty. For more demanding applications, optional extra-heavy-duty 225-amp alternator (6.8L Triton V10) and an extra-heavy-duty 240-amp alternator (6.2L flex-fuel V8) are available.

TITLE: FOR BUSINESS, MUNICIPAL SERVICE, RECREATION.
DESCRIPTION: Name your vocation. And rest assured a Ford E-Series Cutaway can be configured to satisfy your particular requirements. For over 50 years, the E-Series Cutaway with its rugged body-on-frame construction and strong Twin-I-Beam front suspension has provided the proven foundation for school buses, shuttle transport, ambulance service, delivery, and recreational applications.

TITLE: AMBULANCE PREP PACKAGE
DESCRIPTION:
Prep packages for vital ambulance service are offered on many Ford commercial vehicles, including the Type III E-Series Cutaway.

 

The Ambulance Prep Package for E-Series Cutaway includes:


Auxiliary heater/air conditioning connector package
Limited-slip axle
Dual 78 amp-hr heavy-duty batteries
225 amp extra-heavy-duty alternator with 6.8L Triton® V10; 240 amp extra-heavy-duty alternator with 6.2L flex-fuel V8
Front max GAWR
Spare tire and wheel
Mirrors, telescoping trailer tow with manual adjustments
Vinyl headliner and sun visors
Auxiliary fuel port

TITLE: MOTORHOME PREP PACKAGE
DESCRIPTION:
The Ford Cutaway Chassis, designed for the Class C motorhome body, is available in a wide choice of GVWRs up to 14,500 lbs. (dual rear wheels), enabling motorhome manufacturers to closely match a recreational body to the required chassis payload capacity. What’s more, the 14,500-lb. GVWR chassis features a maximum GCWR of 22,000 lbs.

 

The Motorhome Prep Package with E-350/E-450 models includes:


High-Series Exterior Upgrade Package
Power door locks and windows
Manual pedestals, seats not included
Cruise control
Fixed antenna
Front license plate bracket
Cloth sun visors
Exterior mirror delete
Front max GAWR (E-450 only)

TITLE: SHUTTLE BUS PREP PACKAGE
DESCRIPTION:
Shuttle buses carry people back and forth between designated locations, often at regular intervals. They frequently operate at airports and sporting events.

 

The Shuttle Bus Prep Package accommodates a wide range of seating arrangements. It includes:


High-Series Exterior Upgrade Package (front chrome bumper and chrome grille)
Manual pedestals, seats not included
Power door locks and windows
Engine block heater
Frame pucks (isolators – included when spacers not ordered)
Front license plate bracket
Exterior mirror delete

TITLE: SCHOOL BUS PREP PACKAGE
DESCRIPTION:
The Type A school bus consists of a bus body built on a cutaway chassis with a left-side driver’s door, and is designed for carrying more than 10 passengers. School bus yellow exterior paint is required.

 

The School Bus Prep Package includes:


Banded front-door glass (tinted)
High-back driver seat only
Frame pucks
40-gal. fuel tank

TITLE: E-350 WITH EXTERIOR UPGRADE PACKAGE
DESCRIPTION: The Built Ford Tough® E-Series Cutaway offers everything you need to take care of business. To E-Series toughness and versatility the High-Series Exterior Upgrade Package adds an element of style with front chrome bumper and chrome grille.

TITLE: ADAPTS TO FIT YOUR WORKLOAD
DESCRIPTION: The new 2020 Ford Transit offers the greatest variety of vehicle configurations in its class. * Designed to adapt to your company needs, you choose one of three roof heights, two wheelbases and three lengths. Then pick either of our new and improved engines to power your business on the go. In addition to all that, thoughtful accommodations like a three-passenger second-row seat ensure that everyone rides in comfort.

TITLE: POWERFUL ENGINE OPTIONS
DESCRIPTION: The 2020 Transit offers two high-powered engines for you to choose from. So whether it's the new standard 3.5L PFDI V6 engine or the available upgraded 3.5L ECOBOOST® V6, Transit has the power to get the job done.

TITLE: NEW 3.5L PFDI V6
DESCRIPTION: Transit models have a new standard V6 engine with advanced technology that delivers responsive performance with ratings of 275 horsepower and 262 lb.-ft. of torque. It’s a 3.5L V6 engineered with the Ford port-fuel/direct-injection (PFDI) system. PFDI features two injectors per cylinder — one mounted in the air intake port, another inside the cylinder — to help increase overall performance.

TITLE: UPGRADED 3.5L ECOBOOST® V6
DESCRIPTION: The outstanding performance of the 3.5L EcoBoost® is now available in Ford Transit Cutaway and Chassis Cab models. EcoBoost generates a level of performance you might expect from a large displacement engine. Power ratings of 310 horsepower and 400 lb.-ft. of torque come courtesy of two technologies: direct injection of fuel quickly into the combustion chambers (instead of intake ports) and twin turbochargers for an instantaneous surge of power with virtually no turbo lag.

TITLE: NEW 10-SPEED AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION
DESCRIPTION: All Transit engines now deliver their power through an advanced 10-speed automatic transmission. Compared with the 6-speed it replaces, the 10-speed delivers improved overall performance, with enhanced acceleration at the low and mid ranges of the power band. Features include optimized wide-span gear spacing coupled with drag-reduction actions plus three overdrive gears.

TITLE: CREW VAN
DESCRIPTION: When your job requires a crew that’s bigger than just two people, the Transit Crew Van was designed to adapt to your business — and your team. With a choice of three roof heights and two wheelbases, it’s easy to configure the vehicle that fits your needs.

TITLE: ONE VAN. MULTIPLE CONFIGURATIONS.
DESCRIPTION: Transit was designed to fit your business needs, offering the most configurations of any other cargo van. * Choose from three roof heights, two wheelbases and three body lengths. You can also opt for either of the two impressive powertrains available on the Transit.

TITLE: CAPABILITY WHERE IT COUNTS
DESCRIPTION: Whatever your business, getting the job done is Transit business. With a powerful new standard engine, plenty of cargo space and a wide range of gross vehicle weight and payload ratings, the 2020 Transit is ready to get to work.

TITLE: TWO GREAT ENGINES. AND NEW 10-SPEED AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION.
DESCRIPTION:
We now offer two ways to power your business. Our new standard 3.5L PFDI V6 engine and available upgraded 3.5L ECOBOOST®
 V6. But we didn’t stop there. Partner either of them with a new 10-speed automatic transmission and you’ve got a vehicle that’s more than capable for the job ahead.

TITLE: ALL-WHEEL DRIVE
DESCRIPTION: The new available All-Wheel-Drive System is not only designed to enhance handling and maximize traction. It was integrated into the vehicle’s design to ensure it didn’t raise the load floor or seat height, making it as easy to enter and exit as our standard model. Great news for drivers who are in and out of their vehicles a lot during the work day.

TITLE: RANGE OF GVW AND PAYLOAD RATINGS
DESCRIPTION: Configure a Transit to match your business needs across a wide range of gross vehicle weight and payload ratings in single- and dual-rear-wheel models. GVWRs range from 8,670 lbs. to 10,360 lbs. Maximum payloads less body weight are 2,640 lbs. and 4,530 lbs.

TITLE: CARGO CAPACITY
DESCRIPTION: Ford Transit Cargo Van offers plenty of cargo space. Depending on what your job calls for, you can choose from three lengths, three roof heights and two wheelbases. *

TITLE: AVAILABLE 31-GALLON TANK
DESCRIPTION: The only thing better than a 31-gallon tank is the second wind you get after filling it.

TITLE: TESTED AND BUILT FORD TOUGH®
DESCRIPTION: We conducted testing on roads and highways across America, at temperature extremes from –40 to 120 degrees Fahrenheit. We also used trucks driven by robots at our Michigan Proving Grounds facility, allowing us to compress years of daily abuse into a mere few months. Our objective: Enable Transit to take on the toughest challenges encountered on your everyday jobs.

TITLE: IT’S NOT JUST TOUGH. IT’S SMART.
DESCRIPTION:
With smart, innovative features, like our Lane-Keeping System, Adaptive Cruise Control, FordPass Connect™
 and more, the 2020 Transit is designed to keep you feeling confident and connected.

TITLE:
FORD CO-PILOT360™
 TECHNOLOGY
DESCRIPTION:
This Ford Co-Pilot360™

 Technology feature can help reduce the severity of, and possibly eliminate, a collision with a vehicle directly in front of you. * The system can detect a potential collision, then emit an audible alert as well as a warning message displayed in the message center. What’s more, Automatic Emergency Braking can pre-charge and increase brake-assist sensitivity to provide full responsiveness when you do brake. If you don’t take corrective action and a collision is imminent, brakes can apply automatically.10

TITLE: PRE-COLLISION ASSIST WITH AUTOMATIC EMERGENCY BRAKING (AEB)
DESCRIPTION:
This Ford Co-Pilot360™

 Technology feature can help reduce the severity of, and possibly eliminate, a collision with a vehicle directly in front of you. * The system can detect a potential collision, then emit an audible alert as well as a warning message displayed in the message center. What’s more, Automatic Emergency Braking can pre-charge and increase brake-assist sensitivity to provide full responsiveness when you do brake. If you don’t take corrective action and a collision is imminent, brakes can apply automatically.10

TITLE:
BLIS®
 WITH CROSS-TRAFFIC ALERT AND TRAILER COVERAGE
DESCRIPTION:
It’s rush hour on the interstate. You’re towing a trailer. And you need to change lanes. If this situation sounds daunting, it usually is. But available BLIS®
 with Cross-Traffic Alert and trailer coverage can help ease lane-change anxiety — even with a trailer in tow. It can alert you not only when a vehicle is spotted in your blind spots but also when one is alongside the trailer. *

TITLE:
BLIS®
 WITH CROSS-TRAFFIC ALERT AND TRAILER COVERAGE
DESCRIPTION:
It’s rush hour on the interstate. You’re towing a trailer. And you need to change lanes. If this situation sounds daunting, it usually is. But available BLIS®
 with Cross-Traffic Alert and trailer coverage can help ease lane-change anxiety — even with a trailer in tow. It can alert you not only when a vehicle is spotted in your blind spots but also when one is alongside the trailer. *

TITLE: LANE-KEEPING SYSTEM
DESCRIPTION: It happens to the best of drivers. A moment of distraction — and you start drifting. But standard Lane-Keeping System* can assist you with a camera that scans the lane markings ahead10 The system has three modes: Lane-Keeping Alert warns you with steering wheel vibrations that simulate driving over a rumble strip. Lane-Keeping Assist applies steering torque to direct you back to the center of the lane. You can set the system to activate either the Alert or Assist mode, or both. And there’s Driver Alert that sends out warnings in the message center when it detects repeated lane drifts — a reminder to pull over and take a break.

TITLE: LANE-KEEPING SYSTEM
DESCRIPTION: It happens to the best of drivers. A moment of distraction — and you start drifting. But standard Lane-Keeping System* can assist you with a camera that scans the lane markings ahead10 The system has three modes: Lane-Keeping Alert warns you with steering wheel vibrations that simulate driving over a rumble strip. Lane-Keeping Assist applies steering torque to direct you back to the center of the lane. You can set the system to activate either the Alert or Assist mode, or both. And there’s Driver Alert that sends out warnings in the message center when it detects repeated lane drifts — a reminder to pull over and take a break.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE CRUISE CONTROL
DESCRIPTION: Available Adaptive Cruise Control goes beyond the capability of conventional cruise control, employing both radar and camera technology. Adaptive Cruise Control lets you set a cruising speed and distance from the vehicle in front of you, an especially helpful feature in slow traffic conditions.10 When traffic ahead slows down, you automatically do too; when traffic picks back up, you resume your preset speed and distance. *

TITLE: ADAPTIVE CRUISE CONTROL
DESCRIPTION: Available Adaptive Cruise Control goes beyond the capability of conventional cruise control, employing both radar and camera technology. Adaptive Cruise Control lets you set a cruising speed and distance from the vehicle in front of you, an especially helpful feature in slow traffic conditions.10 When traffic ahead slows down, you automatically do too; when traffic picks back up, you resume your preset speed and distance. *

TITLE: FORWARD COLLISION WARNING
DESCRIPTION: Forward Collision Warning can alert you if it senses a potential collision with a vehicle in front of you. A display flashes on the windshield, and the system provides an audible warning. If you don’t react in time, the brakes will precharge and increase brake-assist sensitivity to provide full responsiveness when you do brake.10

TITLE: POST-COLLISION BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: This driver-assist feature can potentially lessen the severity of a secondary collision by automatically applying moderate brake pressure when an initial collision event is detected.10

TITLE: AUTO HIGH-BEAM HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION:
You might not think of manually turning your high beams on or off every time you need to. That’s why the driver-activated standard Auto High-Beam Headlamps is so helpful — it can do that for you, automatically.10
 When you’re on a dark road with no traffic, the high beams come on. But when a vehicle is approaching with headlamps on or traveling ahead with taillamps visible, the system will dim to low beams to reduce glare.

TITLE: AUTO HIGH-BEAM HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION:
You might not think of manually turning your high beams on or off every time you need to. That’s why the driver-activated standard Auto High-Beam Headlamps is so helpful — it can do that for you, automatically.10
 When you’re on a dark road with no traffic, the high beams come on. But when a vehicle is approaching with headlamps on or traveling ahead with taillamps visible, the system will dim to low beams to reduce glare.

TITLE: RAIN-SENSING WIPERS
DESCRIPTION: The 2020 Transit features rain-sensing wipers. They switch on automatically when they detect in climate weather to improve visibility.

TITLE: FRONT AND REAR SPLIT-VIEW CAMERAS
DESCRIPTION: Enjoy another of the many smart technologies engineered to enhance your confidence on the road. At slow speeds and using multiple camera views, including a camera in the rear of the vehicle and the available 180-degree camera tucked into the grille, Transit provides a bird’s eye view so you can see around the entire vehicle.10

TITLE: FORDPASS CONNECT™
DESCRIPTION:
When your vehicle is equipped with FordPass Connect, you can use the FordPass™
 App to access complimentary features like start, stop, lock and unlock your vehicle from just about anywhere. *

TITLE: FORD COMMERCIAL SOLUTIONS
DESCRIPTION:
We’ve engineered manufacturer-grade commercial tools in conjunction with Ford vehicles that make up your fleet. Our software works seamlessly with your vehicles to help you solve problems, optimize your fleet and keep your operation running smoothly. Ford Telematics™
 and Ford Data Services™
 give you the power of choice to run your business how you want.

TITLE: SMART. VERSATILE. FUNCTIONAL.
DESCRIPTION: Inside and out, the 2020 Transit is designed with your convenience in mind. It can fit the whole crew and has plenty of places to store their gear. It’s got a new audio system with touchscreen technology to keep you entertained and a redesigned climate control system to keep you comfortable. And its updated exterior is functional and appealing, which makes it easier to get the job done.

TITLE: EXTERIOR UPDATES
DESCRIPTION: We redesigned the exterior of the 2020 Transit in ways that are subtle but high on functionality, including an updated front fascia that features three grill options, redesigned fog lamps for greater visibility and three new available colors. Because it’s one thing to be tough and capable. It’s another to look good doing it.

TITLE: INTERIOR UPDATES
DESCRIPTION: The 2020 Transit interior has been designed with convenience and functionality in mind, including control buttons for audio, cruise control and more located on the steering wheel. Heavy-duty flooring and scuff plates, and a D-pillar assist handle make entering and exiting the rear of the vehicle easy.

TITLE: POWER SLIDING DOOR
DESCRIPTION: The available power sliding door makes it easier for your crew to get in or out of Transit. Plus, loading and unloading cargo is a more seamless experience.

TITLE: CREW VAN (THREE-PERSON SECOND-ROW BENCH)
DESCRIPTION: The second row now offers a three-across bench and rear airbags. Which means a more comfortable, and safe, ride for your crew members.

TITLE: TWO AVAILABLE CENTER CONSOLES
DESCRIPTION: Need extra room to stow extra office supplies on the go? Transit now offers your choice of a medium or large center console.

TITLE: MORE MUSCLE FOR HAULING OR TOWING
DESCRIPTION:
Ford Super Duty®
 for 2020 offers an expanded line of more-powerful engines. The all-new pushrod 7.3L gas V8 delivers durability and performance for strenuous everyday jobs. And the next generation Power Stroke®
 V8 Turbo Diesel is stronger than ever. Both are teamed up with a new Ford TorqShift®
 10-speed automatic. So, gas or diesel, you have more muscle for hauling or towing.

TITLE: MORE POWER TO OUT-HAUL, OUT-TOW ANY OTHER FULL-SIZE PICKUP.
DESCRIPTION:
No surprise that Super Duty®
 for 2020 improves upon its already top-rated performance with an expanded line of engines. There’s the all-new 7.3L gas V8 as well as next generation 6.7L Power Stroke®
 V8 Turbo Diesel, both with best-in-class power ratings. *

TITLE: 7.3L OHV PFI GAS V8
DESCRIPTION: Design a gas-powered V8 built for strenuous duty, hauling heavy loads day in and day out, with commercial-grade durability, performance and efficiency and you get the all-new port fuel-injected available 7.3L. This “pushrod” V8 design optimizes low-end torque, and the variable-cam timing helps to optimize high-output power. And for the durability also required, the 7.3L features a new cast-iron block with four-bolt and cross-bolted main bearings plus a forged-steel crankshaft. Want the largest, most powerful gas V8, rated at 430 hp and 475 lbs.-ft of torque, in a heavy-duty pickup?* This is it.

TITLE: 6.7L POWER STROKE® V8 TURBO DIESEL ENGINE
DESCRIPTION: The available 6.7L Power Stroke® V8 Turbo Diesel is upgraded for 2020. It has a new 36,000-psi fuel-injection system, featuring injectors that can atomize fuel up to eight times per stroke to optimize combustion. The engine features a newly redesigned electric-actuated variable-geometry turbocharger that improves throttle response. It also features a stronger block, cylinder heads, connector rods and bearings, plus new forged-steel pistons, which means 475 hp and 1,050 lbs.-ft of torque.*

TITLE: 6.2L FLEX-FUEL GAS V8
DESCRIPTION: The 6.2L flex-fuel gas V8 is the standard engine in F-250 and F-350 models. It’s engineered to deliver peak torque at lower rpm and generates high torque throughout the midrange of the power band. The 6.2L in the F-250 is teamed up with the TorqShift® G 6-speed transmission; in the F-350 for 2020, it features the new 10-speed automatic.

TITLE: FORD TORQSHIFT® 10-SPEED AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION
DESCRIPTION: All Super Duty® models (except the 6.2L V8 F-250) now feature a new standard TorqShift® 10-speed automatic transmission, engineered to optimize drive ratios and improve shift performance. You can choose from four selectable modes — Normal, TowHaul, Eco, Deep Sand/Snow and with the available Tremor Package, Rock Crawl mode.

TITLE:
TORQSHIFT® 
G 6-SPEED AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION
DESCRIPTION: The standard 6.2L gas V8 in the F-250 is teamed with the Ford TorqShift® G 6-speed automatic. Experience responsive power delivery and seamlessly smooth shifting. The SelectShift® feature includes Progressive Range Select (for overdrive lockout) plus Full Manual. Tow/Haul minimizes gear hunting uphill; downhill, it prevents upshifting and gaining speed and reduces reliance on brake pressure to slow the vehicle.

TITLE: ADVANCED FUEL CAPABILITY (6.2L GAS)
DESCRIPTION:
Compressed natural gas (CNG) and propane autogas are advanced fuel options to unleaded gasoline with the CNG/Propane Gaseous Engine Prep Package*
 available on the 6.2L gas V8. What’s more, the CNG/Propane Ford Power Stroke®
 V8 Turbo Diesel Package with the addition of the necessary upfits for bi-fuel capability enables the 6.2L V8 to run on either liquefied propane gas or unleaded gas. The 6.2L V8 is a flex-fuel engine, capable of running on E85 (85% ethanol, 15% regular gasoline); the available 6.7L Power Stroke®
 Turbo Diesel is B20 capable (20% biodiesel, 80% petrodiesel).

TITLE: OPERATOR-COMMANDED REGENERATION WITH ACTIVE INHIBIT
DESCRIPTION: Some operating conditions, such as long idling, don’t generate enough engine heat for the diesel to automatically burn off soot in the diesel particulate filter. That’s where available Operator-Commanded Regeneration with Active Inhibit (diesel only) comes in. When the warning light comes on, pushing the activation button raises the exhaust temperature to burn off the soot, after which the exhaust temperature reverts to normal. The active inhibit feature allows delay of regeneration when the vehicle is sitting over combustible materials, such as dry leaves or grass. Once in a safe place, the driver can manually start the regeneration process. Recommended for commercial applications.

TITLE: DIESEL ENGINE-EXHAUST BRAKING
DESCRIPTION:
The 6.7L Power Stroke®
 Turbo Diesel incorporates a driver-activated engine-exhaust brake. It restricts the turbocharger’s exhaust flow to generate back pressure and slow the vehicle, providing greater control while traveling downhill, regardless of vehicle load or road grade. Also, because the engine brake helps minimize having to apply pedal pressure, brake fade and lining wear are reduced, lowering the cost of maintenance. Three settings are available: On, Off and Auto. The Auto setting modulates engine braking as needed to help maintain the speed you want based on accelerator and brake pedal use.

TITLE: CAPABILITY TO GET THE JOB DONE
DESCRIPTION:
At Ford we know what it means to build a capable truck for the job at hand. That’s why Super Duty®
 features best-in-class* capability across every category, out-hauling and out-towing any other full-size pickup. The 2020 Ford Super Duty also includes a new available wireless charging pad, a new high-airflow grille, available live-drive power takeoff (PTO) provision with mobile mode and variety of other tools to help you on the job.

TITLE: BEST-IN-CLASS
DESCRIPTION: Need to tow the really big loads? Hitch up with the Ford Super Duty® and its best-in-class maximum available 37,000-lbs. gooseneck tow rating or its impressive best-in-class 32,500-lb. 5th-wheel tow rating. * Featuring a 5th-wheel and gooseneck substructure attached to the frame. Compatible with 5th-wheel hitch kits and gooseneck hitch kits offered through the factory and Ford Custom Accessories.

TITLE: BEST-IN-CLASS GOOSENECK TOWING
DESCRIPTION: Need to tow the really big loads? Hitch up with the Ford Super Duty® and its best-in-class maximum available 37,000-lbs. gooseneck tow rating or its impressive best-in-class 32,500-lb. 5th-wheel tow rating. * Featuring a 5th-wheel and gooseneck substructure attached to the frame. Compatible with 5th-wheel hitch kits and gooseneck hitch kits offered through the factory and Ford Custom Accessories.

TITLE: BEST-IN-CLASS CONVENTIONAL TOWING
DESCRIPTION: The Ford Super Duty® has a best-in-class maximum available conventional towing capacity of 24,200 pounds — higher than any other heavy-duty pickup. * Super Duty features a strong fully boxed frame made of more than 95 percent high-strength steel; hefty axle, suspension and driveline components; plus a factory-installed weight-carrying hitch built into the frame.

TITLE: LIVE-DRIVE PTO PROVISION
DESCRIPTION:
Whether your Super Duty®
 runs on diesel or gas power, available is the optional live-drive power takeoff (PTO) provision with mobile mode* that enables you to power an aftermarket snowplow, pump, compressor or other accessory. The PTO provision is available across the entire engine lineup. An output gear connects directly to the engine crankshaft to power your PTO anytime the engine is running, whether the truck is in motion or stopped.

TITLE: LED LIGHTING
DESCRIPTION:
The 2020 Ford Super Duty®
 offers available LED lighting in the pickup box. And LED side-mirror spotlights are a handy feature included with the available PowerScope®
 trailer tow mirrors. So you can keep on working after the sun has set.

TITLE: REAR-SEAT STORAGE AND LOCKABLE UNDER-SEAT STORAGE
DESCRIPTION:
You’ll appreciate the convenience of Super Duty®
 interior design when you need to carry cargo and other items inside the cab. Both the SuperCab and Crew Cab models have a rear flat load floor that helps make it easy to load large cargo. The SuperCab features rear-hinged doors that open 170 degrees for easy loading. And the four-door Crew Cab offers an available class-exclusive* folding lockable under-seat box that is integrated into the floor of the vehicle for storing loose items or things you’d want to keep concealed and secure.

TITLE: 110-VOLT/400-WATT AC OUTLET
DESCRIPTION: The 110-volt/400-watt (300 watts when driving) conventional AC outlet is optional in select models. It can help you get things done on the job, such as powering an accessory or recharging a battery. An outlet is located on the instrument panel (all cabs) and at the rear of the available flow-through center console (SuperCab and Crew Cab).

TITLE: WIRELESS CHARGING PAD
DESCRIPTION:
The new available wireless charging pad accepts a wide range of devices with built-in charging capability. Simply set your phone with charging side down on the pad, located in the center console, while the vehicle is either running or in accessory mode. When your phone is fully charged, the unit will maintain it even while you’re streaming music or making a call through the available SYNC®
 3 system.

TITLE: RUNNING BOARD AND TAILGATE FEATURES
DESCRIPTION:
Ford Super Duty®
 offers features that help make every hard day on the job easier. Available running boards, in regular and extended lengths, assist in getting in and out of the cab, as well as accessing the front of the pickup bed. An optional power-deployable version extends automatically when the door is opened and retracts when closed. And there’s an integrated tailgate step with tailgate assist. The step and handle are stowed inside the tailgate and can be easily accessed when needed. Another tailgate feature is remote release with power locking that opens the tailgate with the key fob. When activated, the tailgate gradually lowers to a flat position.

TITLE: DEPENDABILITY FOR TODAY — AND OVER THE LONG HAUL
DESCRIPTION:
You drive a heavy-duty pickup not just for its power and capability. You drive it also because it’s incredibly durable and can withstand the rigorous demands of hauling large loads and pulling huge trailers. That’s why the Ford Super Duty® 
is designed to work for you over the long haul, whether you use it on the job or for recreation.

TITLE: BUILT FORD TOUGH®
DESCRIPTION:
Built Ford Tough®
 isn’t just a slogan. It’s an attitude that has produced America’s premier line of rugged and dependable pickups for 42 straight years. Success on this high level is achieved by never letting up, never allowing the competition to catch up. One example: Super Duty is the first and only pickup truck in its class with a high-strength, military-grade, aluminum-alloy body and frame made of more than 95 percent high-strength steel. *
 Super Duty. It’s Built Ford Tough.

TITLE: HIGH-STRENGTH, MILITARY-GRADE, ALUMINUM-ALLOY BODY
DESCRIPTION:
The Super Duty®
 has the only high-strength, military-grade, aluminum-alloy body in its class. *
 Aluminum alloy is substantially lighter than the previous steel body, yet it’s remarkably strong. It’s also more dent-and-ding resistant and not subject to rust. Use of aluminum alloy allowed some of the weight savings to be reinvested where it matters the most, especially in the frame that’s the foundation of strength and toughness.

TITLE: FULLY BOXED HIGH-STRENGTH STEEL FRAME
DESCRIPTION:
The fully boxed frame, built of more than 95 percent high-strength steel with up to 10 cross members, is 24 times stiffer than the previous design. The frame is designed to minimize flexing and twisting while maximizing strength and torsional rigidity and serves as the foundation for Super Duty®
 achieving the highest payload and tow ratings in its class. *

TITLE: IMPRESSIVE PAYLOAD
DESCRIPTION:
By reducing body weight by up to 350 lbs. and making the frame 24 times stiffer,* Ford Super Duty offers a 7,850-lbs. available maximum payload rating. ** Plus, Super Duty has available features to help you get the most out of all this capability: class-exclusive†
 BoxLink™ to secure accessories, center high-mounted stop lamp camera, LED box lights, remote tailgate release/power-locking tailgate, and tailgate step.

TITLE: CAB FLOOR AND PICKUP BED PROTECTION
DESCRIPTION: To help you protect the inside of your Super Duty® cab, models with standard floor carpeting can be outfitted instead with durable vinyl flooring. Or you can opt to protect your carpeting with available all-weather heavy-duty vinyl floor mats designed with deep and raised ridges to catch and hold snow, slush or mud. For pickup bed protection, custom-designed, heavy-duty rubber mats are available. Or go with Tough Bed® — a factory-installed spray-in bedliner providing a watertight seal that helps resist rust. Tough Bed includes a tailgate guard, black bed tie-down hooks and bed attachment bolts.

TITLE: LARGEST BRAKES IN ITS CLASS (F-450)
DESCRIPTION: The components of the four-wheel anti-lock brakes in the F-450 model are the largest in their class* — and for a very important reason. You want them to provide the sure-stopping power you expect when you’re out on the job hauling tons of whatever it is that’s riding along with you behind the cab.

TITLE:
SUPER DUTY®
 NEXT-LEVEL TECHNOLOGY
DESCRIPTION:
F-Series trucks are built on a reputation of solid engineering performance. And now, Ford Super Duty®
 builds further on that reputation with major advances in technology, offering available driver-assist features such as Pre-Collision Assist with Automatic Emergency Braking (AEB) and Pro Trailer Backup Assist that provide an experience of greater operating control and confidence.

TITLE:
FORD CO-PILOT360TM
 TECHNOLOGY
DESCRIPTION:
Ford Co-Pilot360TM
 Technology features are about supplementing your driving skills.10
 They can alert you to a potential collision and help you react possibly before it can occur. With this advanced technology, you can feel in command when you’re on the road. *

TITLE: PRO TRAILER BACKUP ASSIST™
DESCRIPTION: Whether you’re a novice or a seasoned pro, backing up with a trailer can be challenging. This available feature makes it as easy as turning a knob – simply rotate in the direction you want the trailer to go and Pro Trailer Backup Assist responds accordingly.10

TITLE: PRO TRAILER BACKUP ASSIST™
DESCRIPTION: Whether you’re a novice or a seasoned pro, backing up with a trailer can be challenging. This available feature makes it as easy as turning a knob – simply rotate in the direction you want the trailer to go and Pro Trailer Backup Assist responds accordingly.10

TITLE: PRE-COLLISION ASSIST WITH AUTOMATIC EMERGENCY BRAKING (AEB)
DESCRIPTION: We should all drive defensively, but sometimes other people’s lack of attention can create a hazard. This feature scans the road ahead and can alert you to potential collisions with vehicles detected in your path. If an impact becomes imminent and you don’t take corrective action, the brakes can apply automatically. But don’t worry – they’ll only activate if they’re needed.10

TITLE: PRE-COLLISION ASSIST WITH AUTOMATIC EMERGENCY BRAKING (AEB)
DESCRIPTION: We should all drive defensively, but sometimes other people’s lack of attention can create a hazard. This feature scans the road ahead and can alert you to potential collisions with vehicles detected in your path. If an impact becomes imminent and you don’t take corrective action, the brakes can apply automatically. But don’t worry – they’ll only activate if they’re needed.10

TITLE: ADAPTIVE CRUISE CONTROL AND FORWARD COLLISION WARNING WITH BRAKE SUPPORT
DESCRIPTION: Adaptive Cruise Control and Forward Collision Warning with Brake Support takes conventional cruise control to a new level. It lets you select the speed and distance you want to maintain from the vehicle in front of you. When traffic ahead slows down, you automatically do too, and later resume the preset speed when traffic picks back up. Getting too close to the vehicle ahead? Forward Collision Warning with Brake Support can alert you to a potential collision: A head-up display simulating red brake lights will flash on your windshield, and an audible alert will sound. If you don’t react in time, the brakes will precharge and increase sensitivity, providing full responsiveness when you do brake.10

TITLE: ADAPTIVE CRUISE CONTROL AND FORWARD COLLISION WARNING WITH BRAKE SUPPORT
DESCRIPTION: Adaptive Cruise Control and Forward Collision Warning with Brake Support takes conventional cruise control to a new level. It lets you select the speed and distance you want to maintain from the vehicle in front of you. When traffic ahead slows down, you automatically do too, and later resume the preset speed when traffic picks back up. Getting too close to the vehicle ahead? Forward Collision Warning with Brake Support can alert you to a potential collision: A head-up display simulating red brake lights will flash on your windshield, and an audible alert will sound. If you don’t react in time, the brakes will precharge and increase sensitivity, providing full responsiveness when you do brake.10

TITLE:
BLIS®
 (BLIND SPOT INFORMATION SYSTEM) WITH TRAILER COVERAGE
DESCRIPTION:
It’s rush hour on the interstate. You’re towing a boat. And you need to change lanes. If this situation sounds daunting, it usually is. But available BLIS with Trailer Coverage can help ease lane-change anxiety – even with a trailer in tow.10
 It can alert you not only when a vehicle is spotted in your blind spot but also when one is alongside the trailer.

TITLE:
BLIS®
 (BLIND SPOT INFORMATION SYSTEM) WITH TRAILER COVERAGE
DESCRIPTION:
It’s rush hour on the interstate. You’re towing a boat. And you need to change lanes. If this situation sounds daunting, it usually is. But available BLIS with Trailer Coverage can help ease lane-change anxiety – even with a trailer in tow.10
 It can alert you not only when a vehicle is spotted in your blind spot but also when one is alongside the trailer.

TITLE: LANE-KEEPING ALERT
DESCRIPTION:
It happens. Maybe you’re caught up listening to your favorite Radio Station or need your morning latte, but you’ve wandered a little too close to the edge of your lane. Luckily, Lane-Keeping Alert can help you stay in your lane, even during a moment of distraction.10
 
This smart feature scans your vehicle’s position between the lines in the road ahead and can alert you if you’re starting to edge out of your lane. Having trouble staying on track? After you’ve drifted a few times, you’ll see a coffee cup icon, letting you know it’s time to take a break. *

TITLE: LANE-KEEPING ALERT
DESCRIPTION:
It happens. Maybe you’re caught up listening to your favorite Radio Station or need your morning latte, but you’ve wandered a little too close to the edge of your lane. Luckily, Lane-Keeping Alert can help you stay in your lane, even during a moment of distraction.10
 
This smart feature scans your vehicle’s position between the lines in the road ahead and can alert you if you’re starting to edge out of your lane. Having trouble staying on track? After you’ve drifted a few times, you’ll see a coffee cup icon, letting you know it’s time to take a break. *

TITLE: AUTO HIGH-BEAM HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION: We’ve all been there. Heading into a pitch-black stretch of road and having to turn on the high beams—then forgetting to turn them off again as oncoming traffic approaches. Now, unlit roads, dark peripheries and other low-visibility situations don’t have to catch you off guard. Available Auto High-Beam Headlamps can sense poor lighting conditions and switch on to light your path ahead. They even sense oncoming headlights and dim automatically so you don’t have to worry about blinding other drivers, allowing you to keep your focus—and both hands—on the wheel.

TITLE: AUTO HIGH-BEAM HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION: We’ve all been there. Heading into a pitch-black stretch of road and having to turn on the high beams—then forgetting to turn them off again as oncoming traffic approaches. Now, unlit roads, dark peripheries and other low-visibility situations don’t have to catch you off guard. Available Auto High-Beam Headlamps can sense poor lighting conditions and switch on to light your path ahead. They even sense oncoming headlights and dim automatically so you don’t have to worry about blinding other drivers, allowing you to keep your focus—and both hands—on the wheel.

TITLE: REAR VIEW CAMERA
DESCRIPTION: Between glancing in the rearview mirror and craning your neck, backing up requires a little multitasking. So we help make it easier. The Rear View Camera may not be an extra set of eyes, but it does provide a great view of what’s behind your vehicle. Just make sure to keep the camera lens free of debris (like snow or dust) and you can navigate Reverse with more confidence.10

TITLE: REAR VIEW CAMERA
DESCRIPTION: Between glancing in the rearview mirror and craning your neck, backing up requires a little multitasking. So we help make it easier. The Rear View Camera may not be an extra set of eyes, but it does provide a great view of what’s behind your vehicle. Just make sure to keep the camera lens free of debris (like snow or dust) and you can navigate Reverse with more confidence.10

TITLE: HILL DESCENT CONTROL™
DESCRIPTION: Steep hills are often tricky to navigate, especially if you’re towing a trailer. Hill Descent Control can help make the situation easier – and anxiety-free – by doing just what its name says. It helps you maintain a set speed when you’re driving down an incline, by automatically applying the brake when needed.10

TITLE: HILL DESCENT CONTROL™
DESCRIPTION: Steep hills are often tricky to navigate, especially if you’re towing a trailer. Hill Descent Control can help make the situation easier – and anxiety-free – by doing just what its name says. It helps you maintain a set speed when you’re driving down an incline, by automatically applying the brake when needed.10

TITLE: ULTIMATE TRAILER TOW CAMERA SYSTEM WITH PRO TRAILER BACKUP ASSIST
DESCRIPTION:
Included:



Pro Trailer Backup Assist — Rotate the Pro Trailer Backup Assist knob to help maintain greater control over backing up your trailer.
Trailer Reverse Guidance — Expanded view via cameras in the sideview mirrors and visual guides in the center dash screen show the direction of the truck and the trailer, with guidelines changing with steering wheel movement.10
180/360-Degree Cameras — Images are created from cameras for a view of all sides of the truck. Available with the Rear View Camera and Prep Kit.
Customer-placed camera — Available for mounting to the back of a trailer.
Center high-mounted stop lamp camera — provides a view of the pickup bed, which is helpful when hooking up to a 5th-wheel or gooseneck hitch.

TITLE: TRAILER SWAY CONTROL
DESCRIPTION: When you don’t feel in control, towing your trailer can feel like a risky and daunting task. Trailer Sway Control helps grant you that control by selectively applying the brakes to individual wheels and, if necessary, adjusting engine power to help stabilize your Super Duty and trailer. Thanks to Trailer Sway Control, you can tow with greater confidence, even with large loads.10

TITLE: UPFITTER INTERFACE MODULE
DESCRIPTION:
Super Duty® 
offers a class-exclusive* available factory-installed programmable Upfitter Interface Module that helps upfitters properly connect the vehicle’s electrical system quickly and easily. It allows a direct programmable logic interface to control devices using a laptop or notebook.

TITLE: UPFITTER SWITCHES
DESCRIPTION:
Super Duty® 
offers available upfitter switches, located in an overhead console, for a variety of aftermarket accessories such as a winch, lights, strobes, two-way radio. They’re factory-installed, so there’s no need to cut into the truck’s electrical system. Six switches include two 40-amp switches (ignition on or off) plus four 25-amp switches (ignition on).

TITLE: FORDPASS CONNECT WITH WI-FI HOTSPOT
DESCRIPTION:
With a FordPass Connect-equipped vehicle, you can use FordPass™ 
to locate your vehicle and remotely access vehicle features, such as start, lock and unlock, and vehicle status, including fuel level. You can also schedule specific times to remotely start your vehicle so it’s ready to hit the road as soon as you are. FordPass Connect includes a Wi-Fi hotspot that can connect up to 10 devices at once, so your passengers can stay in touch wherever you roam. *

TITLE: STAY CONNECTED WHEREVER YOU ARE ON THE JOB
DESCRIPTION: No matter where your job takes you, on or off the road, Ford puts you quickly and easily in touch through in-vehicle touchscreen and voice-activated technology as well as smartphone apps. Connect with people, navigate to a destination, get useful trip information — just about anytime, anywhere.

TITLE: FORDPASS™
DESCRIPTION:
FordPass™ is the one-stop app to get things done right from your smartphone. Lock, unlock and start your vehicle remotely.165
* Find parking,169
 reserve and pay ahead of time. Compare fuel prices at stations along your route. Receive key vehicle information and schedule service. Get FordPass help from a friendly FordGuide. These are just some of the things you can do with FordPass. If you haven’t already, download the FordPass app on the App Store®
167
 or get it on Google Play.™
43

TITLE: FORD TELEMATICS™
DESCRIPTION:
Help improve your business operations with Ford Telematics ™ software that delivers manufacturer-grade information, insights and solutions right to your fingertips. Key Benefits might include:


Improve asset utilization through GPS tracking
Maximize vehicle availability with Vehicle Health Alerts and service reminders 
Optimize your running costs by monitoring fuel consumption
Protect your fleet with notifications that can help you react quickly 
Improve driver behavior by receiving insights into driver performance



For more information, please call 1-833-811-3673, email FCS1@ford.com, or visit commercialsolutions.ford.com

TITLE: FORD DATA SERVICES™
DESCRIPTION:
Gain seamless and secure access to your vehicle data through our open platform, the Transportation Mobility Cloud (TMC). Key features include:



Always Evolving: Access to new updates and vehicle signals when they become available

Security Management: Our expertise provides industry-leading data protection

Third Party Access: Easy API integration provides secure and easy access to processed vehicle data
Seamless Integration: Designed for secure, open integration with third-party service tools

TITLE: SYNC® 3
DESCRIPTION:
SYNC®

 3 is our easy-to-use, responsive voice-activated technology. Discover the system’s quick reactions to your conversational voice commands. Experience the smartphone-like touchscreen with impressive responsiveness. You’ll also find a sleek user-friendly interface to help you connect to and control your smartphone. Locate your favorite restaurants with simple destination entry via the optional navigation. SYNC 3 is fast, smart and easy to use.27

TITLE: FORD+ALEXA
DESCRIPTION:
Bringing the amazing capabilities of Amazon Alexa to your Ford Super Duty®
 is as easy as connecting your phone, starting the Ford+Alexa app and connecting via available SYNC®
 3 AppLink.®
 Access voice navigation, traffic information, over 50,000 skills and Amazon Prime shopping. You can even control your supported smart-home devices. Stay connected from just about anywhere while on your next adventure. *

TITLE: FORD AND WAZE
DESCRIPTION:
The popular Waze navigation app is accessible through available SYNC®
 3 AppLink.®
 While on the way to your destination, touch bases with other users, share information to find the best routes and get real-time alerts to accidents, hazards and traffic jams. Want to make Waze really easy to operate? Set it up on the center dash screen’s large touchscreen display — and use voice commands for hands-free operation. *
 Waze is available via iPhone®
 through SYNC 3 with software version 3.0; also available on Android Auto. ™

TITLE: TRUCK APPS
DESCRIPTION: The available 8-inch LCD productivity screen puts helpful information about a wide variety of vehicle functions on up to seven screens readily available through My View and easily accessed with controls on the steering wheel. For towing, input, track and save information about specific trailers and manage how you use them. The off-road tools include displays of lateral, vertical and turning radius information as well as the 4x4 system and traction control status.

TITLE: DURABILITY OVER THE LONG HAUL.
DESCRIPTION:
The Ford Super Duty®
 is the toughest, hardest-working generation of Class 3-5 chassis cab we’ve ever built. We started by cutting body weight with high-strength, military-grade, aluminum alloy that’s lighter than steel yet incredibly strong. We then invested some of that weight savings where it really counts — in stronger axles, chassis and steering components. Plus, we built the fully boxed under-cab and C-channel aft-of-cab frame of 95% high-strength steel. That means hauling and towing capability you can depend on to deliver every workday.

TITLE: HIGH-STRENGTH ALUMINUM-ALLOY BODY
DESCRIPTION:
The Ford Super Duty®
 is the only Class 3-5 chassis cab with a high-strength, military-grade, aluminum-alloy body*. It’s lighter than steel yet immensely strong. And it’s also more dent-and ding-resistant and not subject to red rust corrosion. Beneath this lighter body is a fully boxed under-cab frame and a C-channel aft-of-cab frame built of 95% high-strength steel.

TITLE: BUILT FORD TOUGH®
DESCRIPTION: The frame of today’s Ford Super Duty® is stronger than ever before. The axles, suspension, brakes, driveline and transfer case are also larger and heftier for greater strength and capability. Super Duty Chassis Cabs are more than up to the task of taking on the toughest jobs in the most demanding industries.

TITLE: RUGGED AXLES, CHASSIS AND DRIVELINE COMPONENTS
DESCRIPTION: The frame of today’s Ford Super Duty® is stronger than ever before. The axles, suspension, brakes, driveline and transfer case are also larger and heftier for greater strength and capability. Super Duty Chassis Cabs are more than up to the task of taking on the toughest jobs in the most demanding industries.

TITLE: TOUGH AND DURABLE HIGH-STRENGTH STEEL FRAME
DESCRIPTION: Super Duty® Chassis Cab features a fully boxed under-cab and C-channel aft-of-cab frame made of 95% high-strength steel with up to 10 crossmembers. Torsional rigidity is eight times greater than in the previous generation. The C-channel frame easily accommodates a wide range of upfits from flat and dump beds to wrecker, service and delivery bodies.

TITLE: AFT-AXLE FRAME EXTENSION
DESCRIPTION: The available aft-axle frame extension allows an upfitted body to accommodate additional equipment through extended length. It’s available on F-450 and F-550 Regular Cab chassis models, providing 42 inches of extension with the 145-in. wheelbase and 32 inches of extension with the 169-in. wheelbase.

TITLE: LARGEST BRAKES IN ITS CLASS
DESCRIPTION: The components of the four-wheel anti-lock brakes in today’s generation of F-450/F-550 models are larger than before, with the largest rotors in their class* — and for two important reasons. You want them to provide the sure stopping power you expect when you’re out on the job hauling tons of equipment or cargo. And you want them to last, because having to replace brakes too often can be a drag on your bottom line.

TITLE: CARPET DELETE - VINYL FLOORS
DESCRIPTION:
The 2020 Ford Super Duty®
 Chassis Cab features optional Carpet Delete Vinyl Flooring. Outfit your Super Duty Chassis Cab floors with full-length vinyl for added durability. Black vinyl flooring is available on XLT and LARIAT models and is standard on XL.

TITLE: CAPABILITY BUILT IN FROM THE GROUND UP.
DESCRIPTION: When you want to get the most done, on the job site or over the road, our Class 3-5 chassis cab delivers with its ruggedly engineered fully boxed steel under-cab frame — plus beefy front suspension, chassis and driveline components.

TITLE: BEST-IN-CLASS PAYLOAD
DESCRIPTION:
Reducing body weight and making the frame eight times stiffer than before — together, these increase the payload in today’s generation of the Super Duty®
 Chassis Cab. And that’s a big reason why it reaches a BIC payload 12,750-lb. maximum payload rating.*

TITLE: STRONGER TOWING
DESCRIPTION:
When the job calls for towing huge loads, the Super Duty®
 Chassis Cab lets you do just that, thanks to the heavier and stronger frame, components and driveline of today’s generation of the Ford Super Duty.

TITLE: OUTSTANDING GCWR
DESCRIPTION:
Take the fully boxed under-cab and redesigned C-channel aft-of-cab frame built of 95% high-strength steel — plus the heftier components of the suspension, chassis and driveline. Now add the outstanding hauling and towing capabilities of this Super Duty®
 and you’ve got an impressive gross combination weight rating — 40,000 pounds — one of the highest of any Class 3-5 chassis cab built today.*

TITLE: IMPROVED FRONT GAWR
DESCRIPTION:
Upfit bigger than any previous generation of the Ford Super Duty®
 Chassis Cab. Some of the weight savings from the high-strength, military-grade, aluminum-alloy body were reinvested into heavier-duty axle and front suspension components, resulting in a maximum front gross axle weight rating of 7,500 lbs.*

TITLE:
ADVANCETRAC®
 WITH RSC®
 AND TRAILER SWAY CONTROL
DESCRIPTION:
Super Duty®
 comes with standard AdvanceTrac®
 with Roll Stability Control™
 (RSC®

) and trailer sway control. AdvanceTrac and RSC use gyroscopic sensors and apply a combination of reduced engine power and selective wheel braking to help maintain control of the vehicle and the trailer in tow.39

TITLE: LED SPOTLIGHT SIDE MIRRORS
DESCRIPTION:
The 2020 Ford Super Duty®
 features LED spotlight side mirrors for increased visibility. LED spotlight side mirrors can glow bright white, keeping your truck visible in environments with particularly low lighting. If you open the front doors, they can even be used as spotlighting to illuminate the area around your truck while parked. Optional on XLT models and standard on LARIAT.

TITLE: THE MUSCLE TO MOVE YOUR BUSINESS.
DESCRIPTION:
Super Duty®
 Chassis Cab gas engines — the 6.2L V8 and, new for 2020, the 7.3L V8 — deliver all the power you’d need for the tough everyday jobs you face on the job site or on the road. For heavy-duty performance and severe-duty service, go with the latest generation of the updated 6.7L Power Stroke®
 V8 Turbo Diesel, the most powerful ever in a Ford Super Duty®
 Class 3-5 chassis cab. And whether you power your Super Duty with gas or diesel, you have the Live-Drive Power Takeoff (PTO) Provision with Mobile Mode, available on gas models and standard on diesel.

Design a gas-powered V8 built for strenuous duty, hauling heavy loads day in and day out, with commercial-like durability, performance and power. The result is the all-new overhead valve, port fuel-injected available 7.3L. This big-block “pushrod” V8 with variable-cam timing reaches peak power with optimal air-fuel ratio in the low rpm range, providing the responsiveness and power commercial applications require. And for the durability also required, the 7.3L features a new cast-iron block with four-bolt and cross-bolted main bearings plus a forged steel crankshaft. Want the largest V8 in a heavy-duty pickup rated at 350 hp and a best-in-class 468 lbs-ft of torque? This is it.

TITLE: 7.3L OHV PFI GAS V8 ENGINE
DESCRIPTION: Design a gas-powered V8 built for strenuous duty, hauling heavy loads day in and day out, with commercial-like durability, performance and power. The result is the all-new overhead valve, port fuel-injected available 7.3L. This big-block “pushrod” V8 with variable-cam timing reaches peak power with optimal air-fuel ratio in the low rpm range, providing the responsiveness and power commercial applications require. And for the durability also required, the 7.3L features a new cast-iron block with four-bolt and cross-bolted main bearings plus a forged steel crankshaft. Want the largest V8 in a heavy-duty pickup rated at 350 hp and a best-in-class 468 lbs-ft of torque? This is it.

TITLE: UPDATED 6.7L POWER STROKE® V8 TURBO DIESEL
DESCRIPTION: The available 6.7L Power Stroke® V8 Turbo Diesel with unique inverse-flow configuration (inboard-mounted exhaust manifolds and turbocharger) is redesigned for 2020 to surpass the previous power ratings the competition couldn’t match. This third-generation Power Stroke has a new 36,000-psi fuel-injection system featuring injectors that can measure and spray fuel up to eight times per stroke to optimize combustion. To handle the increased pressure and power, the Power Stroke features a stronger block, cylinder heads, connector rods and bearings, plus new steel pistons. The results? An incredible 330 hp and 850 lbs.-ft. of torque.

TITLE: 6.2L FLEX-FUEL GAS V8
DESCRIPTION: The 6.2L flex-fuel gas V8 is the standard engine in Super Duty® Chassis Cab F-350 models. It’s engineered to deliver peak torque at lower rpm and generates high torque throughout the midrange of the power band. The F-350 Super Duty Chassis Cab for 2020 also features the new Ford TorqShift® 10-speed automatic transmission. What’s more, the 6.2L F-350 is available with optional Live-Drive Power Takeoff (PTO) Provision with Mobile Mode.

TITLE:
FORD TORQSHIFT®
 10-SPEED AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION
DESCRIPTION:
All Super Duty®
 Chassis Cab models now feature a new standard Ford TorqShift®
 10-speed automatic transmission, engineered to optimize drive ratios and improve shift performance. You can choose from four selectable modes — Normal, Tow/Haul, Eco, Deep Sand/Snow — to match operating conditions.

TITLE: LIVE-DRIVE PTO WITH MOBILE MODE
DESCRIPTION: The available class-exclusive* Live-Drive Power Takeoff (PTO) Provision with Mobile Mode** lets you power an aftermarket snowplow, pump, compressor or other accessory. The PTO provision is available across the entire engine lineup. An output gear connects directly to the engine crankshaft to power your PTO anytime the engine is running, whether the truck is in motion or stopped. Another big feature is “split-shaft” capability (diesel only) that allows multiple accessories to operate at the same time when the truck is stopped.

TITLE: SMART DIESEL ENGINE EXHAUST BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: The 6.7L Power Stroke® Turbo Diesel incorporates a smart exhaust brake function. When activated with a button on the instrument panel, the engine brake restricts the turbocharger’s exhaust flow to generate back pressure and slow the vehicle. The main benefit is greater control while traveling downhill, regardless of vehicle load or road grade. Also, because the engine brake helps minimize having to apply pedal pressure, brake fade and lining wear are reduced, lowering the cost of maintenance. Three settings are available: On, Off and Auto. The Auto setting modulates engine braking as needed to help maintain the speed you want based on accelerator and brake pedal use.

TITLE: ADVANCED FUEL OPTIONS
DESCRIPTION: Compressed natural gas (CNG) and propane are advanced fuel options to unleaded gasoline, with the CNG/Propane Gaseous Engine Prep Package available on the 6.2L gas V8. What’s more, the CNG/Propane Package with the addition of the necessary upfits for bi-fuel capability enables the 6.2L V8 to run on either liquefied propane gas or unleaded gas. The 6.2L V8 is a flex-fuel engine, capable of running on E85 (85% ethanol, 15% regular gasoline); the available 6.7L Power Stroke® Turbo Diesel is B20-capable (20% biodiesel, 80% petrodiesel).

TITLE: OPERATOR-COMMANDED REGENERATION WITH ACTIVE INHIBIT (DIESEL)
DESCRIPTION: Some operating conditions, such as long idling, don’t generate enough engine heat for the diesel to automatically burn off soot in the diesel particulate filter. That’s where available Operator-Commanded Regeneration with Active Inhibit comes in. When the warning light comes on, pushing the activation button raises the exhaust temperature to burn off the soot, after which the exhaust temperature reverts to normal. The active inhibit feature allows delay of regeneration when the vehicle is sitting in a safe location not over combustible materials such as dry leaves or grass. Afterward, the driver can manually start the regeneration process. Recommended for commercial applications.

TITLE: TECHNOLOGY YOU CAN DEPEND ON.
DESCRIPTION:
F-Series trucks are built on a reputation for outstanding strength and dependability established over decades of solid engineering performance. And now, Ford Super Duty®
 builds further on that reputation with major advances in technology, offering available driver-assist features such as Pre-Collision Assist with Automatic Emergency Braking that provide an experience of greater operating control and confidence.

TITLE: THREE SPACIOUS CAB STYLES
DESCRIPTION:
The Ford Super Duty®
 is well known for providing excellent comfort over long hours spent at the wheel every workday. Choose the Super Duty cab style that fits your needs: From the regular Cab to the larger SuperCab to the spacious four door Crew Cab model, all Super Duty Cab styles provide an excellent balance of convenience and comfort. Additional benefits include available rear under-seat storage in the SuperCab and a fold-flat/locking load floor in the Crew Cab.

TITLE: DRIVER-ASSIST TECHNOLOGIES
DESCRIPTION:
Driver-assist technologies are about supplementing your driving skills. *10
They can alert you to a potential accident and can help you react, possibly before an accident can occur. With this advanced technology, you can feel in command when you’re on the road.

TITLE: PRE-COLLISION ASSIST WITH AUTOMATIC EMERGENCY BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: Hazards along the way can arise no matter where you’re headed. This feature scans the road ahead and can alert you to potential collisions with vehicles detected in your path. If an impact becomes imminent and you don‘t take corrective action, the brakes can apply automatically — but only if it’s necessary. *

TITLE: PRE-COLLISION ASSIST WITH AUTOMATIC EMERGENCY BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: Hazards along the way can arise no matter where you’re headed. This feature scans the road ahead and can alert you to potential collisions with vehicles detected in your path. If an impact becomes imminent and you don‘t take corrective action, the brakes can apply automatically — but only if it’s necessary. *

TITLE: LANE-KEEPING ALERT
DESCRIPTION: It happens. Maybe you’re caught up listening to your favorite podcast or need your morning latte, but you’ve wandered a little too close to the edge of your lane. Luckily, Lane-Keeping Alert can help you stay in your lane, even during a moment of distraction. This smart feature scans your vehicle’s position between the lines in the road ahead and can alert you if you’re starting to edge out of your lane. Having trouble staying on track? After you’ve drifted a few times, you’ll see a coffee cup icon, letting you know it’s time to take a break. *

TITLE: LANE-KEEPING ALERT
DESCRIPTION: It happens. Maybe you’re caught up listening to your favorite podcast or need your morning latte, but you’ve wandered a little too close to the edge of your lane. Luckily, Lane-Keeping Alert can help you stay in your lane, even during a moment of distraction. This smart feature scans your vehicle’s position between the lines in the road ahead and can alert you if you’re starting to edge out of your lane. Having trouble staying on track? After you’ve drifted a few times, you’ll see a coffee cup icon, letting you know it’s time to take a break. *

TITLE: AUTO HIGH-BEAM HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION: Now, unlit roads, dark peripheries and other low-visibility situations don’t have to catch you off guard. Auto High-Beam Headlamps can sense poor lighting conditions and switch on to light your path ahead. They even sense oncoming headlights and dim automatically so you don’t have to worry about blinding other drivers. So you can keep your focus — and both hands on the wheel.10

TITLE: AUTO HIGH-BEAM HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION: Now, unlit roads, dark peripheries and other low-visibility situations don’t have to catch you off guard. Auto High-Beam Headlamps can sense poor lighting conditions and switch on to light your path ahead. They even sense oncoming headlights and dim automatically so you don’t have to worry about blinding other drivers. So you can keep your focus — and both hands on the wheel.10

TITLE:
FORDPASS CONNECTTM
 WITH 4G LTE WI-FI HOTSPOT
DESCRIPTION:
FordPass™
 Connect with 4G LTE Wi-Fi, standard on all 2020 Ford Super Duty®
 Chassis Cab models, features a 4G LTE Wi-Fi hotspot, powered by AT&T, enabling up to 10 devices to be connected at once, and you can use FordPass to keep track of your Wi-Fi data usage. It also allows you to start, lock and unlock your vehicle — and even schedule a specific time to start. * Locating your parked vehicle is yet another helpful feature.

TITLE: STAY CONNECTED WHEREVER YOU ARE ON THE JOB
DESCRIPTION: No matter where your job takes you, on or off the road, Ford puts you quickly and easily in touch through an in-vehicle touchscreen and voice-activated technology as well as smartphone apps. Connect with people, navigate to a destination, get useful trip information — just about anytime, anywhere.27

TITLE:
SYNC®
 3
DESCRIPTION:
SYNC®

 3 is our easy-to-use, responsive voice-activated technology. Discover the system’s quick reactions to your conversational voice commands. Experience the smartphone-like touchscreen with impressive responsiveness. You’ll also find a sleek user-friendly interface to help you connect to and control your smartphone. Locate your favorite restaurants with simple destination entry via the optional navigation. SYNC 3 is fast, smart and easy to use.27
 Standard on XLT and LARIAT trims.

TITLE: VOICE-ACTIVATED NAVIGATION
DESCRIPTION:
Voice-activated navigation on the 2020 Ford Super Duty®
 Chassis Cab allows you to use voice control to help you reach your destination. You can use SYNC®

 with voice-activated navigation to get directions, show detailed maps, receive personalized traffic alerts and more.27

TITLE: TRUCK APPS
DESCRIPTION: The available 8-inch LCD productivity screen puts valuable information on a wide variety of vehicle functions in front of you, with up to seven screens readily available through My View. Among them is a screen displaying towing functions, such as trailer brake controller and transmission tow/haul settings, vehicle pitch and steering angle, and profiles of up to 10 trailers. Choose the type of trailer connected (conventional, fifth-wheel or gooseneck) and go through a connection checklist that includes such items as mirrors adjusted properly, electrical wiring connected, lights functioning correctly, and others.

TITLE: YOUR WORKFORCE POWERED BY FORD, GAS OR DIESEL.
DESCRIPTION:
Ford Medium Duty trucks are designed to deliver power and performance for almost any job. There’s the Ford-built Power Stroke®
 Turbo Diesel V8 teamed with the only transmission you’ll ever need — the Ford TorqShift®
 HD 6-speed automatic. When we say our trucks are Built Ford Tough,®
 we mean it.

TITLE:
6.8L TRITON®
 V10 GAS ENGINE
DESCRIPTION:
Ford Medium Duty trucks offer a gas engine — the 6.8L Triton®
 V10. That’s good news for a company or municipality on a tight budget needing Class 6–7 capability. The 6.8L has a lower purchase price than a diesel, and can supply all the power you need with 320 horsepower and 460 lb.-ft. of torque; and a CNG/Propane Gaseous Engine Prep Package is available. A Fordbuilt TorqShift®
 HD 6-speed automatic live-drive power takeoff (PTO) provision is available in stationary and mobile modes.*

TITLE:
FORD POWER STROKE®
 TURBO DIESEL V8 ENGINE
DESCRIPTION:
The 6.7L Power Stroke® 
Turbo Diesel V8 has a standard power rating of 270 hp/675 lb.-ft. of torque. You also have your choice of available 300 hp/700 lb.-ft. of torque and 330 hp/725 lb.-ft. of torque power ratings. The 6.7L was tested to over 500,000 simulated customer miles, which contributes to a B10 design life of more than half a million miles.* The unique inverse-flow design locates the turbocharger between the cylinder heads and the top of the block, with the exhaust manifold inboard and close to the turbo, for faster air displacement and greater power. The driver-activated engine exhaust braking restricts exhaust flow to create back pressure for seamless braking and reduced brake wear on downhill grades.

TITLE:
FORD TORQSHIFT®
 HD 6-SPEED AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION
DESCRIPTION:
The Ford TorqShift®
 HD 6-speed automatic is specially designed with a 3-plate/2-stage torque converter and gearsets strengthened with extra pinion gears to handle the heavy demands of the V8 turbo diesel and V10 gas engines. The SelectShift®
 feature has two modes: Progressive Range Select that limits the range of gears to lock out overdrive, plus full manual control. Another feature is tow/haul. On an uphill, it selects the gear that minimizes gear hunting; on a downhill, it prevents upshifting and increase in speed, reducing reliance on brake pressure to slow down. And the TorqShift offers available live-drive power takeoff provision with stationary and mobile modes.

TITLE: TOW/HAUL MODE WITH INTEGRATED ENGINE-EXHAUST BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: A Ford Medium Duty truck can help make your day more efficient by helping to eliminate unwanted frequency of gear shifting. Tow/Haul Mode with Integrated Engine-Exhaust Braking allows greater control when traveling downhill so you can maintain your speed and control your truck with confidence. The result is less braking – minimizing your service needs – and reduced maintenance costs.

TITLE: ALTERNATOR OPTIONS
DESCRIPTION: F-650/F-750 diesel trucks offer a range of alternators, starting with the standard 200-amp model. More powerful dual alternators featuring a 357-amp combined output are also available. The standard F-650 gas engine offers a standard 175-amp or optional 240-amp alternator.

TITLE: DRIVEN TO WORK AS HARD AS YOU DO
DESCRIPTION:
Work-proven Ford Medium Duty trucks are built on a platform of strenuous testing for longterm durability and dependability, and engineered to meet your precise specifications. Regular Cab, SuperCab and Crew Cab. Low-height Pro Loader®
, straight-frame model or tractor. GVWRs from 20,500 to 37,000 lbs. Ford Medium Duty is built in America* to get your job done dependably when conditions are tough, all while keeping low cost operation in mind.

TITLE: TESTED AND BUILT FORD TOUGH®
DESCRIPTION: Ford Medium Duty trucks are subjected to brutal testing in harsh road conditions. To increase the severity of the testing, developmental vehicles are driven by robots to limit human driver exposure to punishing conditions. Our objective: Build F-650/F-750 trucks to withstand tough conditions, from hauling heavy loads to pulling loaded trailers up steep grades over the course of your truck’s productive lifetime.

TITLE: CAB CHOICES THAT ARE BUILT FORD TOUGH.®
DESCRIPTION: Regular Cab, SuperCab and Crew Cab.

TITLE: TRACTOR
DESCRIPTION: The tractor is available in the F-650 and F-750 models with GCWRs of up to 50,000 lbs. when properly equipped.

TITLE: ELECTRONIC STABILITY CONTROL
DESCRIPTION:
Available Electronic Stability Control (ESC)39
 helps detect oversteer, understeer and loss of traction. The Anti-Lock Brake System (ABS) and traction control combine with ESC sensors to detect wheelslip and, most important, act as tools to conquer poor driving conditions.

TITLE: BUILT TO WORK HARD. DESIGNED TO HELP MAKE YOUR JOB EASY.
DESCRIPTION: In addition to working hard, Ford F-650 and F-750 trucks work smart. The work-ready frame is designed to easily accommodate vocational bodies. The Power Stroke® V8 Turbo Diesel engine monitors the diesel particulate filter (DPF) and initiates DPF regeneration when needed. And then there’s the Intelligent Oil-Life Monitor® on the diesel engine that alerts you when it needs an oil change based on actual vehicle usage. Brawn meets brains in Ford Medium Duty trucks.

TITLE: CLEAN, EASY UPFITTING
DESCRIPTION: F-650/F-750 trucks feature a work-ready frame developed with leading upfitters to accommodate vocational bodies requiring few or no modifications. This collaboration resulted in components such as fuel tanks, wiring harnesses and diesel exhaust fluid reservoirs located under the cab. Choose from 36 standard clean CA offerings ranging from 72 to 207 inches.

TITLE: ACTIVE REGEN CONTROL
DESCRIPTION:
When exhaust soot builds up in the diesel particulate filter (DPF), the engine will need to clear the filter of soot through a process called active regeneration. The Power Stroke®
 diesel offers an Active Regen Control that delays this auto regeneration if the truck is idling over combustible material such as dry grass. When idling, especially for extended periods of time, the engine doesn’t generate enough heat to automatically clear the DPF. That’s when the standard Manual Regen initiation feature comes in. A light on the instrument panel alerts the driver of the need for regeneration, and pushing a button starts the process.

TITLE:
FORD TELEMATICS™
 AND FORD DATA SERVICES™
DESCRIPTION:
Our manufacturer-grade telematics hardware and software have been engineered in conjunction with the Ford vehicles your fleet uses every day. This means that they work together seamlessly to deliver solutions that are easy to implement and can have an immediate and positive impact on your operational effectiveness. Our products are continually evolving too, so that you’ll always benefit from the latest telematics solutions, direct from Ford.

 

You will be able to monitor a wide range of vehicle data and information in real time, including but not limited to the examples below:

 


GPS tracking and location
Vehicle speed
Harsh braking or acceleration
Excessive idling and fuel waste
Seatbelt use
Oil life remaining


 


For more information about Ford Telematics and Ford Data Services, please visit commercialsolutions.ford.com or call 1-833-811-FORD (1-833-811-3673).

TITLE: BUILT FORD TOUGH®. AND COMFORTABLE TOO.
DESCRIPTION: Ford Medium Duty trucks are built to work hard. They’re also designed to be comfortable. The cabs are spacious, controls are within easy reach and there are a number of features that make life on the road more relaxed, including voice-activated SYNC.®* Just because you work hard doesn’t mean the hours you spend behind the wheel have to be hard as well.

TITLE: CAB COMFORT
DESCRIPTION:
Drivers experience Ford Medium Duty comfort not only while seated, but also while getting in and out many times over a long workday. Drivers familiar with the comfort of a Ford Super Duty®
 pickup or chassis cab will feel right at home in a Ford Medium Duty. Seating is supportive. Leg room can suit drivers of any size. Gauges are easy to read, controls easy to reach. The large steering wheel has multifunction switches. For the long workday, Medium Duty comfort means business.

TITLE: MORE CAB STYLES
DESCRIPTION: Not all applications are alike or require the same size crew and equipment. That’s why F-650 and F-750 offer a number of Class 6–7 cab configurations. Choose from two-door Regular Cab, four-door SuperCab and four-door Crew Cab. All include 30 percent driver and 30 percent passenger bucket seats. Rear seating in the SuperCab is a 60/40 flip-up cushion rear bench seat; in the Crew Cab, a 60/40 flip-up cushion/fold-down backrest rear bench.

TITLE: SYNC®
DESCRIPTION:
Voice-SYNC lets you use your voice to make a call, listen to music, voice-control, select apps with SYNC® AppLink® and much more. Voice-activated SYNC technology also helps you keep your eyes on the road and your hands on the wheel.27 An information cluster screen is also there to assist you.

•Hands-Free Calling27

•Automatic Phone Book Download

•Music search and control

•SYNC® AppLinkTM 63

•No-Extra-Charge 911 Assist28

TITLE: Express yourself in a Fiesta.
DESCRIPTION:
Ford Fiesta is the small car that’s big on value, beginning with the entry-level S and the impressively equipped SE. There’s also the sporty 1.6L EcoBoost®
engine in the Fiesta ST, and the new ST-Line. Once you’ve chosen the Fiesta that fits you best, you have a wide array of features, including 10 eye-catching colors, that leave you feeling cool, clever and confident.

TITLE: Super Stylish Wheel Designs
DESCRIPTION: Standard on the Fiesta S.

TITLE: Safety Features
DESCRIPTION: High-strength boron steel strengthens critical safety zones, including the floor structure, front rails and beams, and the primary components of the integrated bodyside reinforcement, essentially creating a complex roll cage. And Fiesta has a system of seven airbags* dual-stage driver and front passenger first- and second-row side-curtain airbags. Their roll-fold technology is designed to inflate between the window glass and an occupant’s head. These side-curtain airbags, along with the front-seat side airbags, help protect the head and chest in certain side collisions. Fiesta also has an airbag that inflates between the driver’s knees and the instrument panel.

TITLE: ST-Line Design
DESCRIPTION: Ford Fiesta ST-Line makes its presence known with Shadow Black roof, black headlamp bezels and fog lamps, center airfoil and rear diffuser, lower fascia extensions and twin chrome-tipped exhaust — and inside, race-inspired aluminum pedals and ST-Line logo sport seats with red stitching.

TITLE: ST-Line
DESCRIPTION: The new ST-Line features: Shadow Black roof, mirror caps and spoiler, Ti-VCT I-4 engine, Charcoal Black sport cloth seats with ST-Line logo and red accent stitching, floor mats with red stitching, metallic ST-Line logo sill plate and SYNC® 3.

TITLE: Fiesta ST-Line
DESCRIPTION: Head-turning angles of Fiesta ST-Line.

TITLE: Ford Fiesta ST-Line
DESCRIPTION: ST-Line sill plate.
